src_text: Ditiro tsa Tsamaiso ya Matlhotlhapelo tse go Samaganweng le Tsona go Latela gore go nne le Merwalela.
tgt_text: Ukuphathwa kwenhlekelele emuva kokuhlasela kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso go batho botlhe ba ba latlhegetsweng ke ba ba ba ratang mo merwaleleng ya fa gautshwane e tlisitseng ditshenyegelo tse di masisi e amileng dikarolo di le mmalwa tsa naga ya rona, bogolo segolo KwaZulu-Natala..     Dikgato tsa go Baya Dikarolo tseno mo Maemong Matlhotlhapelo Bosetšhaba mmogo le dikgato tsa go thusa baagi ka matlole a tlhokegang tse di itsisetsweng ke Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa fa gautshwane, maitlhomo tsona ke go netefatsa gore maphata otlhe puso tsaya dikgato tse di rulagantsweng sentle le tse di tla nnang mosola mo go samaganeng le maemo ano, mme seno se tla diriwa ka go dirisa Tikwatikwe ya Naga e Samaganang le Matlhotlhapelo..     Bilione ya diranta puso e abileng dirisediwa go tshegetsa dikgato tsa go ritibatsa maemo le tsa go busetsa maemo ditirelo tse di botlhokwa sekeng mmogo le go abelana ka ditirelo tsa botho tse di jaaka go ba rekela dijo, go ba tlela metsi le go ba batlela bodulo, dintlwanaboithusetso le diaparo..     Tirego ya go aga sešwa mafelo a amegileng setse simolotswe jaaka batho ba naga ya gaetsho ba kopane mo maikemisetsong bona go thusa ba ba latlhegetsweng ke magae le dithoto tsa bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi enduduzo kubo bonke abantu abashonelwe ngabathandiweyo babo ezikhukhuleni zakamuva ezidale umonakalo owesabekayo ezihlasele izingxenye eziningana zezwe lethu, ikakhulukazi isifundazwe saKwaZulu-Natali..     Ukumenyezelwa kweSimo Senhlekelele Sikazwelonke kanye nezinhlelo zosizo lokungenelela eziphathelene nenhlalo-mnotho yabantu ezimenyezelwe nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa kamuva nje, bekuhloswe ngakho ukuqinisekisa ukuthathwa kwezinyathelo ezisebenza kahle futhi ezihambelanayo kuzo zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni, ngokusebenzisa iSizinda Sikazwelonke Sokuphathwa Kwenhlekelele..     Imali eyisigidigidi esisodwa samarandi ehlinzekwe nguhulumeni isetshenziselwa ukulekelela imizamo yokweseka nokuvuselela, ukubuyisela ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo-ngqangi kanye nokuhlinzeka ngosizo lokunciphisa usizi nenhlupheko kubantu okusho ukuhlinzeka ngokudla, amanzi, indawo yokuhlala, ukuthuthwa kwendle kanye nezingubo zokugqoka..     Seyiqalisiwe kakade inqubo yokwakha kabusha izindawo ezikhahlamezekile njengoba abantu bezwe lakithi bebambene ngezandla ekuzimiseleni kwabo ukulekelela labo abalahlekelwe ngamakhaya abo kanye nempahla yabo.

src_text: Tshedimosetso ka Bolwetse jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ezakamuva ngeSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete tshwentswe ke go tlhatlhoga ga fa gautshwane ga ditshwaetso tsa COVID-19 mo dikarolong dingwe tsa naga mme ikuetse go batho botlhe go tsaya dikgato tsa go itshireletsa kgatlhanong le mogare o kotsi ono, bogolo segolo mo marigeng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukukhathazeka kwalo ngokudlondlobala kwenani labantu abasuleleka nge-COVID-19 kamuva nje ezingxenyeni ezithile zezwe futhi linxuse abantu bonke ukuba bathathe izinyathelo zokuzinakekela nokuqikelela impilo yabo ukuze bazivikele kuleli gciwane elibulalayo, ikakhulukazi esikhathini sasebusika.

src_text: Mogare ono sa ntse re tsenya tsebetsebe mme go tlhabela moento sale ntse le yona tsela e botoka go gaisa re ka itshireletsang ka yona.
tgt_text: Igciwane liselokhu liyingozi esihleli nayo ngaso sonke isikhathi phakathi kwethu futhi ukugonywa kusalokhu kuyisona sikhali sokuzivikela esisebenza kahle kakhulu.

src_text: Kabinete itumelela gore batho ba le bantsi ba tswelela go tsaya tshweetso ya go tlhabela moento go nna ona ba itshireletsang ka ona kgatlhanong le COVID-19 mme seno se latela gore dipalopalo tsa fa gautshwane di bontshe gore mo bathong botlhe ka fa nageng re setse re fitlheletse palo e fetang halofo ya bona ya batho ba ba tlhabetseng meento mo diporofenseng tse tlhano.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakuthokozela ukukhula kwesibalo sabantu abaqoka ukugonywa njengendlela yokuqala yokuzivikela ku-COVID-19 emuva kokuthi izibalo zakamuva zibonise ukuthi isibalo sabantu abadala asebegonyiwe ezifundazweni ezinhlanu sesikhule saze sayofinyelela enanini eliyingqophamlando elingaphezu kwamaphesenti angama-.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela go ba ba iseng ba entiwe go ya go tlhabela moento gore ba tle ba itshireletse bona le ba ba tshelang mmogo le bona.

Gape rotlhe re tshwanetse go tswelela go obamela dikgato tsotlhe tsa thibelo ya COVID-19, go akarediwa go rwala mmaseke o tswalang nko le molomo, go tlhapa diatla ka metsi le sesepa, go tsikitletsa diatla ka sebolayamegare se 70% ya sona leng alekhoholo, le go katogana le batho ba bangwe..     Mogolo wa go Inola Batho mo Tshotlegong (SRD).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyabanxusa labo abangakagonywa ukuthi nabo benze kanjalo ukuze bazivikele futhi bavikele nabathandiweyo babo.

src_text: Kabinete rotloetsa baagi ba ba amogelang R350 ya madi thuso SRD go dira dikopo sešwa, go latela kitsiso ya melawana mentšhwa e laolang makwalokopo le go nna le tshiamelo ya madi thuso..     Dikopo di ka dirwa mo webosaeteng ya Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Tshireletso ya Loago (SASSA): https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.
tgt_text: Kumele futhi siqhubeke nokulandela yonke imigomo yokuzivikela kwi-COVID-19, kubandakanya ukugqoka isifonyo esimboza kokubili ikhala nomlomo, ukugeza izandla ngamanzi nensipho, noma sisebenzise isibulali-magciwane sezandla esiqukethe i-alcohol engama-70%, futhi sigcine ibanga eliphephile okungenani eliyimitha elilodwa lokuqhelelana phakathi kwethu nabanye abantu emphakathini..     Isibonelelo Sosizo Olubhekiswe Kubantu Abagajwe Wusizi Nenhlupheko (i-SRD).

src_text: Tsamaiso ya go dira dikopo butswe ka la bo 23 Moranang 2022 mme dirisa fela mafaratlhatlha thekenoloji go kgontsha gore go direlwe ka bonako..     Mogolo ono botlhokwa thata mo go thuseng malapa a tlhokang lehuma le botlhokatiro di ka bong di sa bolo go itelekela mo go ona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhuthaze izakhamuzi ezithola iSibonelelo se-SRD esingama-R350 ukuba zifake izicelo zazo kabusha, kulandela ukwethulwa kwemithethonqubo emisha elawula izicelo kanye nemibandela yokufaneleka kwabantu ukuthola lesi sibonelelo.

src_text: Puso tota ikemiseditse go thusa batho ba ba humanegileng ka megolo ya yona gore le bona ba kgone go nna le tse ba di tlhokang.
tgt_text: Izicelo zingafakwa kwiwebhusayithi yoPhiko LweziMpesheni Nezibonelelo Zikahulumeni lwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASSA): https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Pabalesego le Tshireletsego.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lokufaka izicelo lwavulwa mhla zingama-23 kuMbasa 2022 futhi luwuhlelo oluqhutshwa ngobuchwepheshe bedijithali ngokuphelele ukuze kusheshe ukucutshungulwa nokuphothulwa kwezicelo..     Isibonelelo sokuhlinzeka ngosizo siyisibonelelo esisemqoka kakhulu sokubhekelela imindeni entulayo obekungenzeka izithole seyibhuqabhuqwa yisihlava sobubha nokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi.

src_text: Kabinete tswelela go kgala ka mafoko a bogale dipolao tse di setlhogo tsa basadi mme lebogile dikgato tsa ka bonako tse mapodisi ba di tsereng mo go tshwareng babelaelwa mo kgetseng ya polao ya Mme Hillary Gardee (28), wa kwa Kamagugu kwa Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uzibophezele ekuhlinzekeni ngezibonelelo kulabo bantu abadla imbuya ngothi abangenawo amandla okuzibhekelela ngokwabo ukuze bakwazi ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zabo eziyisisekelo.

src_text: Gape Kabinete kgadile ka mafoko a bogale polao ya batho ba le barataro kwa Khayelitsha, kwa Motsekapa.
tgt_text: Ezokuphepha nokuvikeleka.

src_text: Dipolao tse di setlhogo di re gakolola gore re tshwanetse go dira go feta ga jaana jaaka setšhaba go fedisa tirisodikgoka le tirisodikgoka mo bathong ba bong jo bo rileng mmogo le polao ya basadi le bana (GBVF).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyaqhubeka nokugxeka izenzo zokubulawa kwabantu besifazane ezingenangqondo futhi lisithokozele isenzo sabomthetho sokubabopha ngokushesha okukhulu abasolwa abayamaniswa nokufa kuka-Nks Hillary Gardee (28), obehlala endaweni yaKamagugu eMpumalanga.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo bathong botlhe mo nageng go dira le puso mo ntweng kgatlhanong le bosenyi le GBVF.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde futhi lagxeka nesenzo sokubulawa kwabantu abayisithupha eKhayelitsha, eKapa.

src_text: Mmogo re ka dira bonnete jwa gore batho botlhe, go akarediwa bagodi, basadi le bana ba bona mafelo re nnang mo go ona le mebila ya ona babalesegile..     Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubulawa kwabantu okungenangqondo kuyisikhumbuzo sokuthi kusekuningi okumele sikwenze njengomphakathi ukuqeda udlame kanye nodlame olweyamene nobulili kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane (i-GBVF)..     IKhabhinethi linxuse abantu bonke kuleli ukuthi basebenzisane nohulumeni empini yokulwisana nobugebengu kanye ne-GBVF.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse pulosemmuso ya feme ya tlhagiso ya ditena ya Corobrik kwa Kwastina kwa Driefontein kwa Gauteng mo tirelo eno neng tsenetswe ke Moporesidente Ramaphosa ka Laboraro, 4 Motsheganong.
tgt_text: Uma sibambisene singaqinisekisa ukuthi imiphakathi yethu kanye nezitaladi zethu kuphephile kubantu bonke, kubandakanya nabantu esebekhulile ngokweminyaka, abesifazane kanye nezingane..     Ezomnotho.

src_text: Feme eno ya maemo a kwa godimo ke karolo ya peeletso ya R800 milione e tsamaelanang le R200 milione nngwe e beetsweng go atolosa ditiro tsa konkereite tsa Corobrik kwa KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe ukuvulwa ngokusemthethweni kwefemu eyakha izitini yakwa-Corobrik, i-Kwastina e-Driefontein e-Gauteng okwenziwe nguMongameli u-Ramaphosa ngoLwesithathu mhla zizi-4 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Corobrik ke nngwe ya dikgwebo di le mmalwa tsa ka fa nageng tse di tsibogetseng boikuelo jwa ga Moporesidente Ramaphosa jwa gore dikgwebo tsa Aforika Borwa le tsa dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba di beeletse mo ikonoming.
tgt_text: Le femu kanokusho yohlobo lwesimanjemanje iyingxenye yotshalomali oluyizigidi ezingama-800 zamarandi, oluhambisana nolunye futhi utshalomali olwengeziwe oluyizigidi ezingama-200 zamarandi olwabelwe umsebenzi wokwelulwa kwemisebenzi kakhonkolo yakwa-Corobrik KwaZulu-Natali.

src_text: Kabinete nopotse gore ditšhono tse dinnye tsa ikonomi mo mererong ya haeterojene di oketsegile ka ntlha ya go agiwa ga lori ya setlamo sa meepo sa Anglo American e tsamayang ka mafura haeterojene.
tgt_text: Abakwa-Corobrik bangelinye lamabhizinisi akuleli asabelile kwikhwelo likaMongameli u-Ramaphosa lapho enxusa amabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika kanye namabhizinisi amazwe ngamazwe ukuba atshale izimali emnothweni wezwe lethu.

src_text: Lori eno – e fetotsweng gore se tlhole dirisa mafura disele mme dirise haeterojene, mmogo le go neelwa maatla ke dibeterii tsa lithium-ion – ke ya ntlha ya mofuta oo mo lefatsheng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuphawulile ukuthi umnotho wegesi ihayidrojini osafufusa uthole ukwesekwa nokufukulwa njengoba abakwa-Anglo American sebethule iloli elisebenza ngegesi yehayidrojini.

src_text: Ditšhono tsa ikonomi mo mererong ya haeterojene di nopotswe jaaka tse di botlhokwa mo maanong a botlhokwa ikonomi e sa diriseng dilo tse di bolayang tlhago mo nageng ya rona, le mo go godiseng ikonomi le mo go tlhameng ditiro..     Gape kabinete amogetse peeletso nngwe mo ikonoming e tlang ka setlamo sa dijo sa Ireland, se se bidiwang Kerry Group, se se butseng polante ntšhwa e jeleng R650 milione kwa Hammarsdale, kwa KwaZulu-Natala se maikaelelo sona leng go tlhagisetsa kontinente dijo tse di tse di sa feleng.
tgt_text: Leli loli – eliguquliwe ebelisebenza ngodizili manje eselisebenza ngehayidrojini, futhi elinengxenye ethile yalo esebenza ngamabhethri ohlobo lwe-lithium-ion – lingelokuqala ngqa ukubonakala emhlabeni wonke jikelele.

src_text: Polante eno ga tshwane le tse dingwe gonne na le didirisiwa di le mmalwa tse di sa senyeng tikologo mmogo le tse di sa diriseng motlakase montsi, tse di dirisang motlakase o fetlhiwang ka letsatsi o tla dirang gore seelo sa go itshepele ka bontsi mo motlakaseng wa ka fa nageng se fokotsege, motlakase o tsewang mo mogoteng o tswang mo metšhining megolo mmogo le metsi a lekaneng, go selwa le go solwamosola gape le phokotso.
tgt_text: Umnotho wehayidrojini usuhlonzwe njengento esemqoka kakhulu okumele ibekwe eqhulwini kuhlobo lomnotho wethu olungayinukubezi imvelo, futhi ukuze kukhuthazwe ukukhula komnotho kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi..     IKhabhinethi liluthokozele futhi nolunye utshalomali olwengeziwe olufakwe yinkampani ekhiqiza ukudla yase-Ireland, i-Kerry Group, esivule ifemu entsha edle izigidi ezingama-650 zamarandi e-Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natali, okuhloswe ngayo ukukhiqizela leli zwekazi ukudla ngokuqhubekayo.

src_text: Setlamo sa Kerry Group sa le se le gona mo Aforika Borwa go tloga ka 2011 mme peeletso nngwe ya bona ke sesupo sa gore Aforika Borwa sa ntse le lefelo le le ratiwang la dipeeletso.
tgt_text: Le femu iyifemu eyingqayizivele, futhi engafani neze namanye, njengoba inezinsiza-kusebenza eziningana eziyoyilekelela ukuthi iqhubeke isikhathi eside yenza umsebenzi wayo ngendlela esimeme, kubandakanya imishini engadli ugesi omningi, ukusetshenziswa kukagesi welanga ukuze kuncishiswe umthamo kagesi osuka esikhungweni sikagesi sikazwelonke, ukuqoqwa kwamandla kagesi nokushisa emithonjeni yamandla kagesi esisetshenzisiwe, kanye nokuqoqwa nokugcinwa kwamanzi ngobunyoninco, nokusebenzisa izinto kabusha kanye nokuncishiswa kwemfucuza ekhiqizwayo.

src_text: Dipeeletso tseno di latela go thankgololwa ga bene e tlhagisitsweng mo lapeng ya Isuzu D-Max kwa Gqeberha kwa Kapa Botlhaba kgwedi e fetileng.
tgt_text: Inkampani i-Kerry Group seyisebenze eNingizimu Afrika kusukela ngowezi-2011, futhi lolu tshalomali olwengeziwe luyinkomba yokuthi iNingizimu Afrika iyizwe eliyintandokazi kubatshalizimali.

src_text: D-MAX ya mofuta montšhwa bontsha maikemisetso Isuzu mo Aforika Borwa mme ke nngwe ya dilo tse di fitlheletsweng ka Letsholo la Tlhabololo ya Tlhagiso ya Dijanaga (APDP).
tgt_text: Lolu tshalomali lulandela ezinyathelweni zokwethulwa kweveni yohlobo lwe-Isuzu D-Max eyakhiwa kuleli e-Gqeberha eMpumalanga Kapa ngenyanga edlule.

src_text: APDP ke sekema se se tlhotlheletsang tlhagiso ya dijanaga mo indaseteri ya dijanaga mme maikaelelo sona ke go dira gore indaseteri e tlhalositsweng ya dijanaga oketse tlhagiso ya yona ya dijanaga, go oketsa mosola wa indaseteri ya dikarolo tsa dijanaga mme seno se tla dira gore indaseteri ya dijana tlhole ditiro.
tgt_text: I-D-MAX entsha yohlobo lwesimanjemanje iwuphawu olucace bha lokuzibophezela kwenkampani yakwa-Isuzu eNingizimu Afrika futhi ingenye yezimpumelelo ezizuzwe ngaphansi koHlelo Lokuthuthukisa Ukwakhiwa Nokukhiqizwa Kwezimoto (i-APDP).

src_text: Go fopholediwa gore go tla tsenngwa R2,8 bilione ka ditlhagiswa tsa ka fa nageng fa APDP tswelela go dirisiwa.
tgt_text: I-APDP iwuhlelo lokukhuthaza umkhiqizo oluqondiswe embonini yezimoto okuhloswe ngalo ukugqugquzela nokukhulisa inani lezimoto ezikhiqizwa yile mboni yezimoto, ukugqugquzela ukwakhiwa nokulungiswa kwezingxenye zezimoto embonini yakuleli futhi ngalokho-ke kuvuleke amathuba omsebenzi ochungechungeni lonkana lwemisebenzi yokwakhiwa nokukhiqizwa kwezimoto.

src_text: Peeletso eno tla tlhola ditiro go tswa mo lephateng leno di feta di le 1 000 kwa polanteng eo mme tlhole gape le ditiro tse dingwe gape di le 24 000 mo ditlamong tse dingwe tse di dirisanang le lephata leno, mme seno se tla nna le mosola o bonalang mo go thuseng baagi ba kgaolo eo..     Pitsokgothakgothe ya Batlhankedi ba Meepo.
tgt_text: Lilinganiselwa kuma-R. 8 ezigidigidi inani lomkhiqizo wakuleli ozokhiqizwa esikhathini sonkana sokuqhubeka kwe-APDP.

src_text: Pitsokgothakgothe ya Peeletso mo Meepong ya Aforika ya 2022 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Tikwatikweng ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Dikhonferense ya Motsekapa go tloga ka la bo 9 go fitlha ka la bo 12 Motsheganong ke nngwe ya dirala tse dikgolokgolo tsa dipuisano le ditirisanommogo magareng ga bannaleseabe botlhe mo indasetering ya meepo.
tgt_text: Lolu tshalomali luzovikela imisebenzi eyi-1 000 yabantu abaqashwe ngqo kulesi sikhungo futhi luvulele abantu abayizi-24 000 amathuba omsebenzi emisebenzini eminingana engaphandle ehlobene nomsebenzi owenziwa yile nkampani futhi ngalokho-ke lulekelele kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni nokufukulwa komphakathi kulesiya sifunda..     INgqungquthela Yezezimayini.

src_text: Moono wa tiragalo ne le: “Diphetogo mo Meepong ya Aforika: Go beeletsa mo Tsamaisong ya Motlakase, ESG le Diikonomi”.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yokutshalwa Kwezimali Ezimayini zase-Afrika yowezi-2022 ebibanjelwe e-Cape Town International Convention Centre kusukela mhla ziyisi-9 kuya kumhla ziyi-12 kuNhlaba 2022, ingesinye sezigcawu ezinkulukazi zokuxhumana nokusebenzisana phakathi kwabo bonke ababambiqhaza embonini yezimayini.

src_text: Kabinete dumela gore Pitsokgothakgothe ya Meepo tla thusa go bontsha le go tsweletsa Aforika Borwa jaaka lefelo le le ratiwang la dipeeletso.
tgt_text: Isiqubulo sale ngqungquthela sabe sithi: “Uguquko-simo Lwezezimayini e-Afrika: Sitshala Izimali Ekuguqulweni Kwamandla, i-ESG, kanye Neminotho”.

src_text: Aforika Borwa leboga dipeeletso mo nageng ya rona mme ikemiseditse go dira gore go nne le maemo a tla dirang gore re nne le kgolo botlhe ba nang le seabe mo go yona ya ikonomi le go tlisa diphetogo mo ikonoming.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linethemba elikhulu lokuthi iNgqungquthela Yezezimayini izolekelela ekuvezeni kanye nokukhangisa iNingizimu Afrika njengezwe eliyintandokazi kubatshalizimali.

src_text: Dikamano tsa Boditšhabatšhaba le tsa Kgaolo.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ilwamukela ngezandla ezimhlophe utshalomali olungena kuleli futhi izibophezele ekwakheni izimo ezikahle futhi ezikulungele ukukhula komnotho okubandakanyayo kanye nokulethwa koguquko emnothweni.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gape ditherisano tsa fa gautshwane tsa ga Moporesidente Ramaphosa le Moporesidente Joe Biden wa Amerika, Moporesidente Emmanuel Macron wa Fora le Moporesidente Hakainde Hichilema wa Zambia mo diraleng tse di farologaneng.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane namazwe ngamazwe omhlaba kanye namazwe esifunda.

src_text: Ditherisano tseno di kgontshitse Moporesidente go maatlafatsa dikamano tsa sebedi le tirisanommogo magareng ga Aforika Borwa le mebuso ya balekane malebana le dintlha tsa botlhokwa tsa kgaolo le tsa boditšhabatšhaba, go akarediwa go bona tharabololo ya kagiso ya kgotlhang e kwa Ukraine     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukelile futhi ukuxhumana nokufakana imilomo kwakamuva nje phakathi kukaMongameli  u-Ramaphosa noMongameli waseMelika u-Joe Biden, noMongameli wase-France u-Emmanuel Macron kanye noMongameli wase-Zambia u-Hakainde Hichilema ezigcawini zokuxhumana ezahlukene.

src_text: Ditekanyetsokabo.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuxhumana nokufakana imilomo kuhlinzeke uMongameli ngethuba elikahle lokuqinisa ubudlelwane kanye nobambiswano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika namazwe ebambisene nawo ezindabeni ezisemqoka eziphathelene nesifunda kanye nalezo eziphathelene namazwe ngamazwe omhlaba, kubandakanya nokuthola isixazululo esinokuthula kwingxabano eqhubekayo e-Ukraine     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo baaging botlhe go latela ditlhagiso tsa Ditekanyetsokabo tse di farologaneng tsa mafapha bosetšhaba puso le la Kantoro ya Moporesidente gore ba kgone go rwesa puso maikarabelo..     Ka nako ya ditlhagiso tsa Ditekanyetsokabo, mafapha otlhe thadisa ka botlalo dithulaganyo le ditlapele tsa ngwaga.
tgt_text: Amavoti Esabelomali.

src_text: Maikaelelo tlhagiso ya Ditekanyetsokabo ke go netefatsa gore matlole setšhaba dirisiwa ka nonofo go fitlhelela ditlhokego tsa baagi..     Gape di neela Ditona serala se se maleba go tsharolola tiro ya puso, go akarediwa dikatlego le dikgwetlho..     Leano la go Anamisa Gase ya Peteroliamo e Fetoletsweng go nna Seedi (LPG).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linxusa zonke izakhamuzi ukuba ziwalandele amaVoti Esabelomali ahlukahlukene ethulwa yiminyango kahulumeni kazwelonke kanye neHhovisi likaMongameli ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi uhulumeni uyaphendula ngemisebenzi yakhe..     Ngenkathi kwethulwa amaVoti Esabelomali, yonke iminyango ichaza kabanzi ngezinhlelo zayo kanye nezinto ezibekwe eqhulwini ezizokwenziwa kulo nyaka.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go tsenngwa tirisong ga Leano la go Anamisa LPG, le le phasaladitsweng go batla maikutlo baagi ka Mopitlwe.
tgt_text: Amavoti Esabelomali kuhloswe ngawo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izimali zikahulumeni zisetshenziswa ngobunyoninco ekuhlangabezaneni nezidingo zomphakathi..     Ahlinzeka futhi ngesigcawu esihle kakhulu sokuba oNgqongqoshe bakwazi ukuchaza kabanzi ngomsebenzi kahulumeni, kubandakanya izimpumelelo kanye nezinselele..     Iqhingasu Lokuqaliswa Kokukhishwa  Kwesibaseli Esiyigesi Ewuketshezi (i-LPG) .

src_text: Maikaelelo leano leno ke go atolosa indaseteri ya LPG mo nageng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liligunyazile iQhingasu Lokukhishwa kwe-LPG ukuze liqale ukusebenza,  okuyiqhingasu elashicilelwa ngoNdasa 2022 ukuze kuboniswane nomphakathi ngalo.

src_text: LPG tla nna mosola mo go bonalang mo go direng gore re nne le metswedi e farologaneng ya motlakase..     Gareng ga ditsereganyo tse dingwe, leano leno le tla laola ditlhwatlhwa mo lephateng leno le go tshegetsa tlhagiso ya disilindara tsa LPG mo nageng.
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lihlose ukwelula nokunweba imboni ye-LPG ezweni.

src_text: Gape le tla ruta baagi ka mesola ya go dirisa LPG jaaka mofuta mongwe wa motlakase..     Leano leno go tla iponelwa lona fa le sena go phasaladiwa ke Lefapha la Ditlhagisiwa tsa Diminerale le Motlakase mo www.dmr.gov.za.
tgt_text: I-LPG izolekelela kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukusetshenziswa kwemithombo yamandla ehlukahlukene.

src_text: Letlhomeso la Naga le le Buang ka Leano la go Diragatsa Matsholo a Tsweletsang Temoso ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogolofadi.
Kabinee amogetse Letlhomeso la Naga le le Buang ka Leano la go Diragatsa Matsholo a Tsweletsang Temoso ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogolofadi.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinhlelo zokungenelela, leli qhingasu lizolawula amanani entengo emsebenzini wonkana wokukhiqizwa kwegesi ewuketshezi futhi leseke nomsebenzi wokukhiqizwa kwamasilinda e-LPG ezweni.

src_text: Maikaelelo letlhomeso ke go kaela maphata poraefete le setšhaba go netefatsa gore ditshwanelo tsa batho ba ba nang le bogole di sirelediwa jaaka go beilwe mo Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Futhi lizofundisa umphakathi ngemihlomulo yokusebenzisa i-LPG njengolunye uhlobo lwamandla olwehlukile olungasetshenziswa..     Abantu bazokwazi ukufinyelela kulona emuva kokuba selishicileliwe nguMnyango Wezimbiwa Namandla ku-www.dmr.gov.za.
Uhlaka Lwamasu Lukazwelonke olumayelana Nemikhankaso Yokuqwashisa Ngamalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Letlhomeso leno le tla ka dithulaganyo tse di tla thusang go fedis dikgoreletsi tse go itemogelwang tsona fa go tsewa ditshwetso, bogolo segolo tse di amanang le batho ba ba nang le bogole.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uHlaka Lwamasu Lukazwelonke olumayelana Nemikhankaso Yokuqwashisa Ngamalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Gape le lemosa batho ba ba nang le bogole gore ba itse ditshwanelo tsa bona jaaka di sirelediwa ke Molaotheo.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luhlose ukuhola nokuqondisa umkhakha ozimele ngokunjalo futhi nomkhakha kahulumeni ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi avikelekile amalungelo abantu abanokukhubazeka, njengoba lokhu kubekwe ngokucacile kuMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wonyaka we-.

src_text: Gape letlhomeso leno le tlamela ka katiso, pegelo ya bobegakang le tsweletso ya temoso mo setšhabeng malebana le ditshwanelo tsa batho ba ba nang le bogole.
Letlhomeso leno le diragatsa Lekwalo la Matlhagolatsela la Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luhlinzeka ngeqoqwana lamathuluzi azolekelela ekususeni imigoqo ebandlululayo ekuthathweni kwezinqumo, ikakhulukazi lezo eziphathelene nabantu abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Aforika Borwa ke mosaeni wa Tumelano ya Ditšhabakopano (UN) ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole le Porothokholo ya UN ya Tšhata ya Aforika ya Ditshwanelo tsa Botho le Batho mo Ditshwanelong tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole (Porothokholo ya Aforika ya Ditshwanelo tsa Bogole).
tgt_text: Futhi luqwashisa abantu abanokukhubazeka ukuthi bawazi amalungelo abo njengoba evikelwe nguMthethosisekelo.

src_text: Go batlilwe maikutlo bannaleseabe ba ba maleba malebana le letlhomeso, go akarediwa Lekgotla la Bosetšhaba la Tlhabololo ya Ikonomi le Badiri.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luhlinzeka futhi ngokuqeqeshwa,  imibiko yabezindaba kanye nokuqwashisa emphakathini mayelana namalungelo abantu abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Samiti ya Tsamaiso ya Mafatshe le Tsamaiso ya go nna le Lefatshe mo Mafelong Merafe.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luqalisa ukusebenza koMthetho Odingidwayo omayelana Nabantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go tshwariwa ga Samiti ya Tsamaiso ya Mafatshe le Tsamaiso ya go nna le Lefatshe mo Mafelong Merafe ka Labotlhano, 27 le Lamatlhatso, 28 Motsheganong 2022 kwa Gauteng.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ingelinye lamazwe asayina iSivumelwano seNhlangano Yezizwe (i-UN) esiqondene Namalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka kanye Nesivumelwano se-UN soMqulu wase-Afrika Wamalungelo Esintu kanye Namalungelo Abantu esiqondene Namalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka (Isivumelwano Samalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka base-Afrika).

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Lekwalo la Ditshwetso tse go Enngweng ka Tsona la Tsamaiso ya Mafatshe le Tsamaiso ya go nna le Lefatshe mo Mafelong Merafe le go dumelanweng ka lona mo kgweding ya Mopitlwe kaetse gore go dirwe patlomaikutlo nngwe mo baameging ba ba maleba.
tgt_text: Uhlaka kwaboniswana ngalo nabo bonke ababambiqhaza abafanelekile, kubandakanya noMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wokuthuthukiswa Komnotho Nabasebenzi.

src_text: Samiti eno tla tsenyeletsa gape le tiro e dirilweng mo ngwageng o fetileng mo go yona go batlilweng ditshwaelo go tswa kwa bannaleseabeng ba ba farologaneng     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yezokuphathwa Komhlaba kanye Namalungelo Obunikazi Nokusetshenziswa Komhlaba Ezindaweni Lapho Abantu Besebenzisa Khona Umhlaba Ngokuhlanganyela.

src_text: Khonferense ya Botlhano ya Lefatshe ya Phediso ya go Ja Bana Ntshu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa kweNgqungquthela Yezokuphathwa Komhlaba kanye Namalungelo Obunikazi Nokusetshenziswa Komhlaba Ezindaweni Lapho Abantu Besebenzisa Khona Umhlaba Ngokuhlanganyela ngoLwesihlanu mhla zingama-27 kanye noMgqibelo mhla zingama-28 kuNhlaba 2022 e-Gauteng.

src_text: Aforika Borwa tla amogela Khonferense ya Botlhano ya Lefatshe ya Phediso ya go Ja Bana Ntshu kwa Tikwatikweng ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Durban ya go Tshwarela Dikhonferense kwa KwaZulu-Natal go tloga ka Latshipi, 15 go fitlha ka Labotlhano, 20 Motsheganong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lasemukela ngokusemthethweni ngoNdasa 2021 iSitatimende Esichaza Ngokucacileyo Umbono-simo Kahulumeni maqondana Nokuphathwa Komhlaba kanye Namalungelo Obunikazi Nokusetshenziswa Komhlaba Ezindaweni Lapho Abantu Besebenzisa Khona Umhlaba Ngokuhlanganyela.

src_text: Ke la ntlha Mokgatlho wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Badiri (ILO) tshwarela khonferense eno mo Aforika..     Go solofetswe gore khonferense tla tsenelwa ke ditlhogo tsa dipuso, ditona tse 120, dikgaolotlhopho tsa boraro tsa dinaga tse leng ditokololo tsa ILO di le187, ditheo tsa UN, ditheo tsa thuto, mekgatlho ya baagi, mekgatlho e seng ya puso, bobegakgang le baagi.
tgt_text: Liyalele ukuthi kubanjwe ezinye izigcawu zokubonisana nabo bonke ababambiqhaza abafanelekile.

src_text: Gape tiragalo tla kgontsha Aforika Borwa go tlhagisa Molaotheo wa naga jaaka sireletsa ditshwanelo tsa bana.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela izoba yisigcawu sokusonga nokuphothula umsebenzi osuwenziwe kusukela ngonyaka odlule kuze kube manje, lapho bekunxenxwa khona imibono evela kubabambiqhaza abahlukahlukene     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Naga tla golagana le dinaga tse di farologaneng tse di re eteletseng pele ka go fedisa go ja bana ntshu le go ithuta mo go tsona..     Imbizo ya Moporesidente e Buang ka Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo  le le Ikaegileng ka Ditikologo (DDM).
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yesihlanu Yomhlaba Wonke Mayelana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane.

src_text: Moresidente Ramaphosa tla tshwara Imbizo ya Moporesidente e buang ka DDM kwa Mpumalanga ka Labotlhano, 20 Motsheganong 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Se tlogele ope kwa morago”.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izosingatha iNgqungquthela Yesihlanu Yomhlaba Wonke Mayelana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane e-Durban International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natali, kusukela ngeSonto mhla ziyi-15 kuze kube nguLwesihlanu mhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Jaaka serala sa botlhokwa se baagi ba nang le seabe mo go sona, Imbizo tla letla Moporesidente go buisana le bannaleseabe ba ba farologaneng – bogolo segolo baagi ba metsemagae – le go reetsa matshwenyego le dikgwetlho tsa bona ka maikaelelo go samagana natso.
tgt_text: Kuzobe kungokokuqala ngqa ukuthi iNhlangano Yezabasebenzi Yamazwe Ngamazwe (i-ILO) isingathe le ngqungquthela ezwekazini lase-Afrika..     Izinhloko zemibuso, ongqongqoshe abayi-120, umbimbi olumkhakha-mithathu lwamazwe ayi-187 angamalungu e-ILO, izikhungo ze-UN, izikhungo zezemfundo, izinhlangano zezinhlaka zomphakathi wonkana, izinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni, abezindaba kanye namaqembu omphakathi kulindeleke ukuthi bayethamele le ngqungquthela.

src_text: Imbizo ya Moporesidente e buang ka DDM ikaelela go sutisa dikgoreletsi tsa tlamelo ya ditirelo e tsamaisanang mmogo le go tsweletsa seabe sa baagi go lepalepana le DDM.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela izonikeza futhi iNingizimu Afrika ithuba lokuveza nokubonakalisa uMthethosisekelo wezwe njengoba uwavikela amalungelo ezingane.

src_text: MaAforika Borwa ka latela dipuisano mo mafaratlhatlheng loago ditlhaeletsano mmogo le go nna le seabe mo go tsona ka go tsena mo #PresidentialImbizo.
tgt_text: Leli lizwe lizoxhumana futhi libonisane namazwe ahlukahlukene asekhathule indima ebanzi kakhulu kuneyethu ekuqedeni ukusetshenziswa kwezingane futhi lifunde kulawo mazwe..     Imbizo kaMongameli eqondene Nohlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezifunda (i-DDM).

src_text: Kgwedi ya go Keteka go Nna MoAforika.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa uzobamba Imbizo kaMongameli eqondene ne-DDM eMpumalanga ngoLwesihlanu mhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Ungashiyi muntu ngemuva”.

src_text: Mokete wa segopotso sa Kgwedi ya go Keteka go Nna MoAforika o tshwarwang mmogo le wa go keteka Letsatsi la go Keteka go Nna MoAforika ka Laboraro, 25 Motsheganong ketekiwa ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Ngwaga wa Kgora: Go maatlafatsa kgora le go nna teng ga dijo mo Kontinenteng ya Aforika”..     Jaaka karolo ya ponelopele ya pakatelele e tlhagisitsweng mo Lenaneo 2063 (le leng kaedi ya tlhabololo ya Aforika go fitlhelela tlhabololo ya ikonomiloago e akaretsang le e tsweletsegang mo dingwageng tse 50), moono totile bokgoni jwa batho ba Aforika, go lebeletswe thata basadi, makgarebe le bana.
tgt_text: Njengesigcawu esimqoka sokubamba iqhaza komphakathi, Imbizo izonikeza uMongameli ithuba lokuxhumana ngqo nababambiqhaza abahlukahlukene – ikakhulukazi imiphakathi yezindawo zasemakhaya – futhi uzolalela izinkinga nezinselele zabo ngenhloso yokuzixazulula.

src_text: Seno se botlhokwa mo tlhabololong ka ntlha ya fa se lebisa kwa matshelong a tokafetseng batho ka nosi, go nna le dipoelo tse di kwa godimo le letseno le le tokafetseng mo dinageng.
tgt_text: Imbizo kaMongameli eqondene ne-DDM ihlose ukususa izithiyo ezivimbela ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo-ngqangi ngendlela edidiyelwe futhi igqugquzele ukubamba iqhaza komphakathi ngokuhambisana ne-DDM.

src_text: Ntlhakgolo e ka elwang tlhoko mo meletlong ya Kgwedi ya go Keteka go Nna MoAforika ke Beke ya Dipuisano tsa Aforika e tla tshwarelwang kwa Constitutional Hill kwa Johannesburg go tloga ka la bo 23 go fitlha ka la bo 27 Motsheganong.
tgt_text: Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bangakulandela okuqhubekayo ezingxoxweni futhi babambe iqhaza kuzona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngaphansi kwe-hashtag ethi #PresidentialImbizo.
Inyanga ye-Afrika.

src_text: Kgwedi ya go Keteka go Nna MoAforika ke tšhono ya go godisa tshwaragano ya Aforika le go dira gore dikgaolo tsa yona di nne le tshwaragano e tseneletseng, le go dira gore Aforika nne le maikemisetso a tshwanang.
tgt_text: Umbungazo waminyaka yonke weNyanga ye-Afrika kanye noSuku lwe-Afrika oluzoba ngoLwesithathu mhla zingama-25 kuNhlaba uzogujwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Unyaka Wokudla Okunomsoco: Siqinisa ikhono namandla okuzibamba ziqine ekuhlinzekeni ukudla okunomsoco kanye nokuqinisekisa ukutholakala kokudla okwanele ezwekazini lase-Afrika”.

src_text: Kabinete gakolola mongwe le mongwe gore dikgatlhegelo tsa rona tsa bosetšhaba di golagane le tsepamo, kopano le katlego ya Aforika     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Njengengxenye yenhloso-mbono yesikhathi eside ebekwe ngokucacileyo ku-Ajenda 2063 (ewumhlahlandlela wokuthuthukiswa kwe-Afrika ukuze izuze intutuko yenhlalo-mnotho ebandakanyayo futhi esimeme eminyakeni engama-50), isiqubulo sigxile kulokho abantu base-Afrika abangaba namandla okukufezekisa, ngokugcizelela ikakhulukazi kubantu besifazane, amabhungu namatshitshi kanye nezingane.

src_text: Matshediso     Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa malapeng le balesika ba: Mme Phindile Xaba (53), yo dirileng sebaka le ka maikemisetso mo indasetering ya bobegakgang, mo Aforika Borwa le kwa moseja dirile ka botswapele go tokafatsa naga ya rona.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuyinto esemqoka kakhulu ekuletheni intuthuko njengoba kuholela ekutheni abantu baphile impilo engcono futhi amazwe nawo athole ingenisomali ephakeme futhi engcono.

src_text: Moambasadara Silumko Sokupa (74), yo diretseng Setheo sa Tshireletso ya Puso mo maemong a farolgoaneng mo pakeng telele dira ka maikemisetso mo Tirelongsetšhaba.Moporofesara Francis Wilson (83), motlhankedi wa merero ya ikonomi yo tumileng le mosimolodi wa Yuniti ya Badiri le Dipatlisiso tsa Tlhabololo mo Borwa jwa Aforika     Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.
tgt_text: Umcimbi ophawulekayo nogqamile kule migubho yeNyanga ye-Afrika nguMcimbi WeViki Lezokuxhumana lase-Afrika, ozobanjelwa e-Constitutional Hill eGoli kusukela mhla zingama-23 kuze kube ngumhla zingama-27 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Ngaka Kesavan Naidoo jaaka Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): Tlhabololo ya Setheo kwa Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo (DCoG).

Rre Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomuka jaaka DDG: Tshegetso ya Pusoselegae le Tsamaiso ya Ditsereganyo kwa DCoG..     Rre Risimati Patrick Mathye jaaka DDG: Tsamaiso ya Ditirelo tsa Metsi le Kgeleloleswe kwa Lefapheng la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe (DWS)..     Rre Collin Xolani Zwane jaaka DDG: Taolo, Kobamelo le Tiragatso kwa DWS.
tgt_text: Inyanga ye-Afrika iyithuba lokugqugquzela ubunye nobumbano e-Afrika kanye nokudidiyelwa kwesifunda ngokujulile, kanye nokubophezela i-Afrika kabusha ekushabashekeleni impokophelo efanayo.

src_text: Rre Melanchton Makobe jaaka DDG: Netefaletso ya Bolaodi ya SOC le Tiragatso kwa Lefapheng la Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba     Kabinete dumelane le Ditona mo go thapiweng ga ba ba latelang:.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhumbuza wonke umuntu ukuthi izidingo nezintshisekelo zethu njengezwe zixhumene kakhulu nozinzo, ubumbano kanye nokuphumelela kwe-Afrika     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Rre Bhekuyise Mathews Khenisa jaaka Motlhakedikhuduthamagamogolo (CEO) wa Setheo sa Tlhabololo ya Matlo (HDA).
tgt_text: Amazwi enduduzo IKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi enduduzo emindenini nabangani balaba abalandelayo: UNks Phindile Xaba (53), osebenze embonini yabezindaba isikhathi eside futhi lapho ezuze khona impumelelo enkulu, lapha ekhaya eNingizimu Afrika ngokunjalo futhi nasemazweni angaphandle.

src_text: Mme Joy Keledi Masemola jaaka Motlhankedimogolo wa Ditšhelete kwa HDA..     Ngaka Cornelius Ruiters jaaka CEO wa Lepelle Northern Water.
tgt_text: Usebenze ngokuzikhandla okukhulu ukwenza ngcono izwe lethu.

src_text: Go Itharabologelwa le go Itlhotlhora mo Ditshenyegelong tsa Merwalela.
tgt_text: Imizamo yokutakula nokukhuculula kanye nokwakha kabusha ngemuva kokuhlasela kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete akgotse le go leboga batho botlhe le mekgatlho yotlhe e thusang mo dikgatong tsa go itharabologelwa le go itlhotlhora mo ditshenyegelong tsa merwalela go latela gore mafelo mangwe ka fa nageng gogolwe ke merwalela megolo, segolobogolo mafelo KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izwakalise amazwi ayo okutusa kanye nokubonga kubo bonke abantu kanye nezinhlangano ezibandakanyekayo emizamweni yokutakula nokukhuculula kanye nokwakha kabusha kulandela ukuhlasela kwezikhukhula ezishiye kukhalwa kwezinye izingxenye zezwe, ikakhulukazi KwaZulu-Natali.

src_text: Kabinete lebogile mekgatlho yotlhe e seng ya puso, ya dikereke, ya baagi, ya dikgwebo le eo thusang baagi ka go neela malapa a tlhokang ka ditlhokwa tse di botlhokwa ka go neela dijo, diaparo, dikobo, didirisiwa tsa sesadi tsa fa bomme ba le mo 'kgweding mmogo le diaparo tsa sekolo..     Tikwatikwe ya Ditirelo tsa Botsamaisi jwa Ditiragalo tsa Matlhotlhapelo tswelela go laola ditiro tsotlhe tsa maphata puso tse di ka ga go tswa baagi botlhe ba ba amegileng thuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibonge zonke izinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni, izinhlangano zamabandla ezenkolo, imiphakathi, osomabhizinisi kanye nezinhlangano zosizo ezihlinzeke ngokudla, izingubo zokugqoka, izingubo zokulala, izinsiza/izimpahla zokubuyisa isithunzi kanye nemifaniswano yesikole emindenini ehlwempu ukuze ikwazi ukuhlangabezana nezidingongqangi zayo.

src_text: Batho ba feta ba le 7 000 ba neelwa gape le ditirelo tsa marobalo mo mafelong a itemogetseng ditshenyegelo tse dikgolo mo dikgaolong di le nne tsa KwaZulu-Natal..     Tiro ya go agela malapa a amegileng dintlo mo dinageng tsa puso tse di nopotsweng tsa KwaZulu-Natal tse go nang le kgonagalo ya go fudusetsa baagi bano mo go tsona setse simolotse.
tgt_text: Isikhungo Sikazwelonke Sokuphathwa Kwenhlekelele siyaqhubeka nokudidiyela zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni emizamweni yaso yokuhlinzeka ngezinsiza ezikhombisa isihe nobubele kubantu kuyona yonke imizi ekhahlamezekile.

src_text: Kabinete buseleditse boitlamo jwa puso jwa go tlhokomela ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho le ka go tlhoka lehunelo madi go thusa ba ba amilweng ke merwalela.
tgt_text: Izinsizakalo zokukhoselisa abantu zihlinzekiwe kubantu abangaphezu kwezi-7 000 kwizifunda okuyizona ezikhahlamezeke kakhulu KwaZulu-Natali..     Umsebenzi usuqalile maqondana nokwakhiwa kwezindawo zokuhlala zesikhashana zemindeni ekhahlamezekile ezindaweni zokwakha eziphethwe nguhulumeni ezihlonzwe KwaZulu-Natali ukuze abantu bakwazi ukuthuthelwa kuzona beyohlaliswa kabusha.

src_text: Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Morunimogolo se tlamela ka ditirelo tse dingwe gape tsa go disa maemo ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho le go netefatsa gore madi ano logelwa maano go ya ka thulaganyo ya puso ya go rulaganyetsa tiriso ya matlole..     Tshedimosetso ya Sešweng ya Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuqinisekisile ukuzibophezela kukahulumeni ekuphatheni izimali zokusiza nokutakula abakhahlanyezwe yizikhukhula ngobuhlakani nobuyoninco kanjalo nokusebenzela obala.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging botlhe ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa go itlhokomela gore ba se fetelwe ke COVID-19 mme seno se latela gore dipalopalo tse di rebotsweng di bontshe gore palo ya batho ba ba fetelwang ke mogare ono mmogo le ba ba fetelwang ke malwetse a tlang le mariga ka fa nageng tsweletse go tlhatloga..     Kabinete gakolotse batho botlhe go tswelela go itlhokomela le go tlhokomela batho ba bangwe ka go dira bonnete jwa gore ba tlhapa diatla kgotsa ba di tsikitletsa ka sebolayamegare gangwe le gape, ka go apara dimaseke fa ba le fa teng ga meago, go katogana le batho ba bangwe, go bula matlhabaphefo gore go tsene mowa o phepa mmogo le go tlhabela moento.
tgt_text: UMcwaningimabhuku Jikelele waseNingizimu Afrika uhlinzeka ngensizakalo yokuqapha ngeso lokhozi eyengeziwe futhi ukubekwa kabusha eqhulwini kwezimali kuyahambelana nohlelo lukahulumeni lokwabiwa kwezimali..     Ezakamuva ngeSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Go tlhabela moento santse le yona tsela e di gaisang ya go itlhokomela gore se gatelelwe ke bolwetse jwa COVID-19, go robala kwa bookelong ka ntlha ya yona kgotsa go ya maotwana hunyela.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inxuse bonke abantu abaseNingizimu Afrika ukuba bathathe izinyathelo zokuzivikela ukuze kunqandwe ukusabalala kwe-COVID-19 ngemuva kokuba izibalo zakamuva nje zibonise ukwenyuka okukhulu esilinganisweni sokuthelelana ngesifo kanye nokugula okuhlobene nesikhathi sasebusika lapha ezweni..     IKhabhinethi ikhumbuze bonke abantu ukuba baqhubeke nokuzigada bona uqobo kanye nabanye abantu ngokuhlanza njalo izandla noma ukusebenzisa isibulali-magciwane ezandleni zethu, ukugqoka isifonyo uma usendaweni evalelekile, ukugcina ibanga lokuqhelelana eliphephile, ukuvula amawindi ukuze kungene umoya kanye nokugoma..     Ukugoma kusalokhu kungukuzivikela okungungqa-phambili ukulwisana ne-COVID-19 njengoba kuvimbela ukugula okubi kakhulu, ukulaliswa esibhedlela ngisho nokufa imbala.

src_text: Ga tlhoke le go nna le aterese ya gore nna kae gore kgone go tlhabela moento.
tgt_text: Awudingi ukuthi ube nekheli lasekhaya ukuze ugome.

src_text: Motho mongwe le mongwe yo nang kgotsa yo senang lekwaloitshupo le ene ka kgona go tlhabela moento mo mafelong otlhe a direlang setšhaba ka fa nageng go tlhabela moento ntle le go duelela.
tgt_text: Noma ubani, onomazisi noma ongenawo umazisi, angagoma mahhala kuzona zonke izikhungo zokugoma zikahulumeni ezweni lonkana.

src_text: Re Utlwile go Lekane ka Ditiragalo tsa go Nyatsa Batho ba Merafe Mengwe!.
tgt_text: Nqanda ukucwasana ngokwebala!.

src_text: Kabinete kgalema ka mafoko a bogale ditiragalo tsa mefuta yotlhe tsa go nyatsa batho ba merafe mengwe, re bua fano le ka ditiragalo tse di begilweng sešweng jaana kwa Good Hope Seminary High School le tsa kwa Yunibesiti ya Stellenbosch kwa porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izihlaba zonke izenzo zokucwasa ngokwebala ezweni, kubandakanya nezigameko ezibikiwe esikoleni i-Good Hope Seminary High School kanye naseNyuvesi yase-Stellenbosch eNtshonalanga Kapa.

src_text: Ditiragalo tseno tsa go re tsenya matlho batho di nyatsa dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa motheo wa temokerasi ya naga ya rona tse di buang ka seriti sa batho, go se nne le ditiragalo tsa go nyatsa batho ba merafe mengwe, go se nne le ditiragalo tsa go nyatsa batho ba bong jo bongwe, go phimola baagi keledi ka go tsosolosa seriti sa bona, go lekalekana le go tlotlana..     Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 ke ona sedirisiwa se re se dirisang go fedisa masaledi ditiragalo tsa mo malobeng tsa go re tsenya matlho batho tsa go re kgaoganya le tsa go se re tshware ka go tshwana.
tgt_text: Lezi zenzo ezithunazayo zilwisana namagugu esawathola ngokomthethosisekelo nokuyiwona esathola ngawo izwe lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, abandakanya ukuhloniswa kwesithunzi somuntu, ukungacwasani ngokwebala, ukungacwasani ngokobulili, ubulungiswa bezenhlalakahle, ukulingana kanye nenhlonipho..     UMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996 ungumhlahlandlela wethu esiwusebenzisayo maqondana nokuqeda ukuhlukana okwenyanyekayo kanye nokungabikhona kobulungiswa kwesikhathi esedlule.

src_text: Go ikuelwa mo batsading go ruta bana ba bona go gana nang ya banyana ditiragalo tsa go nyatsa batho ba merafe mengwe mme ba tlotlomatse pharologano ya rona, seno ke karolo ya letsholo la rona le re le tshwaraganetseng la go tsholetsa go aga setšhaba le go nna ngatana le nngwe.
tgt_text: Abazali bayanxuswa ukuba bafundise izingane ukuba zikwenqabe ukucwasana ngokwebala kodwa zamukele ukubumbana yize sihlukahlukene, njengengxenye yomkhankaso wethu oqinile wokukhuthaza ukwakhiwa kwesizwe kanye nokubumbana komphakathi.

src_text: Tla re dirisaneng mmogo go ntshetsa mo pepeneneng ditiragalo tsa go nyatsa batho ba merafe mengwe gongwe le gongwe mo di diriwang jaaka selo se se tlwaelegileng gore go tle go bonagale gore mo nageng ya rona ya temokerasi ditiragalo tsa mothale ono ga di batlege le seng..     Tirisanommogo ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Jeremane.
tgt_text: Asisebenzisaneni ukuze siveze obala ukucwasana ngokwebala noma yikuphi lapho kuthathwa khona njengosikompilo futhi sithumele umyalezo ocacile wokuthi asinayo indawo yokucwasana ngokwebala ezweni lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu..     Ubudlelwano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika – kanye neJalimane.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Leeto la Semmuso le le tsamaileng ka katlego la Moeteledipele wa Puso ya Federeišene ya Rephaboliki ya Jeremane, Motlotlegi Olaf Scholz, go bo jetse nala Puso ya Aforika Borwa ka la bo 24 Motsheganong..     Leeto la Semmuso la Moeteledipele Scholz le diragaditswe ka ntlha ya taletso ya Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa, yo gogang kwa pele letsholo le legolo la go dira gore mo kgaolong le mo maemong boditšhabatšhaba go nne le tirisanommogo e edileng, mmogo le go ngokela dipeeletso tse di tlhokagalang thata.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamukelile Uhambo Olusemthethweni olube yimpumelelo lukaShansela weRiphabhulikhi Yamazwe aseJalimane (i-Federal Republic of Germany), uMhlonishwa u-Olaf Scholz, ehambele lapha eNingizimu Afrika ngoLwesibili, mhla zingama-24 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Gareng ga tse dingwe, baeteledipele bano ka bobedi ba buisane ka ditsela tse ba ka dirisanang mmogo ka tsona mo mererong e jaaka ya motlakase le ya phetogo ya maemo loapi, kgwebisano le dipeeletso mmogo le ka ditsela tsa go samagana le COVID-19 le tlhokego ya tlamelo ka meento.

Ba buisane gape le ka se se diragalang mo kontinenteng ya Aforika le mo dinageng tsa boditšhabatšhaba, mmogo le ka ntwa e runtseng kwa Ukraine le ditlamorago tsa yona mo ikonoming ya dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le mo go se tlhokeng dijo le motlakase..     Jeremane ga se fela naga e leng mo maemong bobedi ka bogolo kgwebisano le naga ya Aforika Borwa, gape mo maemong boraro ka bogolo fa go tla mo dinageng tse di nang le bajanala ba bantsi ba ba ratang go re jela nala na le babeeletsi ba bantsi ba ba beeletsang ka fa nageng bile gape ke modirisanimmogo wa rona mo mererong ya tlhabologo..     Khonferense ya Botlhano e Mabapi le go Fedisa Ditiragalo tsa go Dira Bana Makgoba.
tgt_text: Uhambo Olusemthethweni lukaShansela u-Scholz lwenziwe ngesimemo sikaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa, okunguyena ohola umkhankaso kahulumeni wokuqinisa amaxhama obudlelwano obuhle nezifunda kanye namazwe omhlaba, kanye nokuheha utshalomali oludingeka kakhulu.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go wediwa ga tiro ya Khonferense ya Botlhano e Mabapi le go Fedisa Ditiragalo tsa go Dira Bana Makgoba e neng tshwaretswe kwa Durban go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 20 Motsheganong.
tgt_text: Laba baholi ababili badingide, phakathi kokunye, izindlela zokuthuthukisa ukusebenzisana emikhakheni enjengamandla kagesi kanye nokushintsha kwesimo sezulu, ukuhwebelana kanye notshalomali, kanye nokusabela kwi-COVID-19 kanye nesidingo esikhulu somgomo.

src_text: Bannaleseabe go ralala le lefatshe ba ne ba tsenetse khonferense eno e neng tshwerwe mmogo le Mokgatlho wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Merero ya Badiri (ILO)..     Morago ga gore go buisanwe ka dikgato tse di siameng tse dinaga ka go farologana di di dirisang mmogo le go nopola dikarolo tse di tlhokang go tseelwa dikgato ka bonako gore go fedisiwe ditiragalo tsa go dira bana makgoba mmogo le tsa go dira batho makgoba, go ne ga diriwa boikano jwa ‘Go Tsaya Dikgato ka se Go Dumelanweng ka Sona kwa Durban’ leng se se tla samaganang le ditiragalo tseno tsa go fetola bana makgoba.
tgt_text: Baphinde badlinza kabanzi ngentuthuko ekhona ezwenikazi lase-Afrika kanye nasemazweni omhlaba, kubandakanya nengxabano ese-Ukraine kanye nemithelela yayo eminothweni yamazwe omhlaba kanjalo nokutholakala kokudla kanye namandla kagesi okwanele..     IJalimane ayiyena nje kuphela umlingani wesibili ngobukhulu wokuhwebelana neNingizimu Afrika, kodwa iphinde ibe yisizinda sesithathu esikhulukazi sabavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle, umtshalimali omkhulu kakhulu kanye nomlingani kwezentuthuko..     Ingqungquthela Yesihlanu Yamazwe Omhlaba Wonke maqondana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane.

src_text: Ditiragalo tsa go dira bana makgoba di bontsha ka fao batho mo setšhabeng ba leng setlhogo ka teng go nne seno se baya bana mo kotsing.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukelile ukusongwa ngempumelelo kweNgqungquthela Yesihlanu Yamazwe Omhlaba Wonke maqondana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane ebibanjelwe eThekwini kusukela mhla ziyi-15 kuya kumhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Ditiragalo tseno di tseewa jaaka tsa go bogisa bana jaaka di dira gore bana ba se kgone go ya sekolong le gore ba iponela ditšhono tsa go tlhatlhelelwa.
tgt_text: Ababambiqhaza abavela emhlabeni wonkana bebehambele le ngqungquthela, ebibanjwe ngokubambisana neNhlangano Yabasebenzi Yamazwe Omhlaba..     Ngemuva kokudingida imikhuba emihle yokusebenza eqaliswe ukusetshenziswa amazwe ahlukahlukene kanye nokuhlonza amagebe kanye nezinyathelo ezisheshayo ezidingekayo ukuze kusheshiswe ukuqedwa kwakho kokubili ukusetshenziswa kwezingane kanye nokusebenza ngempoqo, babe sebamukela isiqubulo esithi ‘Durban Call to Action’ ukuze kubhekwane nalesi sihlava esesiyinsakavukela sokusetshenziswa kwezingane.

src_text: Ngwana mongwe le mongwe ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa na le tshwanelo e totobetseng ya gore se jewe ntshu..     Tshwanelo ya thuto ya motheo tsamaisana le Molaotheo wa naga ya rona bile gape go ya ka Molao wa Dikolo wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa, wa 1996 (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1996), “motsadi yo mongwe le yo mongwe jarile maikarabelo go netefatsa gore morutwana yo mongwe le yo mongwe yo mo godisang tsena sekolo go simolola fa le monnye na le dingwaga di le supa go fitlha ngwana yoo konosetsa dithuto tsa gagwe tsa sekolo fa na le dingwaga di le 15 kgotsa fa sena go konosetsa dithuto tsa bofelo tsa mophato wa borobongwe”..     Go ya ka Molao wa Kgodiso ya Bana wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2005), “ga go motho yo letleletsweng go ja bana ntshu, go ba reka gore ba mo direle, go ba solofetsa ditiro kgotsa go ba thapa gore nne makgoba gagwe”     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Ukusetshenziswa kwezingane kumele umphakathi omubi kakhulu futhi kuvulela izingane ezimweni eziyingozi.

src_text: Kopanokgothakgothe ya go Utlwanela Tumelano ya Boditšhabatšhaba e Mabapi le Tshireletso ya Batho Botlhe Gore ba se Nyelediwe ka Lenga la Seloko ke Sepodisi (ICPPED).
tgt_text: Kuhambelana nokuhlukumeza futhi kuvimbela izingane ukuba zithole imfundo kanye namanye amathuba okuzithuthukisa.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tlisa kwa Palamenteng ICPPED gore tumelano eno sekasekiwe le go tseelwa tlhogong ke naga ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Yonke ingane eNingizimu Afrika inelungelo elingenakuphikwa lokuvikelwa emikhubeni yokusetshenziswa ngokuxhashazwa.

src_text: Tumelano eno ke tumelano ya Dinagakopano (UN) e bofang dinaga tsa lefatshe ka bophara mme samagana le ditiragalo tsa go tlola ditshwanelo tsa batho ka go nyelediwa ka lenga la seloko ke sepodisi..     Mo kopanokgothakgotheng eno go tlhalosiwa gore go nyelediwa ke sepodisi ka lenga la seloko go raya gore seno ke tiragalo e tsenyeletsang le ya go tsaya batho ka kgang, go ba tshwara, go ba golega kgotsa tiro ya mofuta mongwe le mongwe e ka dirang gore batho ba ba dirileng tiro ya mothale oo ba ikganetse seo ba se dirileng kgotsa le gona go nna ka marago kgang ya gore ba fitlhile kae batswasetlhabelo..     Fa ntlha eno sena go amogelwa gore ka nna karolo ya melao ya rona, naga ya Aforika Borwa tla tshwanelwa ke gore gangwe le gape morago ga dingwaga di le pedi begele UN gore yona diragatsa jang tumelano eno.

Tumelano eno na le dikgato tse di tshwanetsweng go tsewa go thibela gore ditiragalo tsa go tsenngwa ka lenga la seloko ke sepodisi di se diragadiwe..     Pegelo ya Bone ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa e ka ga Dikgato tsa go Sireletsa le go Tlotlomatsa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.
tgt_text: Ilungelo lokuthola imfundo eyisisekelo libhaliwe kuMthethosisekelo wethu futhi ngokoMthetho Wezikole ZaseNingizimu Afrika, we-1996 (uMthetho wama-84 we-1996), “wonke umzali kufanele enze ukuthi wonke umfundi anesibopho phezu kwakhe aye esikoleni kusukela ngosuku lokuqala lwesikole lonyaka nokufanele lowo mfundi abe neminyaka eyisikhombisa kuze kube wusuku lokugcina lesikole lonyaka nokuyilapho lowo mfundi eyobe eseneminyaka eyi-15 ubudala noma esefunda iBanga lesishiyagalolunye, noma yikuphi okufika kuqala”..     NgokoMthetho Wezingane, wezi-2005 (uMthetho wama-38 wezi-2005), “akekho umuntu ongasebenzisa, athenge noma aqashe ingane enzela ukusetshenziswa kwezingane”     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Mokgatlhong wa Dinagakopano (UN) Pegelo ya Bone ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa e ka ga Dikgato tsa go Sireletsa le go Tlotlomatsa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.
tgt_text: Ukungena Esivumelwaneni Samazwe Omhlaba Sokuvikelwa Kwabo Bonke Abantu Ekunyamalaleni Ngempoqo (i-ICPPED) .

src_text: Lephata la UN le le Sekasekang Dipegelo tsa Paka nngwe le nngwe le tla sekaseka pegelo eno kwa bokhutlhong jono jwa ngwaga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukwethulwa kwe-ICPPED ePhalamende ukuze kucutshungulwe ukungena kweNingizimu Afrika esivumelwaneni.

src_text: Fa sale Aforika Borwa saenela Tumelano ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ya UN, naga eno setse sekasekilwe makgetlo le mararo, mme labofelo fa sekasekiwa ne le ka kgwedi ya Lwetse mo ngwageng wa..     Mo pegelong eno go na le tshedimosetso e ka ga seo se dirilweng go latela ditshitshinyo di le 187 tse go dumelanweng ka tsona tse di dirilweng morago ga gore go sekasekiwe pegelo ya mo ngwageng wa.
tgt_text: Le sivumelwano siyisibopho emhlabeni wonke jikelele seNhlangano Yezizwe Ezihlangene (i-UN) esibhekana nokwephulwa kwamalungelo abantu ngokunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngempoqo..     Isivumelwano sichaza ukunyamalaliswa ngempoqo ukuthi kubandakanye ukuthunjwa, ukuboshwa, ukuvalelwa noma yiluphi uhlobo okungaholela ekutheni umenzi wobubi anqabe ukuvuma noma afihle imbala lapho kukhona khona umgilwa..     Uma sesamukelwe ukuba sifakwe emithethweni yethu, iNingizimu Afrika kuzolindeleka ukuba ibike njalo ngemuva kweminyaka emibili kwi-UN mayelana nokuthi isisebenzisa kanjani isivumelwane lesi.

src_text: Go sekegetswe tsebe tshedimosetso go fitlhetsweng gore ke ya boammaruri go tswa kwa mafapheng a maleba, go tswa kwa ditheong tsa puso tse di tshegetsang temokerasi ya molaotheo, mmogo le go tswa kwa mekgatlhong ya baagi e maleba..     Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tiro e setseng dirilwe mo go diragatseng tseo di tshitshintsweng mmogo le mo go seo se setseng se dirilwe mo dikgaolong tse di santseng di tlhoka go enngwa nokeng.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano sihlinzeka ngezinyathelo zokuvikeleka okumele amazwe angamalungu aso azisebenzise ukuvimbela ukunyamalaliswa ngempoqo kwabantu emazweni awo ngokwehlukana kwawo..     Umbiko Wezwe wesine weNingizimu Afrika maqondana Nokuvikelwa kanye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Abantu.

src_text: Pegelo eno tla re morago ga gore tlhagisiwe kwa kopanong ya UN monongwaga ka kgwedi ya Phatwe nne gone ka phasaladiwang mo phatlhalatseng gore botlhe ba bone.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukwethulwa koMbiko Wezwe wesine maqondana Nokuvikelwa kanye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Abantu eMkhandlwini Wamalungelo Abantu Wenhlangano Yezizwe Ezinhlangene.

src_text: Pholisi ya Ngwaga wa 2022 e ka ga Taolo ya Metsi a Dirisiwang mo Meepong.
tgt_text: Ithimba le-UN Lokubuyekezwa Komhlaba Jikelele Ngezikhathi Ezithile elibizwa ngokuthi yi-UN Universal Periodic Review lizowubuyekeza umbiko ekuhambeni kwesikhathi kulo nyaka.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Pholisi ya Ngwaga wa 2022 e ka ga Taolo ya Metsi a Dirisiwang mo Meepong.
tgt_text: Selokhu yaqala ukuba ngelinye lamazwe asayinayo kwiSivumelwano se-UN Samalungelo Abantu, iNingizimu Afrika isibuyekezwe amahlandla amathathu, nalapho ubuyekezo lokugcina lwenziwa ngoMandulo wezi-..     Umbiko uhlinzeka ngokwazisa kwakamuva maqondana nezincomo eziyi-187 ezavunywayo ohlelweni lokubuyekezwa lowezi-.

src_text: Mo pholising eno go na le dikgato tse di ka tsewang go tlhokomela le go seketsa metsi dira gore ditiro tsa meepo mo ikonoming di tsamaisane le maikarabelo naga go tlamela naga ka metsi a sa kgaleng..     Gare ga ditharabololo tse dingwe tse dintsi tse pholisi eno tlang ka tsona baya mo pepeneneng ntlha e buang ka maikarabelo lephata le lengwe le le lengwe la maphata otlha puso le mararo, gore maikarabelo ona ke eng fa go tla mo metsing a dirisiwang mo meepong.
tgt_text: Ukuphawula nezincomo kwathathwa kwimininingo eqinisekisiwe, ulwazi oluvela eminyangweni efanelekile, izikhungo ezasungulwa ngaphansi kweSahluko sesi-9 soMthethosisekelo kanye nezinhlangano zomphakathi ezifanelekile..     IKhabhinethi ijabule kakhulu ngenqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe ukuqalisa ukusetshenziswa kwezincomo kanye nangalezo zindawo ezisasetshenzwa.

src_text: Dikarolo tse go sisintsweng gore di kwalolwe sešwa di tla rarabolola dikgwetlho tse di tleng di nne teng fa go tshwanetswe go tsewa dikgato kgatlhanong le meepo eo kgotlhelang metsi mme seno se tla dira gore go nne bonolo go duedisa meepo eo kgotlhelang metsi.
tgt_text: Umbiko uzotholakala emphakathini uma usuwethuliwe kwi-UN ngoNcwaba wezi-.

src_text: Pholisi eno tsamaisana le Molao wa Metsi wa Naga wa ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo Yokuphathwa Kwamanzi Asezimayini yowezi-.

src_text: Pegelo e Buang ka Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le ka ga Dithulaganyo tsa Matlole,Tekolo, Tshekatsheko le Boruni jwa Togamaano ya Tsibogelo ya Dikgwetlho tsa Bong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze inqubomgomo Yokuphathwa Kwamanzi Asezimayini yowezi-2022 ukuba iqaliswe ukusebenza.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo e buang ka seo se setseng se dirilwe fa go tla mo go tsennyeng tirisong Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le ka ga Dithulaganyo tsa Matlole, Tekolo, Tshekatsheko le Boruni jwa Togamaano ya Tsibogelo ya Dikgwetlho tsa Bong..     Kabinete lebogile dikgato tse dintsi tse di setseng di weditswe ke mafapha puso le mantsinyana tse di ka ga go dira gore leano leno la go tsamaisa tiro, le mo ngwageng wa 2019 go seleng go ikanngwe gore le tla diragadiwa, kwa bofelong le feletse le le mo molaong..     Ke mafapha le mantsinyana ga jaanong setseng tsentse tirisong dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa dipholisi tse di buang ka matsholo a botlhokwa mo makaleng puso a tobaneng le go samagana le dikgwetlho tse basadi, bašwa le batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi ba tobanang natso.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo ihlinzeka ngezindlela zokuvikela kanye nokulondoloza ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi.

src_text: Kabinete gagamaditse gore mafapha tshwanetse go gagamatsa dikgato tsa ona tsa go ela maemo tlhoko le go tlhagisa dipegelo mabapi le seno, segolobogolo mafapha a iseng tlhagise dipegelo tsa ona.
tgt_text: Yenza kube khona ukuhambelana phakathi kwemisebenzi yezomnotho eyenziwa ezimayini kanye nesibopho sokuhlinzeka ngokusetshenziswa kwamanzi okusimeme ezweni.

src_text: Dipuisano tsa go Tlhabana Botlhale tsa Bašwa go Tlotla Nelson Mandela (NMYD).
tgt_text: Phakathi kokunye ukungenelela, inqubomgomo icacisa ngemisebenzi kanye nezibopho ezikhona ezinhlakeni zontathu zikahulumeni mayelana nezindaba zamanzi asezimayini.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tshwara NMYD ngwaga mongwe le mongwe go simolola mo ngwageng ono.
tgt_text: Izinguquko ezihlongozwayo zizoxazulula izingqinamba zokufakwa konswinyo kulabo abangcolisa imvelo futhi zizokwenza kube lula ukunxenxela ukusetshenziswa komgomo wokuthi lowo ongcolisile akhokhe.

src_text: Dipuisano tseno tsa go bontsha tlotlo di tla tshwarwa go tloga ka la bo 07 go fitlha ka la bo 20 Phukwi.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo isungulwe ngokuhambelana noMthetho Kazwelonke Wamanzi, we-1998 (uMthetho wama-36 we-1998).

src_text: Leno ke Letsholo la Kantoro ya Moporesitente go naya bašwa mo Kontinenteng tšhono ya go buisana le go rutana ka seo se amang matshelo bona.
tgt_text: Umbiko mayelana Nohlakakusebenza oluqondene Nokuhlela Okusabelayo Ezindabeni Zobulili, Ukwabiwa Kwezimali, Ukuhlolwa Kokuqapha kanye Nokucwaningwa Kwamabhuku.

src_text: Dipuisano tseno – tse di tla bong di bua ka naledi ya naga ya rona ya lefatshe bong Moporesitente wa mo malobeng Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – go tla simololwa dipuisano tseno ka go atlhaatlha ntlha ya go nna moeteledipele yo nang le maitshwaro mo kontinenteng ya Aforika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele umbiko wenqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe maqondana nokuqalisa ukusebenza koHlakakusebenza oluqondene Nokuhlela Okusabelayo Ezindabeni Zobulili, Ukwabiwa Kwezimali, Ukuhlolwa Kokuqapha kanye Nokucwaningwa Kwamabhuku.

src_text: Bašwa ba tla neelwa tšhono ya gore mo dipuisanong tsa bona ba bontshane lobebe lwa dingwao le ditso tsa bona.
Letsholo leno le tla gagamatsa gape le botsalano magareng ga bašwa ka go farologana ka fa kontinenteng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyincomile inqubekelaphambili enkulu eyenziwe iningi leminyango kahulumeni ekufakeni ezinhlelweni zayo uhlakakusebenza olwamukelwa ngowezi-2019 ukuze luqale ukusebenza.

src_text: Lefapha la Merero ya Bomme, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi tla re mo nakong e tlang la abelana ka tshedimosetso ka botlalo mabapi le kopano eno.

Pegelo ya Ngwaga Mongwe le Mongwe ya Ngwaga wa 2021/22 e Buang ka Tiro ya go Ela Maemo Tlhoko mo go Diragatseng Tiro ya go Matlafatsa Basadi le ya go Tlisa Tekatekano Magareng ga Batho ba Bong jo bo Farologaneng, mo go Tlhatlheleleng Bašwa mmogo le go Tlotlomatsa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi.
tgt_text: Iminyango eminingi isiqalise ukusebenza izinto eziseqhulwini zenqubomgomo ezizoqondisa izinhlelo zokuhlukaniswa ngemikhakha ezisophe abantu besifazane, intsha kanye nabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Pegelo ya Ngwaga Mongwe le Mongwe ya Ngwaga wa 2021/22 e Buang ka Tiro ya go Ela Maemo Tlhoko mo go Diragatseng Tiro ya go Matlafatsa Basadi le ya go Tlisa Tekatekano Magareng ga Batho ba Bong jo bo Farologaneng, mo go Tlhatlheleleng Bašwa mmogo le go Tlotlomatsa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isinxuse ukuba kube khona ukuqapha okuqinile kanye nokubika, ikakhulukazi kule eminye iminyango ebingakaqali ukubika.

src_text: Pegelo eno sala morago dintlha tse di botlhokwa tse di bontshang gore go na le dikgato tse di tserweng go tlotlomatsa tekatekano mo go thapiweng le kwa tirong mmogo le mo go direng gore ditlhotshwana tseno nne tsona tse di laolang le tse di tsayang karolo mo ditirong tsa mafapha le mo ditirong tsa ditheo tsa puso.
tgt_text: Inkulumo-mpendulwano Yentsha ka-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).

src_text: Pegelo eno kwadilwe go ya ka Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Loga Maano go Rulaganyetsa Tiriso ya Matlole, go Ela Maemo Tlhoko, go Sekaseka Tiro le go Dira Ditiro tsa go Runa leo le sa bolong go amogelwa ke Kabinete mo ngwageng wa     Melaotlhomo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba i-NMYD yenzeke njalo ngonyaka kusuka ngowezi-.

src_text: Molaotlhomo wa Pabalesego le Boitekanelo kwa Tirong (OHS) mo Meepong.
tgt_text: I-NMYD yokuqala ngqa izobanjwa kusukela mhla ziyi-7 kuya mhla zingama-20 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Molaotlhomo wa Pabalesego le Boitekanelo kwa Tirong (OHS) mo Meepong gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona.
tgt_text: Lolu uhlelo oluphethwe yihhovisi likaMongameli elinikeza intsha yaseZwenikazi lethu inkundla yokuxoxisana ngezinkulumo-mpendulwano ezakhayo maqondana nezinkinga ebhekene nazo.

src_text: Maitlhomo molaotlhomo ono ke go tokafatsa pabalesego le boitekanelo jwa batlhankedi ba ba dirang mo meepong, mmogo le go tokafatsa mafelo meepo eno leng mo go ona.
Molaotlhomo ono kwalolola sešwa Molao wa Pabalesego le Boitekanelo mo Meepong wa ngwaga wa 1996 (Molao wa bo 29 wa 1996).
tgt_text: Izinkulumo-mpendulwano – isisekelo sazo sizoba ngaphansi kwegama lengqalabutho yethu eyaziwa umhlaba wonke nowayenguMongameli waphambilini u-Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – zizoqala izingxoxo ezizogxilisa usiko lobuholi obuqotho e-Afrika.

src_text: Dikarolo tsa molao ono tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa, gareng ga tse dingwe, di baya mo pepeneneng tse dingwe tsa dikakanyo tsa Molao ono, di gagamatsa Melawanataolo ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la Pabalesego le Boitekanelo mme le dira bonnete jwa gore tsamaelana le melao ya lefatshe ka bophara ya pabalesego mo meepong..     Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Bosomeleborobedi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Kwalola Sešwa Molaotheo.
tgt_text: Zizonikeza abantu abasha ithuba lokwabelana ngamagugu amasiko abo anothile.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Bosomeleborobedi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Kwalola Sešwa Molaotheo gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona le gore Tona ya Ditirelo tsa Phimolakeledi le tsa Kgopololo ya Batshwariwa, Rre Ronald Lamola ntshe lekwalo la go itsise setšhaba ka dikarolo tsa Molaotheo tse go tshitshinngwang gore di kwalolwe sešwa..     Molaotlhomo ono kwalola sešwa Karolo ya bo 6(1) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 e reng naga ya Aforika Borwa na le dipuo tsa semmuso di le lesomelebongwe mme tsona ke puo ya Sepedi, ya Sesotho, ya Setswana, ya siSwati, ya Tshivenḓa, ya Xitsonga, ya Afrikaans, ya English, ya isiNdebele, ya isiXhosa le ya isiZulu..     Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di nopola Puo ya Diatla (SASL) gore tshwanetse go nna puo ya ka fa nageng ya semmuso ya bo lesomelebobedi mme di ema nokeng dikgato tsa go amogela puo eno le go netefatsa gore ditshwanelo tsa maAforika Borwa otlhe di amogelwa, go sa lebelelwe gore ke batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi jo bo rileng kgotsa jang.
tgt_text: Lolu hlelo luzophinda luqinise ubudlelwano kumuntu nomuntu phakathi kwentsha yasezwenikazi lethu.

src_text: Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo lona ga le bolo go tsaya Puo ya Diatla ya ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa jaaka Puo Beng ba Yona ba Buang kwa Lapeng     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wabantu Besifazane, Intsha, Abantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka uzohlinzeka ngemininingwane yohlelo lwemicimbi ekuhambeni kwesikhathi.

src_text: Beke ya go Keteka Tshireletso ya Bana.
tgt_text: Umbiko Wonyaka Wokuqapha Ukusebenza wezi-2021/2022 maqondana Nokusimamiswa Kwabantu Besifazane kanye Nokulingana Ngokobulili, Ukuthuthukiswa Kwentsha kanye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Abantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka.

src_text: Aforika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya go Keteka Tshireletso ya Bana e tla ketekiwang go simolola ka la bo 29 Motsheganong go fitlha ka la bo 04 Seetebosigo 2022 ka moono yo reng “Tla re sireletseng bana mo pakeng eno ya COVID-19 le go ya go ile fa leroborobo leno le sa tlhole le le teng”..     Mo bekeng eo go tla tsepamisiwa megopolo mo matsapeng a leng teng ka fa nageng a tobaneng poo le naga go ithwala ga bašwa leng seo se gakaditsweng ke paka ya COVID-19 mo re boneng bašwa ka bontsi ba belega mo ngwageng wa..     Kabinete ikuetse gore kgetse ya tsie kgonwa ke go tshwaraganelwa ke batsadi, mekgatlho ya baagi, dikereke le baagi mo metseng go thusa go fokotsa palo e golelang kwa godimo ya go ithwala ga bašwa..     Foramo ya Ikonomi ya Lefatshe (WEF).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele umbiko wonyaka wokuqapha ukusebenza wezi-2021/22 maqondana nokusimamiswa kwabantu besifazane, intsha kanye nabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka.

src_text: Aforika Borwa tla nna le seabe mo go WEF e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka la bo 22 go fitlha ka la bo 26 Motsheganong 2022 kwa Davos-Klosters, Switzerland, mo moono wa teng tla bong le: “Go Dirisana Mmogo, Go Busetsa Maemo go Tshepagala Sekeng”..     Aforika Borwa itse sentle botlhokwa jwa go nna nngwe ya dinaga tse di tlang ka ditharabololo le go bolelela ba bangwe ka maitemogelo rona mo foramong eno ya lefatshe.
tgt_text: Umbiko ulandelela izinkomba ezisemqoka ekukhuthazweni kokulingana, izinga lokuqashwa kanye nobunikazi kanye nokubandakanywa kwalawa maqembu abantu emisebenzini yeminyango kanye nezikhungo eziphethwe nguhulumeni.

src_text: Gore naga ya rona tsenele WEF go tla re tswela mosola thata gore re godise seriti sa naga ya rona mo mererong ya dipeeletso gore ke nngwe ya dinaga mo lefatsheng tse go ka beelediwang mo go tsona, mme re tla itsise dinaga tse dingwe mo lefatsheng gore pono re nang le yona ya dilo tse re batlang go di dira mo isagong ke efe mmogo le go nopola ditlhabololo tse dintšhwa tse re setseng re di dirile ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: Umbiko uhlanganiswe ngokuqhathaniswa nokuhlelwa kwesabiwomali esisabelayo ezindabeni zobulili, ukuqapha, ukulinganisa kanye nohlakakusebenza lokucwaningwa kwamabhuku olwamukelwa yiKhabhinethi ngowezi-     IMithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Bašwa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezempilo Ezimayini kanye Nezokuphepha.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Letsholo la go Keteka Kgwedi ya Bašwa la ngwaga wa 2022 ka moono yo reng: “Go netefatsa gore re nna le ditsela tsa go iphedisa tse di nnelang ruri mmogo le go nna matlhagatlhaga ga bašwa gore bokamoso nne jo bo botoka”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezempilo Ezimayini kanye Nezokuphepha ukuze kutholwe imibono yomphakathi ngawo.

src_text: Letsatsi la semmuso la go Keteka Mosola wa Bašwa le tla ketekiwa kwa porofenseng ya Kapa Botlhaba.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlose ukwenza ngcono ezempilo kanye nezokuphepha kwabasebenzi basezimayini, kubandakanya nendawo lapho imisebenzi yasezimayini yenzelwa khona.

src_text: Monongwaga ke wa bo 46 fa sale barutwana kwa Soweto ba thankgolola mogwanto wa matlho ga dibona ka la bo 16 Seetebosigo 1976 ba gwantela go gapelediwa ke puso ya tlhaolele go ithuta dirutwa tsotlhe tsa bona ka puo ya Afrikaans.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uchibiyela uMthetho wamanje Wezempilo Ezimayini kanye Nezokuphepha, we-1996 (uMthetho wama-29 we-1996).

src_text: Mo go bontsheng tlotlo mo go seo se dirilweng ka Seetebosigo 1976, Kabinete ikuela mo bašweng botlhe ka fa nageng go samagana le botlhokatiro jo bo aparetseng bašwa ka bontsi ka go nna le seabe mo matsholong go ba tlhatlhelela ka kitso le bokgoni a jaaka letsholo la go ithutela tiro le mo tirong mmogo le diphatlhatiro tsa go ithutela tiro..     Puso tlile ka matsholo a emang nokeng dikgato tsa go thapa bašwa mmogo le tsa go tlhola ditiro tsa nakwana.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezibuyekeziwe zihlinzeka, phakathi kokunye, ukucacisa amanye amagama akhona kuMthetho, ziqinisa uhlakakusebenza lokulawula ezempilo kanye nezokuphepha futhi ziluhambelanise nezindlela zokusebenza ezingungqaphambili emazweni omhlaba mayelana nezokuphepha ezimayini..     UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchitshiyelwa KoMthethosisekelo Kweshumi Nesishiyagalombili wezi-2022 .

src_text: Dikgwebo le tsona di rotloediwa gore di thape bašwa ba le bantsinyana ka go tlhola diphatlhatiro tse mo go tsona go thapiwang bašwa..     Lenaneo la kgwedi yotlhe ya Seetebosigo le tla bo le tletse ka meletlo e farologaneng mo go yona go tla bong go na le e ketekang bašwa ba ba dirang bontle thata mo go se ba se dirang, mekete ya go thankgolola Letsholo la go Goga kwa Pele Serodumo sa NYDA mmogo le meletlo mengwe le mentsinyana go ralala le naga e ka ga go thankgolola Setheo sa Naga sa Ditirelo tsa Bašwa..     Tona mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente yo rwesitsweng maikarabelo Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi tla re mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo re itsise ka letsholo leno ka botlalo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchitshiyelwa KoMthethosisekelo Kweshumi Nesishiyagalombili wezi-2022 ukuze kutholwe imibono yomphakathi ngawo kanye nokuthi uNgqongqoshe Wezobulungiswa kanye Nezinsizakalo Zokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo, uMnu Ronald Lamola, angasikhipha isaziso esinemininingwane yesichibiyelo esihlongozwayo kuMthethosisekelo..     UMthethosivivinywa uchibiyela iSigaba 6(1) soMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi YaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996, esazisa ngokuthi izilimi eziyi-11 ezisemthethweni eNingizimu Afrika yiSepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, Siswati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, isiBhunu, isiNgisi, isiNdebele, isiXhosa kanye nesiZulu..     Izichibiyelo zizokwazisa noma zizokwethula uLimi Lwezimpawu LwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASL) njengolimi lwe-12 olusemthethweni lakuleli lizwe futhi zizothuthukisa ukwamukelwa kwalo ngokwamasiko ziphinde ziqinisekise amalungelo alinganayo kubo bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika, kungakhathalekile ukukhubazeka kwabo abaphila nakho.

src_text: Meletlo yotlhe ya bašwa go tla solofelwa gore tsamaelane le dikgato tsa go tila ditshwaetso tsa COVID-.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wemfundo Eyisisekelo usuvele uyayamukela i-SASL njengolimi lwasekhaya     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Samiti e Buang ka Dinaga tse di Laolwang ke Magosi.
tgt_text: Isonto Lokuvikelwa Kwabantwana.

src_text: Puso, ka go dirisana le Ntlo ya Naga ya Magosi, ba tla tsenela Samiti e Buang ka Dinaga tse di Laolwang ke Magosi ka Labotlhano wa la bo 27 le Lamatlhatso wa la bo 28 Motsheganong 2022 go buisana ka dintlha tse di mabapi le gore beng ba dinaga tseo ke bo mang..     Dintlha tseno gape di tsenyeletsa le tsa thulaganyo ya go tsaya naga e laolwang ke magosi mo pusong go neela moagi yo nang le matshwanedi go nna mong wa naga eo, go nne seno se botlhokwa thata mo go matlafatseng baagi ba kwa metseselegae.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izoqala iSonto Likazwelonke Lokuvikelwa Kwabantwana kusukela mhla zingama-29 kuNhlaba kuya mhla zi-4 kuNhlangulana 2022 ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi: “Asivikeleni Abantwana ngesikhathi se-COVID-19 Nangemuva Kwayo”..     Kuleli sonto, kuzogxilwa kakhulu odabeni oluthinta uzwelonke lokukhulelwa kwamatshitshi, okubonakale kudlondlobala ngesikhathi se-COVID-19 lapho kubonakale amatshitshi amaningi ethola izingane ubuthaphuthaphu ngowezi-..     IKhabhinethi inxenxe ukuba kube nomzamo ohlanganyelwe owenziwa ngabazali, izinhlangano zomphakathi, amaqoqo amabandla ahlukene kanye nomphakathi ngobubanzi ukusiza ukuguqula isimo sokudlondlobala kokukhulelwa kwamatshitshi.

src_text: Dikgato tsa go dira gore baagi ba kwa metseselegae nne fela beng ba naga ka lefoko ga di kgapele fela kwa thoko ditshwanelo tsa batho tsa go nna beng ba lefatshe le ba nnang mo go lona mme gape di ba thibela gore le se ba tswele mosola mo go tokafatsheng matshelo bona ka go iponela madinyana     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Inkundla Yezomnotho Womhlaba (i-WEF).

src_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Mme Leanne Manas, motlhankedi yo gasang dikgang tsa lenaneo la thelebišene la dikgang tsa mo mesong la Morning Live mo go SABC, yo apesitsweng tlotla ya Batlhabani ba Naga ya Fora ya go Tlotla Tiro e Tswileng Diatla mo Nageng ke naga ya Fora ka Labobedi, 17 Motsheganong 2022, maitlhomo le go tlotlomatsa matsapa a dirileng mo lephateng la go sala dikgang morago, la bobegakgang le mo maphateng mangwe mantsi a farologaneng go thusa baagi.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ibambe iqhaza kwi-WEF e-Davos-Klosters, e-Switzerland kusukela mhla zingama-22 kuya mhla zingama-26 kuNhlaba 2022, ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi: “Sisebenza Ndawonye, Sibuyisa Ithemba”..     INingizimu Afrika iyalazisa kakhulu ithuba lokuba yingxenye yesisombululo kanye nokwabelana ngezimo zethu esesike sabhekana nazo enkundleni yomhlaba wonke.

src_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: Rre Mpho Moerane, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 52, yo mo malobeng neng le Meyara yo Mogolo wa Teropokgolo ya Johannesburg bile gape le mafolofolo mo mererong ya dipolotiki bile direla baagi ba Johannesburg ka botswapelo.
tgt_text: Ukuba khona kwezwe lethu kwi-WEF kuphinde kube semqoka kakhulu ekukhuliseni isithunzi sethu njengendawo umhlaba wonke ongatshala kuyona izimali, ukwabelana nomhlaba wonke umbono wethu wekusasa kanye nokuqhakambisa intuthuko entsha eyenzeka ezweni lethu.

src_text: Pele ka thapiwa go nna Meyara yo Mogolo ne dira jaaka Leloko la Komiti ya Meyara e samaganang le Merero ya Ditirelo tsa Tikologo le Mafaratlhatlha.
tgt_text: Inyanga Yentsha.

src_text: Ngaka Deborah Fraser, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 56, yo neng le seopedi se se fentseng dikabo di sena palo tsa diopedi tsa mmino wa go rorisa modimo yo mo malobanyaneng Setheo sa Dithuto tsa Boeteledipele jwa Sekeresete se mo tlotlileng ka go mo abela tlotla ya Bongaka mo Mminong wa Dithuto tsa Sedumedi.Ngaka Namane Magau, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 70, yo neng le serutegi se se tlhatlheletsweng bile gape le tokololo e tlotlegang ya Batlhokomedi ba Matlole Boto ya Lekgotla la Naga ya Aforika Borwa la Aids.Rre Mike Schüssler, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 60, yo neng le motlhankedi wa merero ya ikonomi yo tlotlegang mo intasetering eno ya naga ya Aforika Borwa bile neelane ka tshedimosetso e tseneletseng e ka ga maemo ikonomi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa.Rre Jamie Bartlett, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 56, yo fentseng dikabo di sena palo tsa go diragatsa mo seraleng le mo thelebišeneng ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa, yo neng tumile ka leina la gagwe la go diragatsa la Motshameko wa theleibšene wa Isidingo mo neng bediwa Mike O'Reilly le la David Genaro la mo Rhythm City.Kabinete le yona eme ka lefoko la ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa fa romela matshediso kwa pusong le kwa baaging ba naga ya United Arab Emirates (UAE) go latela gore Motlotlegi wa Ntlobogosi Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 73, yo gape neng le Moporesitente wa naga ya UAE thule botala ka tlhogo      Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze Uhlelo Lwenyanga Yentsha yowezi-2022 ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi: “Ukukhuthaza ukuziphilisa okusimeme kanye nokuphikelela kwabantu abasha ukuze babe nekusasa elingcono”.

src_text: Rre Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo mo Botong ya Tlhabololo ya Intaseteri ya go Aga.
tgt_text: Usuku Lwentsha olusemthethweni luzogujelwa eMpumalanga Kapa.

src_text: Rre Shabeer Hamid Khan thapilwe go nna Molaodimogolo wa Diakhaonto mo Setheong sa Naga sa Matlole.
Mme Mendoe Ntswahlana thapilwe go nna Motlhankedimogolo wa Dithendara mo Setheong sa Naga sa Matlole.
tgt_text: Lo nyaka uwunyaka wama-46 wokubungaza izibhelu zabafundi zangomhla ziyi-16 kuNhlangulana 1976 e-Soweto lapho abantu abasha babhikishela khona ukufakwa ngempoqo kwesiBhunu umbuso wobandlululo njengolimi lokufunda nokufundisa.

src_text: Kabinete dumelane ka botlalo le tshweetso ya go thapa batho ba ba latelang ba ba batlang tiro go tswalela ka bona diphatlhatiro mo Botong ya Batlhankedibagolo ba Letlole la Setheo se se Botlhokwa sa Motlakase     Rre Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mme Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.
tgt_text: Ngokuvunguza komoya kaNhlangulana we-1976, iKhabhinethi inxuse intsha yakuleli lizwe ukuba ilwisane nenselelo yokwenyuka kokungasebenzi kwentsha ngokuthi ibambe iqhaza ezinhlelweni ezithuthukisayo ezinjengokufundela umsebenzi kanye nokufundela ukwenza umsebenzi ngaphakathi enkampanini..     Uhulumeni usesungule izinhlelo zokweseka ukuqashwa kwentsha kanye nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi yesikhathi esifushane.

src_text: Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Umnotho .

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tse di itumedisang tsa sešweng tse di dirilweng ka fa nageng tse di samaganeng le go tsosolosa ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele izingenelelo zezwe ezinhle zakamuva ezihlose ukufukula ukukhula komnotho.

src_text: Go ya ka Setheo sa Dipatlisiso tsa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (StatsSA) dipalopalo tsa batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro di fokotsegile go tloga mo go.
tgt_text: Ngokwezibalo zakamuva zabantu abangasebenzi ezibuya kwabeZezibalo eNingizimu Afrika, izinga labantu abangasebenzi lehle kusuka kumaphesenti angama-.
