tgt_text: ISikole Sikahulumeni Kuzwelonke (i-NSG) izosingatha uHlelo lwesithathu Lwesikole Sokufundiswa Ngokuphathwa Komnotho esizofundisa Abaphathi Bezepolitiki eGoli kusuka mhla wama-27 kuNhlangulana kuya kumhla lu-1 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Mo ngwageng yo fetileng wa 2021 thulaganyo eno dirisitswe go tlhatlhoba baduelalekgetho ba feta dimilione di le tharo.
tgt_text: Sizohanjelwa ngoNgqongqoshe base-Côte d'Ivoire; e-South Sudan naseNingizimu Afrika; kanye nabaQondisi-Jikelele abasuka e-Lesotho, e-Zambia, e-Democratic Republic of Congo, e-Tanzania nase-Ghana.

src_text: Go tsenngwa ka nako ditokomane tsa lekgetho ga go thuse fela baduelalekgetho gore ba kgone go obamela molao wa tuelo ya lekgetho, gape go thusa puso gore kgone go diragatsa ditirelo tse maAforika Borwa di tlhokang tota   Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Osodolobha baseNingizimu Afrika, kanye namakomidi osodolobha nesigungu esiphezulu, nabo bazohambela lezi zifundo..     Abaphathi abaphezulu bezepolitiki abasuka emazweni ahlukene balindeleke ukuthi babelane ngemibono kanye nezifundo ezisuselwa ezigamekweni ezehlukene abahlangabezana nazo emsebenzini wabo wansuku zonke.

src_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Moatlhodi Owen Lloyd Rogers go latela gore thapiwe go nna Moatlhodi mo Kgotlatshekelong ya Molaotheo ya Aforika Borwa.Kabinete le yona eme ka lefoko la ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa mo go eletseng Moporesitente wa mo malobeng Thabo Mbeki Letsatsi la Matsalo le le tletseng ka Boitumelo fa tshwara dingwaga di le 80, le le ketikileng ka la bo 18 Seetebosigo.
tgt_text: I-NSG ihlanganisele amalungu eziphathimandla lolu hlelo lonyaka ngowezi-2020, njengengxenye yokweseka ukuzinikela kukahulumeni ekwakheni umbuso onekhono.

src_text: Rre Mbeki ne na le ponelopele ntle e itumedisang fa go tla mo maAforika Borweng otlhe   Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.Bakaedi bao Seng ba Khuduthamaga mo Botong ya Merero ya Difofane tsa Aforika Borwa:Rre Ernest Khosa;Mme Bulelwa Koyana;Rre Surendra Sooklal; leMme Rejoice Edith Phewa..     Ditokololo tsa Kantoro ya Setheo sa Merero ya go Abelana ka Tshedimosetso ya Dikoloto tsa Madi go Reka Dintlo  Mme Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Monnasetulo)  Mme Catharina Maria Van der Sandt  Rre Errol Vincent Magerman  Moatefokate Mandla Dludlu  Rre Matsobane Gabriel Mello   Mme Palesa Mawasha   Mme Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton   Mme Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga   Mme Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; lej.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinto, luhlose ukucijisa iziphathimandla ngaphakathi kwazo zontathu izinhlaka zikahulumeni ngobuholi obuthuthukisiwe kanye nangamakhono okwengamela ukuze zizokwazi ukuphinde zihlolisise izinselele ezibhekene nohulumeni ezicindezela ukubandakanywa kwawo wonke umuntu kanye nokukhula komnotho okusimeme.

src_text: Tshedimosetso ka Bolwetsi jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ezakamuva ngeSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete akgotse batho botlhe ba Aforika Borwa ba ba tlhophileng go enta le go obamela diporotokholo tsotlhe tsa COVID-19 leng se se bakileng gore naga efoge dipalo tse di tlhatlhogang tsa dikgetse tse dintšhwa ka nako ya lekhubu la botlhano la leroborobo..     Fela, ga re tshwanela go itebala gonne COVID-19 sa ntse le teng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lincome bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abaqoke ukuphuma bayogonywa futhi abayithobelayo yonke imigomo ye-COVID-19, osekuholele ekutheni izwe likwazi ukugwema ukukhula kwezigameko ezintsha zokutheleleka kwabantu ngegciwane ehlandleni lesihlanu lobhubhane..     Kepha-ke, akumele neze sidembesele njengoba i-COVID-19 iselokhu ikhona phakathi kwethu.

src_text: Le fa naga sa tswa go phimola melawana e neng saletse ya go apara dimaseke fa re le fa gare ga batho, batho ba ba nang le malwetse mangwe a sa alafegeng le ba ba lwalang ba rotloediwa go tswelela go apara dimaseke.
tgt_text: Nakuba kamuva nje izwe likuqedile ukugqokwa kwezifonyo okuphoqelelekile emphakathini, abantu abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona kanye nalabo abagulayo bayakhuthazwa ukuba baqhubeke nokugqoka isifonyo.

src_text: Re tshwanetse gape go tswelela go tlhapa diatla gongwe go dirisa sebolayaditwatsi, le go katogana le go dira gore mafelo re leng mo go ona tlhabiwe ke phefo..     Moento go ya ka bopaki jwa saense santse le ona o gaisang mo go re sireletseng mo bolwetseng jwa COVID-19 mme Kabinete rotloetsa batho botlhe ba ba sa entiwang gore ba se senye nako mme ba ye go enta mme ba ba entilweng bone ba ye go tlhabela moento wa go tsosolosa ba tlhabileng kwa lefelong le le gaufi nabo la go tlhabela moento ntle le go duelela tirelo eo..     Monkeypox.
tgt_text: Kumele futhi siqhubeke nokugeza izandla noma sizihlanze ngesibulalimagciwane futhi siqinisekise ukuqhelelana ngendlela efanele phakathi kwethu nabanye abantu, futhi siqinisekise ukuthi endaweni okuhleli kuyona abantu kungena umoya ohlanzekile owanele.

src_text: Kabinete reboletswe tshedimosetso e mabapi le bolwetsi jwa Monkeypox ya gore ka fa nageng go setse go fitlhetswe batho ba le babedi ba ba nang le bolwetsi jwa Monkeypox mo nageng go latela gore fa gautshwane go fitlhelwe motho wa bobedi.

Batho bano ba itlhaotse mo setšhabeng mme ba kwa magaeng bona mme go samaganwe le dithulaganyo tsa go gata motlhala batho bao ba ka tswang ba kopane le batho bano go lekola gore ga ba tshwaetsega..     Lefapha la Boitekanelo le Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Malwetse a Tshelanwang ba dirisana le Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Boitekanelo go sekaseka matshosetsi go tshelana ka bolwetse jono ka fa nageng gore tsamaisane le Melawana ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Boitekanelo..     Mogare wa monkeypox ga tshelane bonolo mme gantsi tshelana fa batho ba ka tshwarana go tshwana le go sunana, go tlampurelana gongwe go kgoma dikarolo tsa mmele tse di nang le dintho tsa monkeypox.
tgt_text: Ukugonywa kusalokhu kuyiyona ndlela yokuzivikela ku-COVID-19 eqinisekisiwe ukuthi iyasebenza efakazelwa yisayensi futhi iKhabhinethi liyabakhuthaza bonke abantu abangakagonywa ukuba baphume ngokushesha bayogonywa, kanti ngokunjalo futhi abantu esebegonyiwe nabo kumele baphume bayothola umjovo oweseka futhi ulekele umgomo egazini mahhala esikhungweni sokugoma esiseduze nabo..     Isifo i-Monkeypox.

src_text: Batho ba ba se nang matshwao monkeypox ba ka se ke ba tshela batho ba bangwe ka mogare ono..     Kabinete eletsa batho ba ba itemogelang matshwao letshoroma, matshwao a tshwanang le mokgotlhwane a latelwang ke boswata jo bo nang le metsi go ya kwa maokelong a gaufi gore ba bone thuso le kalafi ka bonako.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithulelwe umbiko wakamuva mayelana nokusabalala kwesifo i-Monkeypox ezweni kulandela ukuqinisekiswa kamuva nje kwesigameko sesibili sokutheleleka komuntu kuleli.

src_text: Matlhotlhapelo thabene ya East London.
tgt_text: Labo bantu abathelelekile bagonqile emakhaya futhi kulandelwa umkhondo wabo bonke abanye abantu abake basondelana nabo ukuze kuhlonzwe futhi kutholwe labo okungenzeka ukuthi nabo bathelelekile..     UMnyango Wezempilo kanye NeSikhungo Sikazwelonke Sezifo Ezithathelwanayo basebenzisana neNhlangano Yezempilo Emhlabeni ukubheka nokuhlola ubungozi bokusabalala nokutheleleka kwabantu ngalesi sifo ezweni ngokuhambisana neMithethonqubo Yezempilo Yamazwe Ngamazwe..     Igciwane le-monkeypox alisabalali kalula futhi lidluliseka kuphela emuva kokusondelana kakhulu kwabantu njengokuqabulana, ukwangana noma ukuthintana namalunga omzimba onezilonda ze-monkeypox.

src_text: Matlhotlhapelo kwa Thabeneng ya Enyobeni kwa East London kwa Kapa Botlhaba ka Latshipi, 26 Seetebosigo 2022 a tsereng matshelo bašwa ba le 21 hutsafaditse naga yotlhe.
tgt_text: Abantu abangenazo izimpawu ze-monkeypox abalidluliseli igciwane kwabanye abantu..     IKhabhinethi liluleke abantu abanezimpawu ezinjengemfiva, kanye nezimpawu ezijwayelekile zomkhuhlane ezilandelwa wukuqubuka okunamabhamuza ukuba baphuthume esikhungweni sezempilo esiseduzane ukuze baxilongwe futhi bathole ukwelashwa kusenesikhathi.

src_text: Ga go bonolo go akanya ka manyaapelo malapa a latlhegetsweng ke bana ka tsela e botlhoko jalo..     Kabinete rometse matshediso go malapa a latlhegetsweng ke ba malapa mme ya leboga botlhe ka tshegetso ya setho e neilweng malapa a mo khutsafalong ka nako eno e boima..     Ke selo se se re tshwenyang gore bana ba bonnye jwa dingwaga tse 13 ba ne ba letleletswe go tsena mo lefelong leo gore ba tle go nwa notagi.
tgt_text: Isibhicongo esenzeke endaweni yokucima ukoma eMonti.

src_text: Re ikuela mo baaging botlhe go nna le seabe ka go dira gore bana ba rona ba babalesege ka dinako tsotlhe..     Bana ba ba nang le dingwaga tse di ka fa tlase ga di le 18 ga ba letlelelwa go tsena mo dithabeneng, dišabining, dibareng le kwa marekisetsong bojalwa.
tgt_text: Isibhicongo esesabekayo esenzeke endaweni yokucima ukoma Enyobeni eMonti eMpumalanga Kapa ngeSonto, mhla zingama-26 kuNhlangulana 2022 esidlule nemiphefumulo yamabhungu namatshitshi angama-21, sishiye izwe lethu lonkana likhungathekile futhi lisosizini.

src_text: Barekisi ba nnotagi ba ba fitlhelwang ba tlola melao eno ba tla latofadiwa ka bosenyi mme ba tseelwa dilaesense tsa bona tsa go rekisa notagi..
tgt_text: Kunzima ngisho ukucabanga nokubona ngamehlo engqondo usizi nobuhlungu obesabekayo obubhekene nemindeni elahlekelwe yizingane zayo ngendlela ebuhlungu kangaka..     IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukudabuka kwalo futhi ladlulisa namazwi enduduzo emindenini elahlekelwe yizingane zayo ezithandayo futhi lizwakalise amazwi okubonga kubo bonke labo abafake isandla ngokulekelela nokuhlinzeka ngosizo emindenini esemanzini kulesi sikhathi esinzima kangaka ebhekene naso..     Kuyinto ekhathazayo ukuthi izingane ezisencane kangaka, ngisho nalezo ezineminyaka yobudala eyi-13 imbala, zivunyeliwe ukuba zingene kule ndawo yokucima ukoma futhi zavunyelwa nokuphuza utshwala.

src_text: Se se Tswileng mo Samiting ya Setlhopha sa Baeteledipele ba Dinaga tse Supa (G7).
tgt_text: Sinxusa imiphakathi ukuba idlale indima yayo ukugcina izingane zethu ziphephile ngaso sonke isikhathi..     Izingane ezineminyaka yobudala engaphansi kweyi-18 azivumelekile ukungena emathaveni, emashibhini, ezinkantini kanye nasemabhodlela-sitolo.

src_text: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa nnile le seabe kwa Samiting ya Baeteledipele ba G7 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Bavaria, Jeremane ka Mosupologo, 27 Sedimonthole.
tgt_text: Abathengisi botshwala abayotholakala bephula noma yimiphi kule mithetho bayobekwa amacala futhi kuhoxiswe nezimvume zabo zokuthengisa utshwala..     Imiphumela Yengqungquthela Yabaholi Beqembu Lamazwe Ayisikhombisa (i-G7).

src_text: Moporesidente – yo nnileng le seabe mo dikopanong tse mo go tsona go buisanweng ka merero ya tlelaemete, motlakase, boitekanelo, go nna teng ga dijo mo lefatsheng le merero ya tekatekano ya bong – ne laleditswe ke moamogelabaeng, Motšhanselara Olaf Scholz..     G7 ke foramo ya sepolotiki ya dipuso e gogwang kwa pele ke naga ya Canada, Fora, Jeremane, Itali, Japane, Borithane le Amerika     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ubebambe iqhaza eNgqungqutheleni Yabaholi Bamazwe e-G7 ebibanjelwe e-Bavaria, kwelaseJalimane ngoMsombuluko mhla zingama-27 kuNhlangulana.

src_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Melao ya Lephata la Molao (LSC).
tgt_text: UMongameli – obambe iqhaza ezigcawini zokusebenza lapho kubhungwe khona ngezindaba eziphathelene nesimo sezulu, amandla kagesi, ezempilo, ukutholakala kokudla okwanele kanye nokulingana ngokobulili – ubemenywe ngumsingathi wengqungquthela uShansela Olaf Scholz..     I-G7 wumbimbi lwezepolitiki olubandakanya ohulumeni bamazwe ahlukahlukene olubandakanya i-Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom kanye ne-United States     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete letleletse gore LSC ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka go sona.
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lwemithethomgomo Yomkhakha Wezomthetho (uHlaka lwe-LSC).

src_text: Maikemisetso melawana eno ke go bebofatsa diphetogo mo lephateng la molao go dira gore ditheo tsa molao di nne le kemedi go ya ka sebopego sa baagi ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukushicilelwa koHlaka lwe-LSC ukuze umphakathi uphawule ngalo.

src_text: Molao ono tla netefatsa gape le gore go dirwa setheo se se tla tlhagisang batlamedi ba ditirelo tsa molao ba ba katisitsweng go utlwagala le ba ba itseng tiro ya bona ka botlalo.
tgt_text: Izinjongo zale mithethomgomo wukuletha uguquko emkhakheni wezomthetho ukuze kube nokumeleka ngendlela efanele kwabantu bonke bakuleli.

src_text: Letsholo la go kwadiwa ga LSC le ne le okametswe ke Lekgotla la Tiro ya Molao, setheo sa semolao se se tlhamilweng go ya ka Karolo ya bo 4 ya Molao wa Tiro ya Molao, wa ngwaga wa 2014 (Molao wa bo 28 wa 2014) mmogo le go kaelwa ke Molao wa Matlafatso ya Maemo Ikonomi Bathobatsho (B-BBEE), wa ngwaga wa 2013 (Molao wa bo 46 wa 2013).
tgt_text: Imithethomgomo izoqinisekisa futhi nokusungulwa kwenhlangano ezokhiqiza abahlinzeki bezinsizakalo zomthetho abaqeqeshwe kahle futhi abawenza ngobunyoninco umsebenzi wabo.

src_text: Molao wa B-BBEE wa 2013 rwesa Tona ya Kgwebisano, Indaseteri le Kgaisano maikarabelo go kwala melao ya tiro e tswileng diatla mo go diragatseng matlafatso ya maemo ikonomi mo bathobantshong mo maphateng a rileng.
tgt_text: Umsebenzi wokwakhiwa koHlaka lwe-LSC bewenganyelwe nguMkhandlu Womsebenzi Wezomthetho, okuyinhlangano esemthethweni esungulwe ngokweSigaba sesi-4 soMthetho Womsebenzi Wezomthetho, wonyaka wezi-2014 (uMthetho wama-28 wonyaka wezi-2014) futhi ngokuholwa nokuqondiswa nguMthetho Wezokufukulwa Nokuhlonyiswa Kwabantu Abamnyama Kwezomnotho (i-B-BBEE), wonyaka wezi-2013 (uMthetho wama-46 wonyaka wezi-2013).

src_text: Ga jaana ditokololo tsa porofešene ya molao ga di na molao o di kaelang mo go samaganeng le go tlhoka tekatekano mo porofešeneng ya molao.
tgt_text: UMthetho we-B-BBEE wonyaka wezi-2013 uhlinzekela ukuthi uNgqongqoshe Wezohwebo, Izimboni Nokuncintisana akhiphe imithethomgomo yenkambiso enhle okumele ilandelwe ekufukulweni nokuhlonyiswa kwabantu abamnyama kwezomnotho emikhakheni ethile ehlosiwe.

src_text: LSC tla phatlaladiwa mo Kaseteng ya Puso matsatsi le 60 go letla gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka go sona..     Dipegelo tse di Rebolwang Gabedi mo Ngwageng tsa Kgatelopele ya Tiro e Dirilweng.
tgt_text: Amalungu omsebenzi wezomthetho njengamanje awanayo imithethomgomo eqondene nalo mkhakha ezowahola futhi iwaqondise ekubhekaneni ngqo nokungalingani okukhona emsebenzini wezomthetho.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dipegelo tse di rebolwang gabedi mo ngwageng tsa kgatelopele ya tiro e dirilweng tsa paka e akaretsang Diphalane 2021 go fitlha Mopitlwe.
tgt_text: UHlaka lwe-LSC lwashicilelwa kuSomqulu Kahulumeni isikhathi esiyizinsuku ezingama-60 ukuze umphakathi ukwazi ukuphawula ngalo..     Imibiko Yenqubekelaphambili Yokusebenza Ekhishwa Kabili Ngonyaka.

src_text: Dipegelo tseno ke karolo ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya Pakagare (MSTF) 2019-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyigunyazile imibiko yenqubekelaphambili yokusebenza ekhishwa kabili ngonyaka yesikhathi esifaka phakathi uMfumfu 2021 kuya kuNdasa.

src_text: MTSF 2019-2024 ke leano la go diragatsa tiro bile gape le disa leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya go dira gore re diragatse Leano la Tlhabololo ya Naga leng Ponelopele ya 2030 e ka ga dilo tse di botlhokwa tse di tshwanetseng go fitlhelelwa mo pusong e busang ga jaanong ya borataro.
tgt_text: Le mibiko iyingxenye yoHlaka Lwamaqhinga Esikhathi Esimaphakathi (i-MTSF) 2019-.

src_text: Dipegelo tseno di bua ka dikarolo tse di botlhokwa di le supa tsa puso leng (1) Phetogo ya ikonomi le go tlhola ditiro; (2) Thuto, bokgoni le boitekanelo; (3) Go tiisa megolo ya go thusa baagi ka ditirelo tsa motheo tse di ikanyegang le tsa boleng; (4) Kgolaganyo ya dibaka, bonno le pusoselegae; (5) Go nna seoposengwe le go babalela baagi; (6) Mmuso o nang le bokgoni o nang le maitsholo a siameng le o tlisang tlhabologo; le (7) Aforika o botoka le lefatshe le le botoka, gammogo le dikgato tsa go tlisa tharabololo tse di tshwanang le tse di tlhalositsweng tsa pusong e busang ga jaanong ya borataro..     Kabinete itumedisitswe ke kgatelopele e dirilweng mo dintlheng tse di neng di beilweng tsa paka e sekasekwang.
tgt_text: I-MTSF 2019-2024 iwuhlelo lokuqalisa umsebenzi kanye nokusebenza kohlaka lokuqapha okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa izinto ezibekwe eqhulwini nguhulumeni wehlandla lokuphatha lesithupha ngaphansi kweNhlosombono yowezi-2030 yoHlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezwe.

src_text: Kabinete gape nopotse le dintlha tse go santseng go saletswe morago mo go tsona ka ntlha ya leroborobo la COVID-19 tse go tlhokwang gore go samaganwe le tsona..     Ditona di tla tshwara dikopano le bobegakgang mo dibekeng tse di tlang go tlhalosa ka botlalo se dipegelo tseno di buang ka sona mmogo le go neelana ka tshedimosetso e tseneletseng ka ga dintlha tse di santseng di tlhoka go gagamadiwa     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: Imibiko ibigxile ezintweni eziyisikhombisa ezibekwe eqhulwini nguhulumeni, okuyilezi (1) Uguquko kwezomnotho nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi; (2) Ezemfundo, amakhono kanye nezempilo; (3) Ukuqiniswa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni nokubhekelelwa komphakathi kangcono ngokuthi kuhlinzekwe izidingongqangi ezithembakele ezitholakala ngendlela efanele ngaso sonke isikhathi futhi ezisezingeni elifanele; (4) Ukudidiyelwa ngendlela efanele kwezindawo okutholakala kuzona ingqalasizinda nezikhungo eziwusizo, izindawo zokuhlaliswa kwabantu kanye nohulumeni basekhaya; (5) Ubumbano lomphakathi kanye nemiphakathi ephephile; (6) Umbuso onekhono lokusebenza ngendlela efanele, olandela inkambiso elungileyo emsebenzini owenzayo futhi othuthukisayo; kanye (7) ne-Afrika nomhlaba ongcono, kanye nezinhlelo zokungenelela zikahulumeni wehlandla lokuphatha lesithupha ezihlobene nalokho..     IKhabhinethi liyamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe imikhakha okwenzeke kuyona inqubekelaphambili emigomweni obekuhloswe ukufinyelela kuyona kulesi sikhathi sokubika esibuyekezwayo.

src_text: Khonferense ya Bathobantsho ba Leng Beng ba Diintaseteri le Beng ba Dikgwebo tse di Gwebang le Dinaga tsa kwa Ntle (BIEC).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyiphawulile futhi naleyo mikhakha edinga ukuthi kube nezinhlelo zokungenelela ukuze kulungiswe inkinga yokubambezeleka okwenzekile ngenxa yokukhahlamezeka okudalwe wubhubhane lwe-COVID-.

src_text: BIEC ya ntlha tla tshwarelwa kwa Tikwatikweng ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Dikhonferense ya Sandton kwa Johannesburg ka Laboraro, 20 Phukwi.

tgt_text: ONgqongqoshe bazobamba izithangami nabezindaba kula maviki ezayo ukuze bakwazi ukwenaba kabanzi ngemibiko yabo ngokwehlukana kwabo futhi bachaze kabanzi nangalezo zindawo lapho kudingeka khona ukuba kuqiniswe isandla kusetshenzwe ngokuzikhandla     Umcimbi ozayo.

src_text: Khonferense eno tshwarwa morago ga gore puso ngwaga ono sa le gale thankgolole Lephata la Kemonokeng ya Bathobantsho ba Leng Beng ba Diintaseteri le Beng ba Dikgwebo tse di Gwebang le Dinaga tsa kwa Ntle, le maitlhomo lona leng go tshegetsa beng ba diintaseteri ba bathobantsho gore ba kgone go rekisetsa mebaraka mentšhwa, le go thusiwa ka ditšhelete tsa dikgwebo tse di gwebang le dinaga tsa kwa ntle mmogo le go thusiwa le ka dirala tsa go bapatsa dikgwebo tsa bona     Molaetsa.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yosozimboni Abamnyama Abathumela Impahla Nemikhiqizo Emazweni Angaphandle (i-BIEC).

src_text: DikakgoloKabinete akgotse le go eleletsa masego: Springboks, ka phenyo e gapileng maikutlo ya motsotso wa bofelo kgatlhanong le Wales ka nako ya motshameko wa ntlha wa meraro ya teko kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la Loftus Versveld kwa Tshwane ka Lamatlhatso, 2 Phukwi.
tgt_text: I-BIEC yokuqala ngqa izobanjelwa e-Sandton International Convention Centre eGoli ngoLwesithathu mhla zingama-20 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Banyana Banyana, ka phenyo ya bona ya dino di le pedi go le nngwe mo motshamekong wa bona wa pulo ya metshameko ya Sejana sa Metshameko ya Kgwele ya Dinao ya Basadi sa Dinaga tsa Aforika kgatlhanong le Nigeria e tshwaretsweng kwa nageng ya Morocco, ka Mosupologo, 4 Phukwi     Go Thapiwa    Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang..     Ngaka Nyameko Barney Pityana jaaka Modulasetilo wa Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Dilothari..     Moatefokate Rory Voller jaaka Mokhomišinara wa khomišene ya Dithoto le Dithata tsa Ditlamo (CIPC).
Motlakase.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse ditsereganyo tse di itsisitsweng ke puso go samagana le mathata motlakase naga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele izingenelelo ezethulwe nguhulumeni ukubhekana nenkinga kagesi ebhekene nezwe.

src_text: Dikgato tseno tsa botlhokwa di tlhagola tsela ya go fokotsa go kgaolwa ga motlakase, go fetola lephata la motlakase le go dira gore setlwaedi sa go tlhaela motlakase nne selo sa mo malobeng.
tgt_text: Lezi zinyathelo ezizohamba ibanga elide ekuhlahleni indlela yokunciphisa ukuncishwa kogesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, ukuletha uguquko emkhakheni kagesi kanye nokuqinisekisa ukutholakala kogesi isikhathi eside.

src_text: Go tshegetsa mafaratlhatlha motlakase le go thusa naga ya rona gore se imelwe ke tlamelo ya motlakase, re tlhoka go fokotsa tiriso ya motlakase ya setšhaba ka dimekawate di le 600 mo dikgweding di le tharo tse di tlang..   Malapa ka nna le seabe mo go somareleng motlakase ka go tima mabone a sa dirisiweng le didiriswa tsa motlakase tse di jang motlakase montsi ka dinako tse motlakase dirisiwang ka bontsi.
tgt_text: Ukuze seseke isizinda sikagesi futhi sisize izwe lethu ngokuthunyelwa kogesi olinganiselwe, sidinga ukunciphisa ukusetshenziswa kogesi njengezwe ngama-600 megawatts ezinyangeni ezintathu ezizayo..  Amakhaya angadlala indima yawo ekongeni ugesi ngokucisha zonke izibani ezingabalulekile kanye nezinto ezisebenzisa ugesi omningi ngezikhathi lapho ugesi usetshenziswa kakhulu khona.

src_text: Dikgwebo di rotloediwa go dirisa thekenoloji e sa diriseng motlakase montsi mo ditirong tsa tsona tsa tlhagiso mmogo le go nna le seabe mo dikgatong tsa go fokotsa tiriso ya motlakase..   Operation Vulindlela.
tgt_text: Amabhizinisi ayagqugquzelwa ukuthi aqale ukusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe obonga ugesi emkhiqizweni yawo futhi azibandakanye emizamweni yokunciphisa ukudingeka kogesi..  Umkhankaso we-Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse kgatelopele e dirilweng ka fa tlase ga Operation Vulindlela ya go tlosa dikgoreletsi mo maphateng motlakase mafaratlhatlha ditlhaeletsano, le metsi le bojanala mo go tsosolosenga ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele inqubekelaphambili eyenziwe emkhankasweni we-Operation Vulindlela wokususa zonke izihibe emikhakheni yezamandla, owezokuxhumana, nowamanzi kanye nezokuvakasha ngenhloso yokuvuselela umnotho.

src_text: Go fitlheletswe diphetogo tsa ikonomi di le robongwe go tswa mo go di le 26, mme mo diphetogong di le 11 go na le kgatelopele e namatshang.
tgt_text: Izinguquko kwizakhiwo eziyisishiyagalolunye kwezingama-26 sezikhona, neziyi-11 nazo ziqhubekela phambili kahle kakhulu.

src_text: Dikatlego di akaretsa go oketsa palo ya dilaesense tsa tlhagiso e golaganeng le phatlalatso, go fetolelwa ga Bothati jwa Maemelakepe Bosetšhaba Transnet go nna setlamo se se ikemetseng, go gololwa ga lenane le le sekasekilweng la dikgono tsa botlhokwa le tsenyotirisong ya tsamaiso ya e-Visa mo dinageng di le 14, go akarediwa mebaraka megolo mentšhwa ya bajanala tshwana le China, India, Kenya le Nigeria..   Go Bogisiwa le go Bolawa ga Batho ba Bomme (GBVF).
tgt_text: Ukuphumelela kwalokhu kubandakanya ukwenyusa isilinganiso sokukhishwa kwemvume yokuphehlwa kogesi ovuselelekayo, ukuguqulwa kwe-Transnet National Ports Authority ibe yinkampani, ukukhishwa kohlu olubuyekeziwe lwamakhono abucayi kanye nokuqaliswa kohlelokusebenza lwe-e-Visa kumazwe ayi-14, kubandakanya nezimakethe zabavakashi ezinkulukazi ezintsha okuyi-China, i-India, i-Kenya ne-Nigeria..  Udlame Olubhekiswe Kwabobulili Obuthile Nokubulawa Kwabesifazane (i-GBVF).

src_text: Kabinete gagamaditswe tota ke ditiragalo tse di setlhogo tsa mo malobeng tsa go betelelwa ga basadi ba le robedi kwa Krugersdorp, kwa Gauteng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lizwakalise intukuthelo ngokudlwengulwa okunesihluku kwakamuva kwabesifazane abayisishiyagalombili e-Krugersdorp e-Gauteng.

src_text: Ditiragatso tseno tse di bosula le tsa go bogisa batho ba bomme di nyatsa botho ba rona.
tgt_text: Lezi zenzo ezimbi nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane kudicilela phansi isithunzi sethu emphakathini.

src_text: Kabinete akgotse gape le Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa ka go tshwara ka bonako babelaelwa ba le mmalwa malebana le tiragalo eno e setlhogo..     Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go dirisana le sepodisi ka go ba loma tsebe gongwe go ba begela ka ditiragalo tse di belaetsang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lancoma uPhiko Lwamaphoyisa eNingizimu Afrika ngokusheshe abophe abasolwa abaningana abasolwa ngalo bugebengu obunyantisayo..  IKhabhinethi linxuse imiphakathi ukuthi isebenzisane nabomthetho ngokunikezela ngolwazi noma ngokubika izenzo ezisolisayo.

src_text: Fa re dira mmogo, re ka dira gore mo metseng re tswang kwa go yona basadi le bana ba rona ba nne ba babalesegile..     MoAforika Borwa mongwe le mongwe na le maikarabelo go tsaya dikgato tsa molao kgatlhanong le ditlhokotsebe.
tgt_text: Ngokusebenza ngokubambisana, singenza imiphakathi yethi iphephe kubantu besifazane nasezinganeni..  Wonke umuntu waseNingizimu Afrika unomsebenzi wokulwa nababhebhezeli bodlame ngokulandela umthetho.

src_text: Bega ditiragalo tsotlhe tse di amanang le GBVF kwa seteišeneng sa mapodisi sa kgaolo o nnang kwa go yona gongwe letsetse nomoro ya mahala ya Crime Stop: mo go 08600 10111, gongwe letsetse Tikwatikwe ya Bosetšhaba ya go Lwantshana le GBVF: mog go 0800 428 428 gongwe letsetse Mogala wa Thuso ya go Lwantshana le go Bogisiwa ga Batho ba Bomme: mo go 0800 150. .
tgt_text: Bika zonke izigameko ezihlobene ne-GBVF esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze nawe noma ushayele inombolo yokunqanda ubugebengu ye-Crime Stop ku: 0860 01 0111, isikhungo i-National GBVF Command Centre ku: 0800 428 428 noma iNombolo Yosizo Yokunqandwa Kodlame Olubhekiswe Kubulili Obuthile ku: 0800 150. .

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi.
tgt_text: INyanga Yabesifazane.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi ya ngwaga le ngwaga ka Phatwe tlotla basadi ba ba nnileng le seabe mo kgaratlhong ya kgololesego le basadi botlhe mo setšhabeng sa rona..   Kgwedi ya Basadi monongwaga ketekwa ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Ditshwanelo le Maatlafatso ya Basadi mo Ikonoming le mo Setšhabeng: Re aga Botoka go Tokafatsa go Tsosologa ga Basadi”..   Basadi ba feta 20 000 ba ba gwantetseng kwa Union Buildings kwa Pretoria ka la bo 9 Phatwe 1956 ba akgetse mo go netefatseng gore tekatekano ya bong le maatlafatso di tswelela go nna ditlapele tse botlhokwa mo Aforika Borweng wa temokerasi.
tgt_text: INyanga Yabesifazane yaminyaka yonke ngoNcwaba ibungaza abesifazane ababa negalelo emzabalazweni wenkululeko nabobonke abesifazane emphakathini wakithi..  Kulo nyaka iNyanga Yabesifazane ibungazwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Amalungelo Enhlalo-mnotho Nokuthuthukiswa Kwabesifazane: Sakha Kabusha Ukuthuthukisa Amandla Abesifazane”..  Abesifazane abangaphezu kwezi-20 000 abamashela eZindlini Zombuso ePitoli mhla we-9 kuNcwaba 1956 baba negalelo ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ukulingana ngokobulili nokunithuthukiswa kuhlala kuseqhulwini eNingizimu Afrika yentando yeningi labantu.

src_text: Dikgato tsa bona tsa bopelokgale di rotloeditse basadi ka kakaretso go tsaya manno a ba siametseng mo Palamenteng, mo pusong le mo setšhabeng, mme re tswelela go agelela mo ditswelelopeleng tseno fa sale re bona kgololesego ka.
tgt_text: Isibindi sabo sagqugquzela abanye besifazane jikelele ukuthi nabo bathathe indawo yabo ePhalamende, kuhulumeni nasemphakathini, futhi siyaqhubeka nokwakhela phezu kwale ntuthuko kusukela sazuza inkululeko ngowe-.

src_text: Segopotso sa Marikana.
tgt_text: Isikhumbuzo sase-Marikana.

src_text: Ka Labobedi, 16 Phatwe 2022, puso tshwaragane le naga yotlhe go ikgopotsa matlhotlhapelo a diragetseng kwa Marikana kwa Bokone Bophirima ka ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: NgoLwesibili, mhla we-16 kuNcwaba 2022, uhulumeni uhlanganyele nezwe lonkana ekukhumbuleni isibhicongo esenzeka e-Marikana eNyakatho Ntshonalanga ngowezi-.

src_text: Kutlobotlhoko e utlwilweng ke badiri, bamalapa bona le setšhaba ka kakaretso tla nna le mo hisetoring ya rona..   Lenaneo la Ntšhwafatso ya Marikana le tsentswe tirisong go aga sešwa le go dira gore go nne le seemo se se kgontshang go tokafatsa matshelo baagi ba Marikana.
tgt_text: Ubuhlungu obazwiwa ngabasebenzi, imindeni yabo kanye nesizwe sonke buzohlale buqoshiwe emlandweni wethu..  UHlelo Lokwakha Kabusha i-Marikana seluqaliwe ukuze kuzokwakhiwa kabusha futhi kwenziwe isimondawo esivumela ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zomphakathi wase-Marikana.

src_text: Ngogola puso duetse R176 milione le tlhatswadiatla ya malapa batswasetlhabelo mme go solofetswe gore dikgetse tse di setseng ga jaana tse di mo dikgatong tsa semolao di konosediwe kwa bokhutlong jwa Phatwe.
tgt_text: Ngonyaka owedlule uhulumeni wakhokha izigidi eziyi-R176 njengesinxephezelo emindenini yabagilwa futhi amacala asasele asaqulwa kulindeleke ukuthi aphothulwe uma kuphela uNcwaba ngowezi-.

src_text: Go neetswe batlholagadi ba Marikana matlo le mmalwa a ntšhwafaditsweng le a rekilweng mme mangwe tla konosediwa monongwaga.
tgt_text: Izindlu eziningi ezilungisiwe noma ezintsha zidluliselwe kubafelokazi base-Marikana kanti ezinye zizoqedelwa kulo nyaka.

src_text: Porojeke ya matlo ya R700 milione tla dira gore badiri ba meepo ba tlamelwe ka matlo a nang le seriti.
tgt_text: Umklamo wokwakhiwa kwezindlu wezigidi ezingama-R700 uzoholela ekuboneni abasebenzi basezimayini bethola izindlu ezisezingeni elihle.

src_text: Go tlamelwa ka mafaratlhatlha botlhokwa loago go tokafatsa seemo sa botshelo sa baagi ba kwa meepong.
tgt_text: Ingqalasizinda ebucayi kwezenhlalo iyahlinzekwa ukwenza ngcono izimo zokuhlala emiphakathini yasezimayini..  Imbizo kaMongameli yoHlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezifunda (i-DDM) e-Gauteng.

src_text: Imbizo ya Moporesidente e Tshwaretsweng kwa Gauteng e Buang ka Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo mo Dikgaolong (DDM).
tgt_text: Kulandela impumelelo yeZimbizo zikaMongameli ezintathu ze-DDM ebezibanjwe eNyakatho Ntshonalanga, eFreyistata naseMpumalanga, uMasipala Wesifunda i-Sedibeng e-Gauteng usingathe imbizo yesine ngoLwesihlanu, mhla we-12 kuNcwaba..  Ngaphansi kwesiqibulo eithi: “Masingashiyi muntu ngemuva”, uMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa uhole ithimba lezikhulu eziphezulu kuzwelonke, kwisifundazwe kanye nakohulumeni basekhaya.

src_text: Go latela katlego ya di-Imbizo tsa Moporesidente di le tharo tse di neng di tshwaretswe kwa Bokone Bophirima, Foreisetata le Mpumalanga, ka tatelano ya tsona, Lekgotlatoropo la Kgaolo la Sedibeng kwa Gauteng le ne la amogela legato la bone ka Labotlhano, 12 Phatwe..   Ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Se tlogele ope kwa morago”, Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne eteletse pele baemedi ba batlhankedibagolwane go tswa kwa pusong ya bosetšhaba, ya porofense le ya selegae.
tgt_text: Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokwehlukahlukana kwabo banxenxwa ukuba basebenze ngokubambisana ukulwa namazinga akhulayo obubha kanye nobuphofu okudalwa izinselele zezimo zomnotho..  ISifunda i-Sedibeng senze inqubekelaphambili ekuqalisweni kohlelo lwe-Vaal River Special Economic Zone (i-SEZ), oluthembisa kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni kwezimboni zesifunda, zesifundazwe kanye nasezweni lonkana.

src_text: MaAforika Borwa go tswa kwa maphateng a farologaneng ne rotloediwa go dira mmogo kgatlhanong le seelo se se golang sa lehuma le khumanego tse di bakwang ke maemo a gwetlhang ikonomi..   Kgaolo ya Sedibeng nnile le tswelelopele ka go dirisa Kgaolo ya Ikonomi e Kgethegileng ya Vaal River (SEZ) e nang le bokgoni jwa go fetolela kgaolo eo, porofense le naga go nna ya madirelo gape.
tgt_text: I-Vaal River SEZ ihlele ukubandakanya le mikhakha ebucayi elandelayo: iDolobha Elisha Lobuchwepheshe Besimanje e-Vaal River; Isiphehlimandla Esiphehla Ugesi Ngamanzi Nangomoya; isizinda esikhiqiza insangu; ukuthuthwa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo; idolobha elizungeze isikhumulo sezindiza; isikhumulo sezindiza esincane; ukuthuthwa kwempahla ngezindiza kanye nokuvuselelwa komkhakha okhiqiza insimbi.

src_text: Maikaelelo Vaal River SEZ ke go amogela maphata a latelang botlhokwa: Vaal River Smart City ntšhwa, Kutla ya Green Hydrogen Innovation; kutla ya motekwane/khanabisi; tsamaiso ya dithoto tsa temothuo (agro-logistics); eroteropolisi; boemelafofanepotlana; thomelothoto ka difofane le lephata le le tsosolositsweng la tlhagiso ya tshipi.

tgt_text: INgqungquthela kaMongameli Yomkhakha Wezenhlalo.

src_text: Samiti ya Moporesidente e ka ga Lephata la go tswa Baagi Thuso.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela kaMongameli Yomkhakha Wezenhlalo ebibanjwe Ekurhuleni, e-Gauteng kusuka mhla we-4 kuya mhla we-5 kuNcwaba 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sikhuthaza Ukubumbana Kwezenhlalo Ukuvumela Ukubamba Iqhaza kwiNhlalo-mnotho Emiphakathini”, iqoqele ndawonye ababambiqhaza ababuya kwizifunda ezehlukene ukuthi basebenze nohulumeni ukubhekana nezinselele zenhlalo-mnotho kanye nokunxenxa izinsiza zomphakathi, phakathi kwezinye izinjongo..  Ingqungquthela ibheke imibiko yezinkulumo-ngxoxo yezifundazwe eziyisishiyagalolunye kwizinselele lezi zifundazwe ezibhekene nazo, okufaka phakathi ukufinyelela kuxhaso-mali, izinkinga zokulawula, ukuguqulwa komkhakha wezenhlalo ngokombono wokuqinisa ubudlelwano phakathi kukahulumeni nemiphakathi ukuze kuzobhekanwa nezinselele ezihlobene nobubha, ukungalingani kanye nokuntuleka kwemisebenzi..  IKhabhinethi linxuse izinhlangano zomphakathi nezakhamuzi ukuthi badlale indima yabo ebonakalayo ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi sakha ikusasa elingcono, njengoba kucatshangiwe kuHlelo Lwentuthuko Lukazwelonke: NgokoMbono wezi-  Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Samiti ya Moporesidente e ka ga Lephata la go tswa Baagi Thuso e neng tshwaretswe kwa Ekurhuleni, Gauteng go tloga ka la bo 4 go fitlha ka la bo 5 Phatwe 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Go Diragatsa Dikgato tsa go Tshwaraganya Setšhaba go Dira gore Baagi ba nne le Seabe mo Ditiragalong tsa go tswa Baagi Thuso tse di Nang le Seabe mo Ikonoming” kopantse batho botlhe ba ba amegang go tswa kwa dikhutlong tsotlhe tsa naga tse di nang le seabe mo mererong ya mothale ono, gore ba tle go dirisana mmogo le puso go samagana le dikgwetlho tsa ikonomi le tsa baagi mme gareng ga maikemisetso mangwe mantsi, le go batlela mekgatlho ya go ema baagi nokeng didirisiwa tsotlhe tse di tlhokang go thusa baagi..     Samiti sekasekane le dipegelo tsa dipuisano go tswa kwa diporofenseng di le robongwe malebana le dikgwetlho tsa tsona, tse di akareditseng tlamelo ya matlole, matsapa melawanataolo, go fetola lekala la go tswa baagi thuso ka maikaelelo go dira gore go nne le tirisanommogo magareng ga puso le mekgatlo ya baagi go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di amanang le lehuma, go tlhoka tekatekano le botlhokatiro..   Kabinete ikuetse kwa mekgatlhong ya baagi le mo baaging go nna le seabe se se tlhaga go netefatsa gore re aga isago e botoka, jaaka go elediwa mo Leanong la Tlhabololo ya Naga: Mo ponelopeleng ya   Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: UHlelo-kusebenza Lwezimboni Zamasiko Nobuciko.

src_text: Leano le Legolo la Intaseteri ya Merero ya Setso le ya Boitlhamedi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze uHlelo-kusebenza Lwezimboni Zamasiko Nobuciko ukuthi luqaliswe ukusebenza.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Leano le Legolo la Intaseteri ya Merero ya Setso le ya Boitlhamedi gore tsenngwe tirisong.
tgt_text: Lolu hlelo-kusebenza lugxile kubuciko obubonakalayo; imisebenzi yezandla nemiklamo; ubuciko obulalelwayo nobubukwayo kanye nobuciko obenziwa ngekhompyutha; izinsizakalo zokuklama nobuciko; ukudlala nokubungaza, kufaka phakathi umculo, ukuxhumana ngokubhaliwe nokushicilelwe phansi..  Uhlelo-kusebenza luzongenelela kule mikhakha ekwakheni umkhakha omusha oguqukile ozokwaziwa emhlabeni jikelele futhi uncintisane ezingeni.

src_text: Leano leno le tsepamisitse mogopolo mo tirong ntle ya ditshwantsho le dibidio; ya go bopa le go betla; ya dikgaso tse di reediwang le tse di bogelwang mmogo le ya metlotlo; ya ditirelo tsa mebetlo le tsa boitlhamedi; ya go diragatsa le ya go keteka, go akarediwa le ya mmino, ya go phasalatsa le ya dikgatiso..   Leano leno le tla tswela maphata ano mosola mo go direng gore re nne le lekala le le fetogileng le le kgonang go itlhamela le go itshimololela dilo le le tla tlhomphiwang mo lefatsheng le go gaisana le mangwe mo lekaleng leno.
tgt_text: Luzosebenzela imboni yobuciko eNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ikwazi ukufinyelela ezimakethe zakuleli nasemhlabeni jikelele..  UHlaka Lwenqubomgomo Olubuyekeziwe Lokuboleka KoMasipala Nezimo Eziphuthumayo Zemali.

src_text: Le tla tswela mosola intaseteri ya boitlhamedi ya Aforika Borwa gore kgone go fitlhelela mebaraka ya ka fa nageng le ya dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libuyekeze ukuchitshiyelwa koHlaka lwenqubomgomo yamanje Yokuboleka Komasipala Nezimo eziphuthumayo Zemali.
Izichibiyelo lezi zibhekele kwisahluko sokuboleka salolu hlaka.

src_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Ntšhwafaditsweng la Pholisi ya Madi Dikadimo tsa Dimasepala le go Samagana le Merero ya Tshoganyetso.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezichibiyelo eziphakanyisiwe ngokwethula isikhathi eside sokuboleka ukuze sizohambisana nesikhathi sokusebenza kwempahla esuke ibolekwa futhi ikhokhelwa nemali.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Ntšhwafaditsweng la Pholisi ya Madi Dikadimo tsa Dimasepala le go Samagana le Merero ya Tshoganyetso.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zibuye zicacise umsebenzi wezikhungo zokuthuthukiswa kwezimali endimeni yokweboleka yomasipala.

src_text: Dikarolo tseno tota di mo karolong ya madi dikadimo mo leanong leno.
tgt_text: ISahluko sama-230 soMthethosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996 unika amandla omasipala ukuthi baboleke imali ukuze bathole imali yokuqalisa ukusebenza noma ukukhokhela izindleko ezikhona.

src_text: Mo dikarolong tseno, go tshitshintswe gore go atisewe paka ya go duelela madi a adimilweng gore tsamaelana le paka ya tse dingwe tsa dithoto tse di rekilweng ka tšhelete eo.
tgt_text: Uhlaka lokuqala lwagunyazwa yiKhabhinethi ngowezi-2000 ukuhlahlela indlela iSahluko se-6 nese-13 soMthetho Wezezimali Komasipala, wezi-2003 (Umthetho wama-56 wezi-2003).

src_text: Dikarolo tseno gape di tlhalosa seabe sa ditheo tsa ditšhelete tsa tlhabololo mo go adimeng dimasepala matlole.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezigunyaziwe zihlose ukukhuthaza ababolekisi abaningi ezimakethe zomasipala kodwa zibe ziqhubeka nokugcina izimiso ezingumongo eziyisisekelo sokuboleka komasipala..  Ukukhishwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kwekhalenda ukuze lizoshicilelwa lezibalo zobugebengu zekota zangonyaka wezimali wezi-2022/.

src_text: Karolo ya bo 230 ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 naya dimasepala dithata tsa go adima tšhelete ya ditshenyegelo tsa tsona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukukhishwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kwekhalenda okuphakanyisiwe ukuze lizoshicilelwa lezibalo zobugebengu zekota zangonyaka wezimali wezi-2022/.

src_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la ntlhantlha le amogetswe ke Kabinete ka ngwaga wa 2000 go kaela Kgaolo ya bo 6 le ya bo 13 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala, wa ngwaga wa 2003 (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukukhishwa kwezibalo zobugebengu zekota.

src_text: Maitlhomo dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa ke go dira gore baadimi ba bangwe ba bantsinyana mo mebasepaleng ba bone merokotso fa ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe di tswelela go se setise dintlha tse di botlhokwa tsa dikadimo tsa dimasepala..   Khalentara ya go Phasalatsa Pele ga Nako Dipalopalo tsa Bosenyi tse di Rekotilweng tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe mo Ngwageng wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.
tgt_text: Lokhu kwenziwe ukuze kuzoshintshwa izikhathi zokukhishwa kwezibalo zobugebengu zonyaka ezedlule zezwe.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Khalentara ya go Phasalatsa Pele ga Nako Dipalopalo tsa Bosenyi tse di Rekotilweng tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe mo Ngwageng wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.
tgt_text: Ikhalenda eliphakanyisiwe lezibalo zobugebengu nguNcwaba 2022 ukuthi kukhishwe elekota yokuqala bese kuthi ngoLwezi 2022 kukhishwe elekota yesibili.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa kotara nngwe le nngwe di ka phasaladiwa.
tgt_text: Izibalo zobugebengu zekota yesithathu nekota yesine zizokhishwa ngoNhlolanja nangoNhlaba ngowezi-2023 ngokulandelana..  Ukuphela kweSimo Senhlekelele Kuzwelonke (i-NSoD).

src_text: Seno ke go fetola nako gore se tshwane le ya mo ngwageng o fetileng ya go phasalatsa dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa naga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukuphela kweSimo Senhlekelele Kuzwelonke (i-NSoD) esamenyezelwa emva kwezikhukhula ezadala umonakalo eMpumalanga Kapa naKwaZulu Natali..  I-NSoD iphele mhla we-18 kuNcwaba 2022 kulandela ukwelulwa mhla we-18 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Nako e tshitshintsweng ya go phasalatsa dipalopalo tsa bosenyi pele ga nako ke Phatwe 2022 malebana le kotara ya ntlha le Ngwanaitseele 2022 malebana le kotara ya bobedi.
tgt_text: Ukwelulwa kwakungenxa yesidingo sokuqhubeka ngokwengeza izinyathelo eziphuthumayo ezikhona ezazithathwe yizinhlaka zikahulumeni ukuqeda nokubhekana nomphumela odalwe isimo esibi sezulu ezifundazweni ezithintekayo..  IKhabhinethi livumile ukuthi izimo zamanje azisafanele izinyathelo ezinqala njengezinhlaka zikahulumeni, umkhakha ozimele kanye nomphakathi sizoqhubeka siqinisekise usizo, ukuvuselela kanye nokwakha kabusha okuqhubekayo  Imithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa kotara ya boraro le ya bone di tla phasaladiwa ka Tlhakole le Motsheganong 2023, ka tatelano ya tsona..   Go Khutlisa Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Matlhotlhapelo (NSoD).
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ukubhaliswa Komhlaba wezi-.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse kgato ya go khutlisa Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Matlhotlhapelo (NSoD) jaaka ne ya tsenngwa tirisong morago ga merwalela e sentseng thata kwa Kapa Botlhaba le KwaZulu-Natal..   NSoD khutlile ka la bo 18 Phatwe 2022 go latela gore atolosediwe nako ka la bo 18 Phukwi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ukubhaliswa Komhlaba wezi-2020 ePhalamende ukuze ucutshungulwe.

src_text: Go atolosediwa nako gono ne le ka ntlha ya fa go ne go santse go na le tlhokagalo ya gore go tswelele go tshegetsa dikgato tse di leng teng tsa go samagana le ditiragalo tse di diragaditsweng ke dikarolo tsa puso go fokotsa le go samagana le ditlamorago tsa ditiragalo tsa ditshenyegelo tse dikgolo ka ntlha ya maemo bosa kwa diporofenseng tse di amegileng..   Kabinete dumelane gore maemo ga jaana ga sa tlhole tlhoka gore go nne le dikgato tse di kgethegileng ka ntlha ya fa dikarolo tsa puso, lephata la poraefete le baagi ba tla kgona go netefatsa gore ba tsweletsa dikgato tsa go thusa, go busetsa sekeng le go aga sešwa   Melaotlhomo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lagunyaza lo Mthethosivivinywa ngoNhlangulana wezi-2020 ukuthi kuxoxisanwe nomphakathi ngawo.

src_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa go Kwadisa Makwalo Bodulo wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezethuliwe zizobonisa ubunikazi bomhlaba obufakwe ngokomthetho kwiSahluko sama-25(6) soMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika we-.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa go Kwadisa Makwalo Bodulo wa ngwaga wa 2020 ka romelwa kwa Palamenteng gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlinzeka ngokuqoqwa kwemininingwane ngokobuhlanga, ubulili, ubuzwe kanye nokuba isakhamuzi kwalabo abanamalungelo omhlaba eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete ka Seetebosigo 2020 ne ya letlelela gore molaotlhomo ono ka romelwa lekgetlo le lengwe gape kwa baaging gore ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzoholela ekubeni nemibiko yokuhlolwa kwamabhuku eqondile kanye nocwaningo esikhathini esizayo olumayelana nokuguqulwa kobunikazi bomhlaba..  UMthethosivivinywa We-ejensi Kazwelonke Yengqalasizinda Yomthombo Wamanzi (i-NWRIA) wezi-.

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di tla dira gore ditshwanelo tsa go nna le lefatshe nne selo sa boammaruri se se sireleditsweng semolao ke Karolo ya bo 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa we-NWRIA wezi-2022 ukuze umphakathi uphawule ngawo isikhathi esiyizinsuku ezingamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye (90).

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono dira gore jaanong go kokoanngwa ga dipalopalo malebana le lotso, bosetšhaba le boagi jwa batshodi ba ditshwanelo tsa lefatshe mo Aforika Borwa nne selo se se kgonagalang.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlongoza ukubekwa kwe-NWRIA ukuthi umsebenzi wayo kube ngukuhlela, ukuxhasa ngezimali kanye nokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda yamanzi kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Kgaolo eno tla dira gore mo isagong go nne bonolo go kwala dipegelo tse di nepagetseng tsa boruni jwa lefatshe le tsa tshekatsheko ya lefatshe fa re lekola diphetogo mo go nneng beng ba lefatshe..   Molaotlhomo wa Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Mafaratlhatlha Ditlamelo tsa Metsi (NWRIA) wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Izophinde ibhekele ukunakekelwa kwengqalasizinda yamanzi ekhona njengamanje.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo wa NWRIA wa 2022 ka phasaladiwa sebaka sa malatsi le 90 gore setšhaba se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga ona.
tgt_text: I-ejensi izoqinisekisa ukuthunyelwa kwamanzi okusimeme, okulingene nokuthembakele okuzohambisana nezimiso zomthethosisekelo zokuba nelungelo lokufinyelela emanzini nokuhlala endaweni ephephile enempilo.

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono tshitshinya gore go tlhomiwe setheo sa NWRIA se se tla rwalang maikarabelo go rulaganya, go tlamela ka ditšhelete le go tlhabolola mafaratlhatlha metsi mo nageng.
tgt_text: I-ejensi izokwakheka njengeNkampani Kahulumeni ngaphansi kweSahluko sesi-2 soMthetho Wokwenganyelwa Kwezimali Zikahulumeni, we-1999 (Umthetho woku-1 we-1999).

src_text: Gape se tla bo se na le maikarabelo go tlhokomela mafaratlhatlha a leng teng metsi.
tgt_text: I-ejensi izokwenza imisebenzi okwamanje eyenziwa i-Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezamandla Ezimali Nemisebenzi Yomasipala wezi-.

src_text: Setheo seno se tla tshwanela ke go netefatsa gore go nna le tlamelo e sa kgaotseng ya metsi e rebolang metsi ka go lekalekana le e go tsamaisana le maitlamo molaotheo gore batho ba tshwanetswe go tlamelwa ka metsi le tikologo e babalesegileng mme itekanetse.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezamandla Ezimali nemisebenzi Yomasipala wezi-.

src_text: Setheo seno se tla tlhomiwa go nna Setheo sa Puso ka fa tlase ga Šejule 2 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete tsa Puso, wa ngwaga wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 1 wa 1999).
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uchibiyela uMthetho Wamandla Ezimali Nemisebenzi Yomasipala, wangowezi-2007 (Umthetho we-12 wezi-2007).

src_text: Setheo seno se tla rwala ditiro tse ga jaana di rwelweng ke Bothati jwa Trans-Caledon Tunnel..   Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zilawula amandla omasipala ekufakeni intela ezindlekweni zentuthuko ngokwezicelo zokuthuthukiswa komhlaba ezilethwe komasipala.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala wa Ngwaga wa 2022 isiwe kwa Palamenteng.
tgt_text: Lezi zichibiyelo zizoqinisekisa ukuthi omasipala basebenzisa lezi zindleko ngeqiniso, obala futhi ngendlela eqondile.

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono baakanya Molao wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala, wa ngwaga wa 2007 (Molao wa bo 12 wa 2007)..     Dikarolo tseno tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di laola maatla dimasepala go lefisa ditefiso tsa tlhabololo malebana le dikopo tsa tlhabololo ya lefatshe tse di neelwang dimasepala.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lagunyaza lo Mthethosivivinywa ngowezi-2020 ukuze umphakathi uphawule ngawo..  UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Izindaba Zezimali wezi-.

src_text: Dikarolo tseno di tla netefatsa gore dimasepala di dirisa ditefiso tseno kwa ntle ga go tsaya letlhakore, kwa ntle ga bofitlha le ka tshwanelo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Izindaba Zezimali, wezi-.

src_text: Kabinete ka ngwaga wa 2020 neile tetla ya gore Molaotlhomo ono ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona..     Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero ya Ditšhelete wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlongoza ukuchibiyela iMithetho eyisikhombisa, okuyilena (1) uMthetho Wempesheni Yezikhungo Ezisebenzisanayo, we-1963 (Umthetho wama-41 we-1963); (2) uMthetho Wempesheni Womkhosi Wezempi, we-1976 (Umthetho wama-84 we-1976); (3) uMthetho Wempesheni Yabasebenzi Bakahulumeni we-1996; (4) uMthetho Wekhomishini Yezezimali, we-1997 (Umthetho wama-99 we-1997); (5) uMthetho weBhange Lokuthuthukiswa Komhlaba Nezolimo, wezi-2002 (Umthetho we-15 wezi-2002); (6) uMthetho Wabacwaningi-mabhuku wezi-2005 (Umthetho wama-26 wezi-2005) kanye (7) noMthetho Ochitshiyelwe Wabacwaningi-mabhuku wezi-2021 (Umthetho wesi-5 wezi-2021).

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero ya Ditšhelete wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamenteng.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezihlongozwayo zibandakanya, ngaphansi koMthetho Wempesheni Yomkhosi Wezempi we-1996, ukubandakanywa kwabalingani kwizinzuzo kubuyelwa emuva kusuka ngama-27 kuMbasa.

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono tshitshinya gore Melao le supa kwalolwe sešwa leng (1) Molao wa Letlole la Diphenšene la Ditheo tse di Dirang Tiro ya Mothale oo, wa ngwaga wa 1963 (Molao wa bo 41, wa 1963); (2) Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Masole, wa ngwaga wa 1976 (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Badiri ba Puso wa ngwaga wa 1996; (4) Molao wa Khomišene ya Ditšhelete le Taolo ya Matlole, wa ngwaga wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 99 wa 1996); (5) Molao wa Banka ya Lefatshe le Tlhabololo ya Temothuo, wa ngwaga wa 2002 (Molao wa bo 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao wa Porofešene ya Boruni wa ngwaga wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 26 wa 2005) le (7) Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Porofešene ya Boruni wa ngwaga wa 2021, (Molao wa bo 5 wa 2021).
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zemithetho yempesheni zizovumela amakhosikazi nabayeni ukuthi bathole inzuzo yempesheni yabo masinya nje emva kokuhlakazwa komshado.

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di akaretsa tse di leng ka fa tlase ga Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Masole wa 1996, tse di ka ga go akarediwa mo diphenšeneng tsa masole balekane ba masole gore le bona ba natholelwe ditshiamelo tsa bona mme go tla tsewa gore seno se tla diragadiwa go tloga ka letlha la bo 27 Moranang.
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kokucacisa umsebenzi kaNgqongqoshe Wezezimali nasekucwaningeni amabhuku, izichibiyelo ziphinde zilinganise amandla ekomidi eliqinisa umthetho lapho umcwaningi-mabhuku ethole khona kunecala.

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa melao ya diphenšene di tla dira gore ka gangwe balekane ba masole ba natholelwe merokotso ya diphenšene fa ba tswa mo kgolaganong ya lenyalo.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa washicilelwa ngoNhlolanja wezi-2022 ukuthi umphakathi uphawule..  UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Imithetho Engujikelele (Ukulwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwemali noKulwa Nokuxhasa Ngezimali Izenzo Zobudlova) wezi-.

src_text: Mo godimo ga go sedifatsa seabe sa Tona ya Ditšhelete mo boruning, ntlha nngwe e kwalolotsweng sešwa ke e mabapi le go oketsa dithata tsa komiti ya kgalemo ya baruni fa moruni amogetse molato.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Imithetho Engujikelele (Ukulwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwemali Nokulwa Nokuxhasa Ngezimali Izenzo Zobudlova) wangowezi-2022 ePhalamende ukuthi uzocutshungulwa.

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono phasaladitswe ka Ferikgong 2022 gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona..   Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Melao Yotlhe e Lwantshanang le goTlhatswiwa ga Tšhelete le go Lwantsha Tlamelo ya Ditšhelete tsa Menolopuso) wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa unguMthethosivivinywa oyingxubevange ochibiyela iMithetho ekhona njengamanje okuyi  uMthetho Wesikhungo Sobunhloli Bezezimali, wezi-2001 (Umthetho wama-38 wezi-2001); (ii) uMthetho Wezinhlangano Ezingenzi Nzuzo, we-1997 (Umthetho wama-71 we-1997); (iii) uMthetho Wokulawulwa Kwempahla eku-Trust, we-1988 (Umthetho wama-57 we-1988); (iv) uMthetho Wezinkampani, wezi-2008 (Umthetho wama-71 we-2008) kanye  noMthetho Wokulawulwa Komkhakha Wezimali, wezi-2017 (Umthetho we-9 wezi-2017).

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Melao Yotlhe e Lwantshanang le goTlhatswiwa ga Tšhelete le go Lwantsha Tlamelo ya Ditšhelete tsa Menolopuso) wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamenteng go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ziphendula ukuntula okubonakele ngesikhathi sokubuyekezana kwamazwe okwenziwa yithimba le-Financial Action Task Force (i-FATF).

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono ke Molaotlhomo o kwalolang sešwa letlotlo la Melao e farologaneng leng  Molao wa Setheo sa go Lwantsha Bogodu jwa Ditšhelete, wa ngwaga wa 2001 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Molao wa Ditheo tse di sa Direng Letseno, wa ngwaga wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Molao wa Taolo ya Dithoto tsa Terasete, wa ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 57 wa 1998); (iv) Molao wa Ditlamo, wa ngwaga wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 2008) le  Molao wa Lephata la Melawana ya Ditšhelete wa ngwaga wa 2017 (Molao wa bo 9 wa 2017).
tgt_text: Umbiko wokuhlolwa ofanayo waqhamuka nezincomo ezingama-40 ezingasiza ekubekeni iNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ihambisane nezinyathelo zomhlaba zokulwa nokushushumbiswa kwemali kanye nokuxhasa ngezimali izenzo zobudlova..  INingizimu Afrika yatholakala ukuthi isemuva ezindaweni ezingama-.

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di tsibogela makoa a nopotsweng ke dinaga tsa balekane mo Letsholong la Setlhopha sa Ditiro tsa go Tsaya Dikgato mo Mererong ya Ditšhelete (FATF).
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa ubhekene nezindawo eziyi-14 zalezi zindawo ezibonakele.

src_text: Pegelo eno dirile ditshitshinyo di le 40 tse di tla thusang go dira gore Aforika Borwa tsamaisane le dikgato tsa boditšhabatšhaba tsa go lwantshana le go tlhatswiwa ga tšhelete le go tlamela ka ditšhelete mekgatlo ya menolopuso..   Go fitlhetswe gore Aforika Borwa na le makoa mo dikarolong di le.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika selokhu yaba yilungu le-FAFT kusukela ngowezi-.

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono samagana le dikarolo di ka nna 14 tsa tse di nopotsweng.
Aforika Borwa sa le ntse le tokololo ya FATF fa sale ka ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezezidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa kwazo wezi-.
IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezezidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwazo wezi-2022 ukuthi ucutshungulwe.

src_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: UMthetho Wezidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwazo, we-1992 (Umthetho we-140 we-1992) ukwenza kube licala ukukhiqizwa nokusatshalaliswa kwanoma isiphi isidakamizwa kwezibalulwe ngaphansi kweSahluko soku-1 neSahluko sesi-2 soMthetho..  Izichibiyelo zibhekana nokungasebenzi kweSahluko sama-63, okwatholakala ukuthi akuhambisani nomthethosisekelo uma uNgqongqoshe ezonikwa amalungelo okuchibiyela izahluko ngaphandle kokubandakanya inqubo yomthetho.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamente go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.. Molao wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi, wa ngwaga wa 1992 (Molao wa bo 140 wa 1992) dira gore go tlhagisa le go tlamela ka sere sepe se se akareditsweng ka fa tlase ga Šejule 1 le Šejule 2 ya Molao ono go tsewe le tlolo ya molao..   Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di samagana le Karolo ya bo 63 go fitlhetsweng gore ga tsamaisane le molaotheo malebana le gore Tona neelwa dithata tsa go baakanya dišejule kwa ntle le go di fetisa mo matlhong batlhankedi ba setheo sa peomolao.
tgt_text: Ngowezi-2020, iNkantolo Yomthethosisekelo yamemezela ukuthi iSahluko sama-63 esimayelana neZidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwazo we-1992 asihambisani nomthethosisekelo futhi yamisa ukungasebenzi kwaso ukuya mhla ziyi-17 kuZibandlela 2022 ukunikeza iPhalamende isikhathi sokulungisa leli phutha  Umcimbi ozayo.

src_text: Ka ngwaga wa 2020, Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo rebotse katlholo ya gore Karolo ya bo 63 ya Molao wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa 1992 ga tsamaisane le molaotheo mme ne ya beela thoko go tsenngwa tirisong ga katlholo eno go fitlha ka la bo 17 Sedimonthole 2022 go naya Palamente nako gore baakanye phoso eno   Tiragalo e Tlang.
tgt_text: Indebe yomhlaba i-Rugby World Cup Sevens.

src_text: Kgaisano ya Rugby World Cup Sevens.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izosingatha imidlalo yendebe yomhlaba i-World Cup Sevens 2022 eKapa phakathi komhla we-9 nomhla we-11 kuMandulo.

src_text: Aforika Borwa tla amogela kgaisano ya Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 kwa Motse Kapa magareng ga la bo 9 le la bo 11 Lwetse.
tgt_text: Lo mcimbi wombukiso uzosingathwa okokuqala ezwenikazi i-Afrika futhi kuzobonakala amaqembu amadoda angama-24 nawesifazane ayi-16 aphuma emhlabeni jikelele encintisana  Imiyalezo.

src_text: Ke la ntlha metshameko eno tshwarelwa mo kontinenteng ya Aforika mme go tla bo go na le ditlhopha di le 24 tsa banna le di le 16 tsa basadi go tswa lefatsheng ka bophara tse di tla bong di gaisana     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: UkuhalalisaIKhabhinethi lihalalisela futhi lifisela okuhle kodwa laba: I-Banyana, ngokuqopha umlando benqoba indebe yokuqala ngqa yaseNingizimu Afrika ye-Women's Africa Cup of Nations (i-WAFCON), emdlalweni wamanqamu we-2022 WAFCON obudlalwa e-Rabat, e-Morocco ngoMgqibelo, mhla wama-23 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Go Akgola          Kabinete akgotse le go eleletsa masego: ●  Banyana Banyana, ka ntlha ya go dira hisetori mo Aforika Borwa le go gapa sekgele sa ntlha sa kgaisano ya Women's Africa Cup of Nations (WAFCON), kwa makgaolakgannyeng WAFCON ngwaga wa 2022 a neng tshwaretswe kwa Rabat, kwa Morocco ka Lamatlhatso, la bo 23 Phukwi.
tgt_text: Ngokuphumelela kwabo, bazodlulela emincintiswaneni yeNdebe Yomhlaba Yabesifazane ye-FIFA ngonyaka ozayo ezobe isingathwe ngokuhlanganyela i-Australia ne-New Zealand kusuka mhla wama-20 kuNtulikazi kuya mhla wama-20 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Go ntse go le jalo, ba nnile le tshiamelo ya Sejana sa Lefatshe sa basadi sa FIFA se se yang go amogelwa ke Australia le New Zealand go tloga ka la bo 20 Phukwi go fitlha ka la bo 20 Phatwe.
tgt_text: IQembu laseNingizimu Afrika, ngokuhlabana ngezindondo ezingama-27 emidlalweni enhlobonhlobo ye-2022 Commonwealth Games ebidlalwa e- Birmingham, e-England kusuka mhla wama-28 kuNtulikazi kuya mhla wesi-8 kuNcwaba.

src_text: ●  Setlhopha sa Aforika Borwa (Team South Africa), ka ntlha ya go gapa dimedale di le 27 mo maphateng a farologaneng kwa Metshamekong ya Commonwealth ya 2022 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Birmingham, Engelane go tloga ka la bo 28 Phukwi go fitlha ka la bo 8 Phatwe.
tgt_text: Bathathe indawo yesishiyagalolunye ngezindondo eziyisikhombisa zegolide, eziyisishiyagalolunye zesiliva kanye nezili-11 zethusi.Iqembu Labesifazane lama-Springbok, ngokunqoba i-Spain emdlalweni wabo wokuqala kwemibili yokuzwana amandla ye-Women’s Winter Series e-Emirates Airline Park e-Johannesburg.Nks Ndavi Nokeri (23), ngokwethweswa isicoco sikaZime waseNingizimu Afrika wezi-.

src_text: Se feletse kwa maemong borobongwe ka dimedale tsa gauta di le supa, tsa selefera di le robongwe le tsa boronse di le.
tgt_text: Nks Ashleigh Buhai, ngokuhlabana ku-2022 AIG Women’s Open waba ngowesifazane wesithathu waseNingizimu Afrika ukuhlabana ngendondo yegolide.

src_text: ●  Basadi ba Springbok, ka phenyo ya bona kgatlhanong le Spain mo metshamekong mebedi ya ntlha ya Motseletsele wa Mariga wa Basadi kwa lebaleng la metshameko la Emirates Airline Park kwa Johannesburg.●  Mme Ndavi Nokeri (23), go rwesiwa korone ya Mmabontle wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa yo montšhwa wa ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Amazwi enduduzo         IKhabhinethi lidlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini nakubangani baka: ● Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), umculi kanye nombhali wamaculo owadlondlobala waduma ngesikhathi yena nabangani bakhe ababili beqala iqembu lomculo we-kwaito ngowe-1996 elalibizwa nge-TKZee.

src_text: ●  Mme Ashleigh Buhai, ka go gapa 2022 AIG Women’s Open mme nna mosadi wa boraro wa Aforika Borwa go gapa bosimega jwa gauta.

Matshediso Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa malapeng le balesika ba: ●  Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), rammino, moopedi le mokwadi wa mmino yo neng tuma fa ene mmogo le ditsala tsa gagwe di le pedi ba ne ba simolola setlhopha sa mmino wa kwaito ka ka ngwaga wa 1996, se se neng se bidiwa TKZee..  Go Thapiwa.
tgt_text: Abaqashiwe.

src_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.
tgt_text: Bonke abaqashiwe kumele kuqinisekiswe iziqu zabo futhi bahlolwe ngokufanele.

src_text: Mme Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo jaaka Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): Dipatlisiso le Taolo ya Dipholisi kwa Lefapheng la Ditiro tsa Puso le Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba (DPWI)..   Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jaaka DDG: Tikwatikwe ya Tsamaiso ya Matlhothapelo Setšhaba kwa Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo..   Rre Adam Mthombeni jaaka DDG: Tirisanommogo mo Ditheong tsa Puso  kwa DPWI.
tgt_text: Nks Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo njengePhini loMqondisi-Jikelele (i-DDG): Kwezocwaningo Lenqubomgomo Nomthethonqubo kuMnyango wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni Nengqalasizinda (i-DPWI).

src_text: Kabinete dumelane le go thapiwa ga ba ba latelang:.
tgt_text: Dkt Bongani Elias Sithole njenge-DDG: kwiSikhungo Sokulawulwa Kwesimo Senhlekelele kuMnyango Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana..  Mnu Adam Mthombeni njenge-DDG: KweZobudlelwano Phakathi Kukahulumeni e-DPWI.

src_text: Ngaka Zwanani Titus Mathe jaaka Motlhankedikhuduthamaga wa Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Tlhabololo ya Motlakase.

Ditokololo tse di dirang nako e sa tlalang tsa Bothati jwa Motlakase wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa   Rre Thembani Bukula (Modulasetilo)   Mme Zandile Mpungose (Motlatsamodulasetilo)   Mme Precious Sibiya   Mme Thembeka Semane; lee.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi livumelana nokuqashwa kwalaba abalandelayo:.

src_text: Rre Fungai Sibanda thapilwe sešwa).
tgt_text: Dkt Zwanani Titus Mathe njengeSikhulu Esiphezulu Esiphethe eSikhungweni Sokuthuthukiswa Kwezamandla eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Modulasetilo le tokololo ya Boto ya Lekgotla la Thekenoloji ya Diminerale   Ngaka Thibedi Ramontja (Modulasetilo); leb.
tgt_text: Amalungu angasebenzi ngokuphelele kuBalawuli Bezamandla Kuzwelonke eNingizimu Afrika  Mnu Thembani Bukula (uSihlalo)  Mnu Zandile Mpungose (iPhini likaSihlalo)  Nks Precious Sibiya  Nks Thembeka Semane; no-e. Mnu Fungai Sibanda (ophinde wabekwa).

src_text: Moporofesara Lwazi Ngubevana..   Mme Cladie Thamo Hloniphile Mzobe jaaka Motsamaisikhuduthamaga wa Kgaolo wa Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Tshireletsego ya Loago kwa KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: USihlalo kanye nelungu loMkhandlu WeBhodi Lezobuchwepheshe Bezezimbiwa  Dkt Thibedi Ramontja (uSihlalo); no-b.

src_text: Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Umnotho.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke go fokotsega ka palo nnye ga dipalopalo tsa botlhokatiro ka fa nageng, jaaka di fokotsegile ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukwehla kancane kwezinga labantu abangasebenzi kuleli lizwe, okwehle nge-.

src_text: 6%, go tloga mo go.
tgt_text: 6%, kusuka kuma-.

src_text: 5% mo kotareng ya ntlha go fitlha mo go.
tgt_text: 5% kwikota yokuqala kwaya kuma-.

src_text: 9% mo kotareng ya bobedi mo ngwageng wa.
tgt_text: 9% kwikota yesibili ngowezi-.

src_text: Dipalopalo tse di phasaladitsweng mo Dipatlisisong tsa Kgweditharo tsa Dipalopalo tsa Badiri (QLFS) tse di phasaladitsweng ke ba Setheo sa Dipatlisiso tsa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (StatsSA) di bontsha gore ditiro tse dintsi di nnile teng mo Matsholong Ditirelo tsa Baagi (mo go thapilweng batho ba le 276 000), mo Lephateng la Matlole (mo go thapilweng batho ba le 169 000), le mo Dikonterakeng (mo go thapilweng batho ba le 104 000).
tgt_text: Amanani ashicilelwe kuCwaningo Lwabasebenzi Lwekota ngabeZezibalo eNingizimu Afrika abonisa ukuthi imisebenzi eminingi ebe khona ibe semkhakheni wezoMphakathi Nezinsiza Zenhlalo (276 000), wezoHwebo (169 000), weZezimali (128 000) kanye nowoKwakha (104 000)..     Inani eliphelele labantu abaqashiwe lime kwizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Palo ya batho botlhe ba ba nang le ditiro ne tsamaya mo go dimilione di le 15, 6 mo kotareng ya bobedi ya ngwaga wa 2022, mme fa palo eno bapisiwa le mo kotareng e fetileng go bonagala gore palo ya batho ba ba senang ditiro mo kotareng ya bobedi ya ngwaga wa 2022 oketsegile ka 132 000 mme batho ba ba senang ditiro ke ba le kanaka dimilione di le robedi.
tgt_text: 6 kwikota yesibili ngowezi-2022, kwathi inani labantu abangasebenzi lakhula ngezi-132 000 laya ezigidini eziyi-.

src_text: Phokotsego e potlana eno ya botlhokatiro ke selo se segolo se se bontshang gore maiteko puso le badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya loago go godisa ikonomi le go tlhola ditiro tse di tlhokegang simolotse go re tswela mosola.
tgt_text: 0 kwikota yesibili ngowezi-2022 uma kuqhathaniswa nekota eyedlule.

src_text: Seno ke bopaki jwa gore fa re dika tiro mmogo ka go dirisa bokgoni jwa yo mongwe le yo mongwe, re ka kgona go fedisa dikgwetlho tse ikonomi ya rona tobaneng le tsona.
tgt_text: Le mpumelelo engatheni kodwa ejabulisayo ibonisa ukuthi inhlanganisela yemizamo kahulumeni ekanye nozakwabo emiphakathini yokukhulisa umnotho nokusungula imisebenzi edingekayo isiqala ukuthela izithelo..     Lokhu kungubufakazi bokuthi uma sonke sisebenza ngokubambisana siphikelele phambili ngamandla ahlangene, singazinqoba izinselele ezibhekene nomnotho wethu..     IKhabhinethi liyakuqonda ukukhungatheka kwabantu baseNingizimu Afrika njengoba bethwele kanzima ukuphila nsuku zonke ngenxa yezindleko eziphezulu zempilo kanye nezinga eliphezulu labantu abangasebenzi.

src_text: Kabinete tlhaloganya sentle tšhakgalo ya maAforika Borwa jaaka go le boima mo matshelong bona ka ntlha ya dilo tse di bitsang ditlhwatlhwa tse di kwa godimo mmogo le dipalo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro.
tgt_text: Njengohulumeni onakekelayo, silokhu sizimisele futhi sizinikele ekusebenzisaneni nozakwethu emiphakathini ukwakha ikusasa elingcono lawo wonke umuntu.

src_text: Re le mmuso o tlhokomelang baagi ba yona, re santse re eme ka le le reng re tla tshwarisana tiro le badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya go tlhokomela baagi gore motho yo mongwe le yo mongwe isago ya gagwe nne botoka.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usalokhu ezinikele ekwesekeni amabhizinisi alapha ekhaya ngokuthenga impahla nokusebenzisa izinsiza zalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Puso santse eme ka la gore tla rekela dikgwebo tsa ka fa nageng ka go reka didirisiwa le ditirelo mo dikgwebong tsa ka fa nageng ya rona.
tgt_text: Ingqalasizinda Yomphakathi.

src_text: Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi liyakugxeka kakhulu ukucekelwa phansi kwengqalasizinda ngabahlali basoThongathi KwaZulu Natali ngesikhathi bebhikishela amanzi.

src_text: Kabinete kgalema ka mafoko a bogale baagi ba kwa Tongaat kwa KwaZulu-Natal ka go senya mafaratlhatlha tikologo eo fa ba ne ba rebotse megwanto ya go lwela metsi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi licela ukuthi kwehliswe amaphaphu futhi kubekezelwe njengoba umsebenzi usuqalile wokulungisa iSizinda Samanzi oThongathi.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse gore baagi ba theose matshwafo le go nna le pelotelele jaaka ba Setheo sa Ditiro tsa go Tlhatswa Metsi sa Tongaat ba samagane le ditiro tsa go busetsa baagi metsi.

Kabinete tlhaloganya sentle tšhakgalo ya baagi ba ba ntseng ba gelela metsi mo diterokong tse di ba tlisetsang metsi mo metseng fa sale merwalela e gogotseng lefelo leno kwa tshimologong ya monongwaga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakuqonda ukukhungatheka kwabahlali okufanele basebenzise izimoto zamathangi amanzi isikhathi esengeziwe selokhu kwaba nezikhukhula ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka.

src_text: Le fa go le jalo, tirisodikgoka le go melelana meno ga di kitla di tlisa tharabololo bile gape go senya mafaratlhatlha setšhaba ke go itshenyetsa.
tgt_text: Noma kunjalo, udlame nesiphithiphithi akusona isixazululo, futhi ukucekelwa phansi kwengqalasizinda yomphakathi kulimaza imiphakathi esendaweni kuphela.

src_text: Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Ditheo tsa Dimasepala mo Dipusoselegaeng wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: ISichibiyelo soMthetho Wezindlela Zokusebenza Zomasipala Bohulumeni Basekhaya sezi-.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go saeniwa ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ga Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Ditheo tsa Dimasepala mo Dipusoselegaeng wa Ngwaga wa 2022 (Molao wa bo 3 wa 2022) gore nne molao.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukusayinwa kufakwe emthethweni iSichibiyelo Somthetho Wezindlela Zokusebenza Komasipala Bohulumeni Basekhaya, sezi-2022 (Umthetho wesi-3 wezi-2022) nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Maitlhomo molao ono ke go tlhabolola dithata le maemo maitshwaro dipusoselegae.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uhlose ukuthuthukisa ikhono kanye namazinga okuziphatha kohulumeni basekhaya.

src_text: Molao ono ke karolo ya dikgato tse di tsewang ke puso tsa go dira gore ditirelo tsa puso nne tse di manontlhotlho le go dira bonnete jwa gore batho ba tlamelwa ka ditirelo tse di sa kgaotseng, fela jaaka go tlhalositswe mo ditshwanelong tse di botlhokwa tse di umakilweng mo Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa..  Molao ono totobatsa dikgato tse di tshwanetsweng go latelwa go thapa batlhankedi ba bagolwane mo pusong.
tgt_text: Lo mthetho uyingxenye yemizamo kahulumeni yokusebenza ngokulandela umthetho Kwezemisebenzi Kahulumeni kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuhlinzekwa okusimeme kwezinsiza kubantu, njengelungelo elihamba phambili elilotshwe kuMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika wangowe-..

src_text: Jaanong molao ono ganetsa batlhankedi ba ba golwane mo pusong go ka tshwara ditiro tse dingwe tsa sepolotiki mo mekgatlhong ya dipolotiki.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho ucacisa inqubo okumele ilandelwe uma kuqashwa abantu ezikhundleni zokuphatha.

src_text: Se sengwe gape ka molao ono ke gore re diphatlhatiro tsa batsamaisi ba dimasepala tse di iseng di thapelwe batlhankedi mo go tsona di tshwanetse go phasaladiwa naga ka bophara gore botlhe ba ba nang le matshwanedi ba tsenye dikopo tsa go neelwa ditiro tseo.
tgt_text: Manje usuvimbela izikhulu eziphethe kuhulumeni ukuthi zibe nezikhundla emahhovisi amaqembu epolitiki.

src_text: Kabinete na le tshepo e tletseng ya gore dikarolo tseno tse di fetotsweng di tla dira bonnete jwa gore batho bao ba thapilweng kgotsa bao ba tlhophilweng mo maemong bona ba tla kgona go dira seo ba se thapetsweng go ya ka seo ba se solofeditseng gore re kgone go dira gore botshelo bo nne botoka mo bathong botlhe.
tgt_text: Ngalo Mthetho futhi, izikhundla ezingenabantu zabaphathi bomasipala kulindeleke ukuthi zikhangiswe kuzwelonke ukuze kuzohehwa abantu abaningi abafanelekile abangafaka izicelo zalezi zikhundla..     IKhabhinethi liyazethemba ukuthi lezi zinguquko zizoqinisekisa ukuthi labo abaqashwayo noma abakhethwayo kulezi zikhundla bazokwazi ukugcina izethembiso zabo ukuze sizokwazi ukuba nempilo engcono yawo wonke umuntu.

src_text: Bosenyi.
tgt_text: Ubugebengu.

src_text: Kabinete rolela hutshe batlhankedi ba tlhatlhobo ya dithoto kwa melelwaneng ba Setheo sa Tirelo ya Lekgetho la Aforika Borwa (SARS) jaaka kwa Boemelafofaneng ba OR Tambo ka Latshipi wa la bo 28 Phatwe 2022 ba tshwere dithoto tse di neng di tlisiwa kwano tsa boima jwa dikilokerema di le 785 tsa diokobatsi tsa crystal meth tse boleng jwa tsona bo ka dirang R236 milione fa di rekisiwa mo mebileng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lincome izikhulu ezisebenza ngentela eSikhungweni Esiqoqa Intela eNingizimu Afrika ngokushaqa izidakamizwa ze-crystal meth ezingama-785 kg ezingabiza inani eliyizigidi ezingama-R236 esikhumulweni sezindiza i-OR Tambo International Airport ngeSonto, mhla wama-28 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Go tshwariwa ga diokobatsi tseno go tla romela ditlhokotsebe tsa digongwana tsa diokobatsi molaetsa o totobetseng wa gore melelwane ya rona tlhokometswe ka botlalo bile batlhankedi ba naga ya rona ba dira ka natla go fedisa botlhokotsebe  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Ukushaqwa kwalezi zidakamizwa kuzothumela isexwayiso kuzigelekeqe sokuthi imingcele yethu engenayo nephumayo ivikelwe kakhulu futhi amahhovisi ethu asebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuqeda nya ubugebengu     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Pegelo ya Lekgotla le le Samaganang le Merero ya Setheo sa Thuto Kgolwane ka ga Dipatlisiso tsa Megolo ya Batlatsabakhanselara le ya Batlhankedi ba Bagolo mo Ditheong tsa Aforika Borwa tsa Thuto Kgolwane.
tgt_text: UMbiko Womkhandlu Wezemfundo Ephakeme (i-CHE) Wophenyo lokuKhokhelwa kwamaPhini oShansela Emanyuvesi kanye Nabaphathi Abakhulu eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete tsopoletswe ka seo se setseng se dirilwe mo dipatlisisong tsa CHE tse mo ngwageng wa 2020 Tona ya Thuto Kgolwane, Saense le Boitshimololedi, Ngaka Blade Nzimande laetseng gore di diriwe, gore go sekasekiwe megolo le go thapiwa ga khuduthamaga ya diyunibesiti mo sebakeng se se fetileng sa dingwaga di le 15, go simolola ka ngwaga wa 2005 go fitlha ka ngwaga wa..  Maitlhomo dipatlisiso tseno ke go tlhatlhoba gore diyunibesiti kgotsa ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane tsa ka fa nageng ya rona ke eng se se di dirang gore di kgone go itshomarela, di kgone go dira tiro ya tsona le gore di kgone go itlhabolola.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi litshelwe kafushane ngemiphumela yophenyo lwe-CHE eyayijutshwe ngowezi-2020 nguNgqongqoshe Wezemfundo Ephakeme, Ezesayensi Nokuqamba Kabusha, uDkt u-Blade Nzimande, ukuthi iphenyisise ngezigaba zokukhokhelwa nokuhola kwezikhulu eziphezulu emanyuvesi esikhathini seminyaka eyi-15 kusukela ngowezi-2005 kuya kowezi-..     Uphenyo lwalusungulelwa ukuthola ukusimama, ukusebenza kahle kanye nokuthuthukiswa komkhakha wamanyuvesi noma wemfundo ephakeme kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Pegelo eno nopotse dintlha tse di botlhokwa tse di utulotseng mmogo le go dira ditshwaelo tsa gore ke eng se se ka diriwang go okobatsa maemo.
tgt_text: Lo mbiko ucacisa lokho okutholiwe kanye nezincomo ezethuliwe zokulungisa isimo..     Izincomo lezi ziphakamisa, phakathi kokunye, inqubo yokukhokhelwa eqinile nengafihli lutho.

src_text: Gare ga tse dingwe tse dintsi, ditshwaelo tse di tshwaetsweng di tshitshinya gore megolo ya batlhankedi tshwanetse go tlhoka lehunelo.
tgt_text: Ukusungulwa kwethimba langaphandle futhi elizimele ukuqapha inqubo yokuthathwa kwezinqumo ngamaholo.

src_text: Go tshwanetswe go tlhomiwe setheo se se ikemetseng se se sa direleng lephata leno gore nne sona se se rwalang maikarabelo go tsaya ditshweetso tse di tsamaisanang le megolo tshitshinya gape le gore dithulaganyo tsa go tlhatlhoba fa batlhankedi ba dira tiro ka botswapelo di tshwanetse go gagamadiwa mo ditheong tseno.
tgt_text: Uphinde waphakamisa ukuqiniswa kwezindlela zokuhlola ukwenziwa komsebenzi ezikhungweni.

src_text: Dipatlisiso tseno tse di dirilweng di lebeletse gape le bogolo jo bo farologaneng jwa ditheo tseno mmogo le go tlhoma boleng jwa maemo a tsamaisanang le ditheo tsa dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba.
tgt_text: Ucwaningo luphinde labhekisisa ubukhulu balezo nalezo zikhungo futhi wabe sewenza isilinganiso esihambelana nesamazwe ngamazwe.

src_text: Go solofetswe gore Tona ya Thuto Kgolwane, Saense le Boitshimololedi tla atlhaatlha pegelo eno le khuduthamaga ya diyunibesiti maitlhomo le go gagamatsa ditheo tseno tsa thuto tla re morago ga foo, pegelo eno ya phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Ditheo tse Dikgolwane tsa Thuto le Katiso: mo go www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wezemfundo Ephakeme, Ezesayensi Nokuqamba Kabusha ulindeleke ukuthi axoxisane ngalo mbiko nobuholi basemanyuvesi njengesinyathelo sokuqinisa lezi zikhungo zemfundo.

src_text: Go Fetola Batsholateu mo Batlhankeding ba Lephata la Thuto le Dipatlisiso mo Lekaleng la Thuto Kgolwane.
tgt_text: Umbiko uzobe emva kwalokho sewuchicilelwa kwiwebhusayithi yoMnyango Wezemfundo Ephakeme Nokuqeqeshwa ethi: www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: Kabinete eme nokeng ditshitshinyo tsa dipatlisiso ka bobedi tse di dirilweng ka maitlhomo go re tlhaba botlhale ka dikgato tse re tshwanetseng go di tsaya go oketsa lebelo la go fetola batsholateu mo batlhankeding ba lephata la thuto le dipatlisiso mo lekaleng la thuto kgolwane.
tgt_text: Uguquko Olusheshisiwe Lwezocwaningo kanye Nekhono Lokufundisa Emkhakheni Wezemfundo Ephakeme.

src_text: Pegelo ya ntlha ke e dirilweng ke Setlhophatiro sa Ditona seo se dirileng dipatlisiso mabapi le gore go gana kae gore go thapiwe, go somarelwe le gore go godisiwe batlhankedi ba thuto kgolwane ba bathobantsho ba leng maAforika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi leseke izincomo zocwaningo olubili obelwenzelwe ukweluleka ngezinyathelo okumele zithathwe ukuze kuzosheshiswa uguquko kwezocwaningo kanye nekhono lokufundisa ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.

src_text: Pegelo ya bobedi ke e dirilweng ke Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi mmogo le Setheo sa Dipatlisiso sa Naga – mo ba dirileng dipatlisiso tseno le Diyunibesiti tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa leng lekoko la diyunibesiti tsa puso di le 26 tsa naga.
tgt_text: Umbiko wokuqala wenziwa iThimba LikaNgqongqoshe elaliphenya imigoqo evimbe ukuqashwa, ukugcinwa emsebenzini kanye nenqubekelaphambili ezifundisweni zabantu abamnyama eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Dipegelo tseno ka bobedi di tshitshinya gore go nne le maano go samagana le morero wa go fetola batsholateu mo dikarolong di le tlhano tse dikgolo leng karolo e mabapi le go tlhagisa batlhankedi ba maemo thuto ya morago ga go konosetsa dithuto tsa ntlha tse dikgolwane; karolo ya bobedi ke ya go nna le seabe ga badiredi ba setheo; karolo ya boraro ke ya setlwaedi sa go dira dilo mo setheong sa thuto se se amegang le ka fao se dirang tiro ka gone; karolo ya bone ke ya mabapi le dipholisi le maano mmogo le karolo ya botlhano e leng ka ga go samagana le ditiragalo tsa go tlhaela ga didirisiwa.
tgt_text: Umbiko wesibili - owayalelwa nguMnyango Wezesayensi Nokuqamba Kabusha kanye neNhlangano Kazwelonke Yezocwaningo - yenziwa yibhodi i-Universities South Africa, okuyibhodi eliyinhlanganisela elimele amanyuvesi angama-26 kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Tumelano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba Mabapi le Didirisiwa tsa Tshimologo ya Dijalo go Thusa mo Mererong ya Dijo le ya Temo.
tgt_text: Yomibili le mibiko iphakamisa amaqhingasu okungenelela ukuze kuzolethwa ngokushesha uguquko emikhakheni emihlanu ebanzi, okubalwa kuyo umkhakha wasebeneziqu; ukubamba iqhaza kwabasebenzi; usikompilo nemikhuba yesikhungo; inqubomgomo neqhingasu, kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza ezinganele.

src_text: Kabinete isitse tumelano eno kwa Palamenteng gore amogelwe.

Seno se tla dira gore Aforika Borwa nne nngwe ya dinaga tse di dumelaneng ka tumelano eno e kaelang dinaga tse leng karolo ya tumelano eno go somarela le go tlhokomela didirisiwa tsa tshimologo ya dijalo go thusa mo mererong ya dijo le ya temothuo.
tgt_text: ISivumelwano Samazwe Ngamazwe Ngemithombo Yofuzo Lwezitshalo Zokudla Nezolimo (iSivumelwano).

src_text: Ka go ikobela tumelano eno, seo se tla thusa go gagamatsa maikemisetso naga eno ago somarela le go tlhokomela ka fao didirisiwa tsa go simolola dijalo diriwang ka teng, mmogo le go ema nokeng baagi ba kwa metseselegaeng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukungeniswa kweSivumelwano ePhalamende.

src_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Fetola Aforika Borwa ka Tsela e Kgotsofalelwang ke Botlhe.
