src_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Metsi sa Trans-Caledon Tunnel  Mme Precious Nompumelelo Sibiya thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Gerald Dumas thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo)  Rre Gregory Nigel Joseph White  Mme Zelda Ncedekile-Tshabalala  Mme Vidhu Nardev Vedalankar  Rre Neo Mooketsi Tladinyane  Mme Mmanare Evelyn Mamabolo  Rre Patrick Roy Mnisi; mmogo lei.
Puo ya Maemo Setšhaba (SoNA).
tgt_text: INkulumo Ngobunjalo Besimo Sezwe (i-SoNA).

src_text: Kabinete boeletsa mafoko ga Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa mo boikuelong jwa gagwe jo bo dirileng mo Puong ya Maemo Setšhaba (SoNA) ya ngwaga wa 2023 mo ikuetseng mo go maAforika Borwa otlhe go tshwarisana tiro mmogo le go dira bonnete jwa gore go se nne le ope yo ba mo tlogelang kwa morago fa go samaganwe le dikgwetlho tse di boima tse naga ya rona tobaneng natso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liqinisekise ikhwelo elicace bha likaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa alihlabe kwiNkulumo yakhe Ngobunjalo Besizwe yangowezi-2023 lokuthi bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika basebenze ngokubambisana futhi bangashiyi muntu emuva njengoba sibhekene nezinselele zaleli lizwe.

src_text: Dikgato tse di sa tseweng ke phefo tsa ga moporesitente di beile kwa pele maano puso monongwaga go samagana le motlakase o tshabetseng ruri le go dira gore re se tlhole re sokodisiwa ke tlhaelo ya motlakase..  Kabinete ikuela mo maphateng otlhe setšhaba sa rona go ema nokeng matsholo otlhe go boletsweng ka ona mo puong ya SoNA ya Moporesitente, go nne botlhokwa mo go maswe mo go fokotseng botlhokatiro, tshokolo le ditlhwatlhwa tse di goletseng ruri tsa go reka dilo tse batho ba iphedisang ka tsona mmogo le go lwantshana le botlhokotsebe le bonweenwee.
tgt_text: Izinyathelo zikaMongameli ezinesibindi zibeka phambili ezamandla ohlelweni lukahulumeni lonyaka lokubhekana nokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kanye nokuhlinzekwa kukagesi okusimeme..  IKhabhinethi linxusa yonke imikhakha yomphakathi ukuthi yeseke imizamo ecaciswe nguMongameli kwi-SoNA, ebaluleke kakhulu ekwesekeni imizamo yethu yokunciphisa ukuswelakala kwemisebenzi, ububha nezindleko ezenyukayo zokuphila kanye nokulwa nobugebengu nenkohlakalo..  Uhulumeni uzimisele ukusheshisa umsebenzi osuvele uqaliwe wokwengeza ukuthunyelwa kukagesi kwisizinda sikagesi sikazwelonke futhi umsebenzi wethu ngukususa noma yiziphi izithiyo ezingaphazamisa le nqubekelaphambili.

src_text: Puso tloga ikemiseditse go potlakisa tiro go setseng go samaganwe le yona ya go oketsa motlakase ka fa nageng mme tiro re tobaneng le yona ke go sutisa sengwe le sengwe se se kgoreletsang gore seno se diragale.
tgt_text: Emavikini ambalwa ezayo, izithangami nabezindaba zamaklasta zizohlinzeka ngemininingwane eyengeziwe ngoHlelo Lwezinyathelo (i-PoA) lukahulumeni lwalo nyaka esikuwo, njengoba ekuphawulile uMongameli u-Ramaphosa kwi-SoNA.

src_text: Fela jaaka Moporesitente Ramaphosa setse tlhalositse mo go SoNA ya gagwe, mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di tlang, ditlhotshwana tsa ditirelo tsa puso di tla abelana ka tshedimosetso ka botlalo ka ga Leano la Dikgato tse Puso tla di Tsayang (PoA) mo ngwageng yo re lebileng.
tgt_text: Isabelomali Zikazwelonke esizokwethulwa ngoLwesithathu, mhla wama-22 kuNhlolanja 2023 sizohlinzeka ngeminye imininingwane nge-PoA kahulumeni..  Ingqungquthela Yezezimayini Ezwenikazi i-Afrika yangowezi-.

src_text: Puo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya Naga le yona ka Laboraro, 22 Tlhakole 2023 tla abelana ka tshedimosetso e tseneletseng ka ga merero ya PoA.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyiphawulile imiphumela yeNgqungquthela Yezezimayini e-Afrika ebibanjwe e-International Convention Centre eKapa kusuka mhla wesi-6 kuya mhla wesi-9 kuNhlolanja 2023 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sivulela Utshalomali Kwezezimayini e-Afrika: Uzinzo, Ukuvikelela kanye Nokuhlinzeka”.

src_text: Kopano Kgolo ya Beng ba Meepo mo Nageng ya Aforika ya Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yezezimayini e-Afrika ibihlanganise izinjula kule mboni eziqhamuka ezwenikazi nasemhlabeni wonkana, nephothule ngokuthi ibe ingqungquthela eseqophelweni eliphezulu yotshalomali lwezezimayini ezwenikazini.

src_text: Kabinete sekegetse tsebe dintlha tse di tšhotlhilweng kwa Kopanong Kgolo ya Beng ba Meepo mo Nageng ya Aforika e neng tshwaretswe kwa Cape Town International Convention Centre go tloga ka la bo 6 go fitlha ka la bo 9 Tlhakole 2023 mo molaetsamogolo neng re: “Go Bulela Dipeeletso mo Meepong ya Aforika: Go Tlisa Tsetsepelo, Polokesego le Tlamelo e sa Kgaotseng”.
tgt_text: Izimayini ziyaqhubeka nokudlala indima ebalulekile entuthukweni nasekuthuthukisweni kwezimboni kulo lonke izwekazi.

src_text: Kopano Kgolo ya Beng ba Meepo mo Nageng ya Aforika tsenetswe ke beng ba meepo go tswa mo kontinenteng le mo lefatsheng ka bophara bile itiretse leina ka go itsege jaaka khonferense e di gogang kwa pele mo dipeeletsong tsa meepo mo kontinenteng.
tgt_text: Zinegalelo elikhulu ekusungulweni nasekugcinweni kwemisebenzi, ngokuvula amathuba emisebenzi yasemayini acela kwisigamu sesigidi kanye neminye imisebenzi ecela esigidini eNingizimu Afrika..  Umkhiqizo ezimayini eNingizimu Afrika ngonyaka owedlule wafinyelela kumathriliyoni angu-R. 18, nokwanika amandla isamba somkhiqizo wasekhaya (i-GDP), impahla ethunyelwa kwamanye amazwe kanye nemalingeniso.

src_text: Moepo tswelela go nna le seabe se segolo mo go tliseng tlhabologo le mo go ageng diintaseteri mo kontinenteng ka bophara botlhokwa thata fa go tla mo go tlholeng ditiro le mo go direng gore batho ba se latlhegelwe ke ditiro bile ke ona o dirileng gore go nne le ditiro di ka nna halofo ya milione mo meepong le ditiro tse dingwe di ka nna milione tse di ikokotletseng ka ditiro tsa meepo mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi licela bonke ababambiqhaza kule mboni ukuthi baqhubeke basebenze ngokubambisana nohulumeni ukubeka le mboni ezingeni lokuncintisana nomhlaba futhi ikwazi ukuqinisa ukukhula komnotho, isungule imisebenzi kanye nokuqhuba intuthuko esimeme..  Izikhukhula .

src_text: Dilo tse di tlhagisitsweng mo meepong ya Aforika Borwa mo ngwageng yo fetileng di fitlhile kwa mankalankaleng mo di dirileng bokanaka  18 trilione, tsa godisa dilo tse di tlhagisiwang ka fa nageng, ditlhagisiwa tsa naga ya rona tse di rekisediwang dinaga tsa boditšhaba mmogo le letseno la rona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi enduduzo emindenini elahlekelwe ngabathandiweyo bayo ngenxa yezikhukhula zakamuva ezihlasele izingxenye eziningana zezwe lakithi.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go botlhe ba ba nang le seabe mo intasetering eno go tswelela go tshwarisana tiro le puso gore re kgone go nna le intaseteri e itsegeng mo lefatsheng e kgonang go ema nokeng kgolo ya ikonomi, go tlhola ditiro le go tlisa tlhabololo e tsepameng.
Merwalela.
tgt_text: Sibonga abezimo eziphuthumayo nokutakula kulolonke izwe abasebenza ngokungakhathali ukusindisa izimpilo zabantu.

src_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa malapeng bao ba latlhegetsweng ke ba malapa bona mo merwaleleng ya mo malobanyaneng e gogotseng mafelo le mantsinyana ka fa nageng..  Re leboga go menagane go ba ditirelo tsa tshoganyetso go ralala le naga ya rona ba ba neng ba tshwere phage ka dingana go pholosa matshelo batho.
tgt_text: Masibumbane njengesizwe sinikezele ngosizo kulabo abadinga ukunakekelwa nokwesekwa..  IKhabhinethi linxuse abantu ukuthi bahlale ezindlini uma kwenzeka kuba nezimvula ezinamandla neziphepho, laphinde lakhumbuza labo abahlala ezindaweni ezingumehlelo ukuthi baqaphelisise.

src_text: Re le naga tla re ipopeng seoposengwe mme re tswe thuso bao ba tlhokang tlhokomelo le kemonokeng.

Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging gore ba nne ka fa dintlong fa pula tshologa le fa go na le merwalela, mmogo le go gakolola bao ba nnang mo mafelong ao metsi tamang mo go ona fa pula nele thata gore ba itlhokomele..  Baagi ba elediwa gore ba se tsamaele gaufi le mo metsi mantsi sianang ka lobelo, ba se thumele mo go ona kgotsa ba se kgabaganye mo metsing ano ka dijanaga tsa bona kgotsa gona go leka go kgabaganya ditsela, maborogo le dinoka mo metsi tletseng.
tgt_text: Abantu bayexwayiswa ukuthi bangahambi, bangabhukudi noma bangashayeli emanzini ageleza ngesivinini noma bewele imigwaqo egcwele amanzi, amabhuloho kanye nemifula.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go dira bonnete jwa gore ka gale bana ba bona ba bolokesegile bile ga go na kgonagalo ya gore ba ka gogolwa ke metsi fa go na le merwalela..  Tirisodikgoka ka Ditlhobolo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linxuse amalungu omphakathi ukuthi aqinisekise ukuthi abantwana bahlale njalo bephephile ekumukeni namanzi ngezikhathi zezikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso yona kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa ga seopedi sa mmino wa hip-hop Rre Kiernan Forbes, yo tumileng thata ka leina la AKA, mmogo le ba lelapa le ditsala tsa ga tsala ya gagwe yo neng le seapei se se tumileng bong Rre Tebello Motsoane, bao bobedi bo jelweng ka tlhobolo kwa Durban..  Kabinete batla gape le go romela matshediso yona kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa ga molwelakgaratlho ya go lwantshana le bosenyi bong Rre Ayob Mungalee, yo mo malobanyaneng jelweng ke tlhobolo kwa Eldorado Park kwa Johannesburg ne le Mokaedi wa mokgatlho o rotloetsang baagi go ema ka dinao kgatlhanong le digongwana tsa bosenyi le thekiso ya diritibatsi wa People Seeking Justice Action Group..  Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa batho bao ba jelweng ka ditlhobolo kwa porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima, KwaZulu-Natal le ya Kapa Botlhaba.

Ditiragalo tse di setlhogo tseno tsa go tlhasela batho ba bangwe, tseo ba sepodisi ba setseng ba weditse diphuruphutso tsa tsona, di re bontsha ka fao tirisodikgoka ka ditlhobolo setseng aname ka gona mmogo le dikotsi tse nang le tsona mo baaging..  Kabinete netefaletsa maAforika Borwa gore go samaganwe le dikgato tse di tla matlafatsang Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) gore kgone go lwantshana le bosenyi.
tgt_text: Udlame lwesibhanu.

src_text: Tsona di tsenyeletsa go oketsa palo ya mapodisi mo mebileng mmogo le go tlhoma ditlhopha tse di tla lwantshanang le bosenyi jo bo rileng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini nakubangani bomculi we-hip-hop uMnu Kiernan Forbes, obedume ngelika-AKA, kanye nosaziwayo wompheki uMnu Tebello Motsoane, abadutshulwe kamuva-nje eThekwini..  IKhabhinethi liphinde ladlulisa ukuzwelana nomndeni nabangani besishoshovu ebesilwisana nobugebengu uMnu Ayob Mungalee, odutshulwe washona kamuva e-Eldorado Park eGoli.

src_text: Aforika Borwa tla dirisa gape le dikgato tsa go dirisa tshedimosetso ka mokgwa o tlhalefileng go itse gore ke mafelo fe a tumileng ka bosenyi le bosenyi bo itaolang mo go ona..  SAPS samagane le go gagamatsa matsholo go utolola ditlhobolo le dikolo le go thopa tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong tse di leng mo diatleng tsa ditlhokotsebe.
tgt_text: Ubengumqondisi kazwelonke we-People Seeking Justice Action Group, inhlangano ebinxenxa amalungu omphakathi ukuthi alwisane namaqembu ezigelekeqe nokuthengiswa kwezidakamizwa.

src_text: Mo dikgweding di le 12 tse di fetileng mapodisi ne thopa ditlhobolo di le 65 519 tse di neng di le mo diatleng tsa batho..  Puso ikuela mo baaging botlhe mmogo le mo mekgatlhong ya baagi go sikara mmogo tiro eno le ba sepodisi go fedisa botlhokotsebe mo metseng ya rona.

Fa go na le sengwe se se itseng se se ka romelang kwa kgolegelong batho ba mo motseng ba ba dirang dilo tse di seng mo molaong, loma mapodisi tsebe ka go letsetsa Mogala wa go Lwantshana le Ditiro tsa Bosenyi mo go 0800. .
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithe dudu emindenini nakubangani balabo ababulewe ekudutshulweni kwakamuva okwenzeke eNtshonalanga Kapa, KwaZulu-Natali naseMpumalanga Kapa.

src_text: Masepala wa Selegae wa Enoch Mgijima (EMLM).
tgt_text: Lokhu kuhlasela okubi okungenanembeza, okusaphenywa ngabomthetho, kubonisa ukusabalala kodlame lwesibhamu kanye nemiphumela yalo emiphakathini.

src_text: Tona ya Pusoselegae le Merero ya Setso Mme Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma mmogo le Tona ya Matlole Rre Enoch Godongwana ba ne ba sedimosetsa ditokololo tsa Kabinete ka maeto bona go buisana le bannaleseabe ba ba nang le dikarolo le seabe se se botlhokwa mo masepaleng ono wa Enoch Mgijima.

Ka kgwedi ya Moranang, Kabinete ne ya nesetsa pula dikgato tse di ka tsewang go rarabolola matsapa mo masepaleng ono go ya ka Karolo ya bo 139(7) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996, fa buisiwa mmogo le Karolo ya bo 150 ya Molao wa Taolo ya Matlole Dimasepala wa ngwaga wa 2003 (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liqinisekisa abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi uPhiko Lwamaphoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika (i-SAPS) luqeqeshelwa ukugwema ubugebengu.

src_text: Masepala ono wa Enoch Mgijima ga a bolo go nna mo tobetobeng ya matlole le ya go retelelwa ke go tlamela setšhaba ka ditirelo pele ga ka tseelwa dikgato..  Kabinete dumelana le matsapa a utolotsweng ke bannaleseabe mme solofeditse baagi ba masepala yono gore go tla tsewa ditshwetso mabapi le gore ke dikgato dife tse di tshwanetsweng go tsewa go samagana le dikgwetlho tse masepala yono tobaneng le tsona mme tsona tla re mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo tsa bolelelwa baagi..  Pabalesego mo Dikolong.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubandakanya ukwengeza amaphoyisa emigwaqeni kanye nokubeka amathimba akhethekile azogxila kuhlobo oluthile lobugebengu.

src_text: Pabalesego mo dikolong tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa santse le ntlha e botlhokwa thata mo pusong ya rona mme bile gape ditiragalo tsa tirisodikgoka tse di begiwang kwa dikolong magareng ga barutwana le barutabana ke selo se se re tlhobang boroko.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izophinde isebenzise izindlela ezisuselwe kulwazi oluvela kucwaningo ezisezingeni eliphezulu ukuthola nokuqonda ngqo ezindaweni lapho ubugebengu budlange khona.

src_text: Le fa Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo le tsentse tirisong dikgato tsa go samagana le bothata jono santse le maikarabelo batsadi le bagodisi ba bana go tshwarisana tiro le ditlhogo tsa dikolo mmogo le barutwana go netefatsa gore kwa dikolong go rena polokesego gore barutwana ba rona ba kgone go rutiwa mme tle nne batho mo setšhabeng.
Se sengwe se se botlhokwa thata mo go rona ke pabalesego ya barutabana ba rona kwa dikolong.
tgt_text: I-SAPS iqinisa izindlela zokuthungatha nokushaqa izibhamu ezingekho emthethweni nezinhlamvu ezandleni zezigilamkhuba.

src_text: Pabalesego mo Mebileng.
tgt_text: Amaphoyisa ezinyangeni eziyi-12 ezedlule ashaqe izibhamu eziyizi-65 519 emphakathini..  Uhulumeni ucela zonke izakhamuzi nezinhlaka zomphakathi ukuthi basebenze ngokubambisana ne-SAPS yendawo ukuqeda nya ngobugebengu emiphakathini.

src_text: Kabinete santse tshwenngwa ke dikotsi tse di diragalang go ralala le naga mo mebileng ya rona.
tgt_text: Uma unolwazi olungasiza ukuveza obala labo bantu ababandakanyeka ezenzweni ezingekho emthethweni, shayela i-Crime Stop ku-0800.

src_text: Puso tla tlhotlhomisa melao mentšhwa e tla fokotsang dikotsi tsa diteroko mongwe wa melao eno ke go dira gore dithoto di se tlhole di tsamaisiwa mo mebileng mme di tsamaisiwe ka diterene mo diporong, mme go solofelwa gore ka go dira jalo seno se tla fokotsa dirori tse di rwalang dithoto mo mebileng.

Kabinete ikuela mo go botlhe ba ba dirisang ditsela go obamela melao ya mo mebileng ka go ntsha matlho dinameng, ka go naganela batho ba bangwe ba le bona ba dirisang mmila oo le go se ba felele pele.
tgt_text: UMasipala Wendawo i-Enoch Mgijima (i-EMLM).

src_text: Botlhe ba ba kgannang ba itshietse kgotsa ba gabotse diritibatsi mmogo le ba ba kgannang boatla, mmogo le ba ba kgannang ka lebelo le le kwa godimo, ke bona ba ba tlholang bontsi jwa dikotsi tseno mo mebileng  Melaotlhomo.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana Nezindaba Zendabuko uNkosazana Dlamini Zuma kanye noNgqongqoshe Wezezimali u-Enoch Godongwana bazise iKhabhinethi ngezingxoxo zakamuva ebezibanjwe nababambiqhaza kanye nabadlalindima abaqavile e-EMLM.

src_text: Molaotlhomo wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Tlhoma Lefelo le le Lengwe la go Abelana ka Ditirelo Tsotlhe tsa go Kgabaganya Melelwane (OSBP).
tgt_text: NgoMbasa wezi-2022, iKhabhinethi lagunyaza ukungenelela ku-EMLM njengokusho kweSahluko se-139(7) soMthethosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wangowe-1996, uma ufundwa uhlanganiswa neSahluko se-150 soMthetho Wokuphathwa Kwezimali Komasipala, wangowezi-2003 (Umthetho wama-56 wezi-2003).

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Molaotlhomo wa OSBP gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.
tgt_text: I-EMLM ibilokhu ibhekene nokwehluleka okubonakalayo kwezezimali nasekuhambiseni izidingonqangi isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuthi kungenelelwe.

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono latela gore go nesediwe pula pholisi ya OSBP mmogo le maano go tsenya tirisong ka Mopitlwe.

Maitlhomo ona ke go dira gore go nne bonolo go tsenya batho le dithoto mo mafelong botseno jwa naga ya Aforika Borwa le kwa mafelong dinaga tsa baagisani..  Seno se tla fokotsa tshubetlhelano e tleng nne gone kwa mafelong go tsena le go tswa ka fa nageng e diriwang ke batho ba ba kgabaganyang melelwane le ba ba gwebisanang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele izinkinga ezibalulwe ngababambiqhaza futhi laqinisekisa abahlali base-EMLM ukuthi isinqumo sokuthi zizoxazululwa kanjani izinselele ezibhekene nomasipala njengamanje bazokwaziswa ngaso maduze.

src_text: Dikgato tseno di botlhokwa gape le mo dikgatong tsa naga ya rona mo go diragatseng Tumelano ya Kgwebisano e Senang Dikgoreletsi mo Dinageng tsa Kontinente ya Aforika (AfCFTA)..  Ditumelano tse di tlhalosiwang mo Molaotlhomong ono di tla thusa gore ditiro tsa go tlhatlhoba dithoto, dijanaga le batho kwa melelwaneng di se opise tlhogo mme di diriwe ka bonako.

Molaotlhomo ono samagana gape le didirisiwa tse di matshwanedi tsa maemo boditšhabatšhaba fa go tla mo go laoleng metsamaong ya go gwebisana, mmogo le ya batho le ya dithoto..  Molaotlhomo wa Naga wa Ditokomane tsa Boitshupo le tsa go Kwadisiwa wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Ukuphepha ezikoleni.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasaladiwa ga Molaotlhomo wa Naga wa Ditokomane tsa Boitshupo le tsa go Kwadisiwa wa Ngwaga wa 2022 gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.
tgt_text: Ukuphepha ezikoleni zaseNingizimu Afrika uhulumeni usalokhu ekubeke eqhulwini futhi imibiko yodlame phakathi kwabafundi nothisha ikhathaza kakhulu..  Ngesikhathi uMnyango Wemfundo Eyisisekelo ubeke izindlela zokulwa nalesi sihlava, kuyisibopho sabazali nababheki babantwana ukuthi basebenzisane neziphathimandla zesikole kanye nabafundi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izikole zihlala ziyindawo ephephile yokuthi abafundi bethu bazithuthukise ukuze babe izakhamuzi eziqotho.

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono neela maatla Pholisi ya Taolo ya Makwalo Boitshupo Semmuso mmogo le go tla ka leano la go tlhoma thulaganyo ya dikhomphiutha le nngwe fela ya naga ya makwalo boitshupo mo go yona batho botlhe ba ba nnang ka fa nageng kgotsa ba ba kileng ba nna ka fa nageng maina bona tla bolokwang mo go yona..  Sekwalwa se iseng se butswe sa Molaotlhomo ono se tla thusa gore go tlhomiwe sefalanatshedimoso sa go kwadisa baagi le bao seng baagi ba naga eno mme ba neilwe tetla ya go nnela ruri ka fa nageng mmogo le go se tlhokomela.
tgt_text: Ukuphepha kothisha ezikoleni zethu nakho kubaluleke kakhulu.

src_text: Se tla thusa gape le gore go tlhomiwe le sefalanatshedimoso se sengwe gape sa go boloka ditokomane tsa boitshupo tsa baagi ba ba tlang go nna sebakanyana ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: Ukuphepha emgwaqeni.

src_text: Sekwalwa seno se tla thusa gape le ka go tlhoma Thulaganyo ya Naga ya go Dirisa Dikarolo tsa Mmele go Tlhagisa Boitshupo jwa Motho (NIS) mme thulaganyo eno tla dira gore go nne bonolo go bona dintlha tsa motho tsa boitshupo ka tswa di le mo sefalanatshedimosong sa go kwadisa baagi kgotsa mo go sa go boloka ditokomane tsa boitshupo tsa baagi ba ba tlang go nna sebakanyana ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisalokhu likhathazekile ngokufa kwabantu abaningi emgwaqeni kulolonke ilizwe.

src_text: NIS tla kgona gape le go dirisana le dithulaganyo tse dingwe tsa boitshupo tsa maphata mangwe puso le poraefete..  Melaotlhomo ya naga ka bobedi leng wa OSBP le wa Ditokomane tsa Boitshupo le tsa go Kwadisiwa ya ngwaga wa 2022 tla phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Merero ya Selegae mo go: www.dha.gov.za.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uzobheka imithetho emisha yokunqanda ukuginqika kwamaloli, omunye ozofaka phakathi ukususwa ukuhanjiswa kwempahla emgwaqeni ihanjiswe ngezitimela, ngethemba lokuthi lokhu kuzonciphisa ingcindezi ekuthwaleni kwempahla ngamaloli.

src_text: Baagi ba rotloediwa go romela ditshwaelo tsa bona tse ba di kwadileng mo atereseng e latelang: The Director-General of Home Affairs, Private Bag X114, Pretoria,.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi licela bonke abasebenzisa umgwaqo ukuthi bahloniphe imithetho yomgwaqo ngokuthi baqaphele, bacabangele futhi babekezelele abanye abantu abasebenzisa umgwaqo.

src_text: Mogala: 012 406  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: Abashayeli abashayela bephuze amanzi amponjwana noma bethathe izidakamizwa kanjalo nokushayela budedengu nokungakanaki, kanye nokushayela ngesivinini eseqile, yibona abadala izingozi eziningi emigwaqeni  IMithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Samiti ya Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU).
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokusetshenziswa Komngcele Owodwa (i-OSBP) wangowezi-.

src_text: Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa tla tsenela Kopano ya bo 36 ya Pulo ya Palamente ya Dinaga tsa Aforika e tla tsenelwang ke Ditlhogo tsa Dinaga le tsa Mebuso eno e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka la bo 18 go fitlha ka la bo 19 Tlhakole kwa Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze uMthethosivivinywa we-OSBP ukuthi umphakathi uphawule ngawo.

src_text: Pulo ya Palamente ya AU e tla bulwang ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “Go Potlakisiwa go Tsenngwa Tirisong AfCFTA” tla bulelwa ke Kopano e Edileng ya bo 42 ya Lekgotlakhuduthamaga e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 16 Tlhakole.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa ulandela ukugunyazwa kweNqubomgomo ye-OSBP kanye neqhingasu lokuqaliswa kwawo ngoNdasa wezi-.

src_text: Ditlhogo tsa Dinaga le tsa Mebuso ya AU di tla dirisa molaetsamogolo yono go totobatsa maikano bona go tsenya tirisong ka botlalo AfCFTA..  Leeto la Semmuso la ga Moporesitente wa Naga ya Uganda.
tgt_text: Kuhloswe ngawo ukuhambisa kahle ukuthuthwa kwabantu kanye nempahla phakathi kwemingcele yokungena eNingizimu Afrika namanye amazwe angomakhelwane.

src_text: Motlotlegi Moporesitente Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wa kwa Uganda tla etela naga ya Aforika Borwa ka Labobedi wa la bo 28 Tlhakole 2023, go latela gore Moporesitente ka ene Rre Ramaphosa mo laletse.
Maitlhomo leeto leno ke go gagamatsa botsalano jwa dinaga ka bobedi.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzokwehlisa isiminyaminya sabavakashi nabahwebi esikhona emingceleni yethu.

src_text: Leeto leno le tla garelwa ka go tshwarwa ga dikopano tsa beng ba dikgwebo ba ba batlang go gwebisana le go beeletsa mo dinageng ka bobedi..  Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa Ngwaga wa 2023 tsa Dinaga tsa Mokgatlho wa Tlhabololo ya Borwa jwa Aforika (SADC).
tgt_text: Lezi zingenelelo zibalulekile futhi emizamweni yezwe yokuqhuba iSivumelwano Sokuhwebelana Ngokukhululeka Nezwekazi i-Afrika (i-AfCFTA).

src_text: Kabinete gakolola badiredi botlhe ba bobegakgang gore Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa Ngwaga wa 2023 tsa SADC di butswe gore mmegadikgang mongwe le mongwe go tswa mo nageng nngwe le nngwe ya SADC yo batlang go di tsenela ka dira jalo mme di tla tswalelwa ka Labobedi wa la bo 28 Tlhakole..  Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa SADC di keteka tiro e tswileng diatla mo bobegakganyeng jwa makwalodikgang, jwa ditshwantsho, jwa go gasa tshedimosetso mo thelebišeneng le mo seyalemoweng mo dinageng tsa SADC ka maitlhomo go ema nokeng dikgato tsa go dirisana mmogo ga dinaga tsa kgaolo le go tshwaragana ga tsona  Melaetsa ya go Akgola.

Kabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Nomcebo Zikode, Zakes Bantwini mmog le Wouter Kellerman jaaka kwa Dikabong tsa bo 65 tsa Ngwaga le Ngwaga tsa Grammy ba kgonne go fenya maemo go diragatsa pina ka botswerere mo lefatsheng ka bophara fa ba ne ba diragatsa pina ya bona e bidiwang Bayethe  Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: batho botlhe ba ba thutseng botala ka tlhogo fa bese ba neng ba nametse ne sugagana le sejanaga se se rwalang tšhelete kwa tselafefong ya N1 kwa porofenseng ya Limpopo.
tgt_text: Izivumelwano ezibalulwe kuMthethosivivinywa zizoqinisekisa ukuthi ukuhlolisiswa kwempahla, izimoto kanye nabantu akunazihibe futhi kuyashesha.

src_text: Kabinete lakaletsa botlhe ba ba nnileng le dikgobalo mo kotsing eno pholo ya ka bonako.Rre John Moeti (yo neng na le dingwaga di le 56), yo kileng tshamekela setlhopha sa kgwele ya dinao sa Bafana Bafana le sa Orlando Pirates, yo gape nnileng le seabe se se botlhokwa thata mo go direng gore ka ngwaga wa 1996 re kgone go fenya Sejana sa Baganka ba Kgwele ya Dinao mo Dinageng tsa Aforika.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uphinde ubheke izindlela ezifanele zomthetho wamazwe ngamazwe ezihambisana nokulawulwa kohwebo, kanye nokuhamba kwabantu nempahla.

src_text: Kabinete rometse gape le matshediso kwa pusong ya Türkiye le ya Syria mmogo le kwa baagi ba dipuso ka bobedi jaaka ba latlhegetswe ke matshelo batho ba bo bona ba bantsi mmogo le go senyegelwa ke mafaratlhatlha bona a leng botlhokwa mo baaging le mo ikonomng ya bona leng seo se tlhodilweng ke thoromo kgolo ya lefatshe ka la bo 6 Tlhakole 2023 bogolo jwa yona bo balelwang go.
8 mo Sekaleng sa go Meta Dithoromo tsa Lefatshe.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokubhaliswa Kobuwena Kuzwelonke wezi-.

src_text: Re utlwela botlhoko malapa ao latlhegetsweng ke ba bo bona le bao ba santseng ba batlana le ba bo bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokubhaliswa Kobuwena Kuzwelonke wezi-2022 ukuze umphakathi uzophawula ngawo.

src_text: Kabinete rolela hutshe mekgatlho ya naga ya Aforika Borwa e samaganang le ditiro tsa go tswa baagi thuso le yona ileng koo go tswa baagi ba koo thuso.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa ungumphumela weNqubomgomo Yokuphathwa Kwemininigwane Yobuwena Ngokusemthethweni futhi ihlose ukuhlinzeka ngohlelokusebenza lukazwelonke oluyidijithali lokuphathwa kwemininingwane yobuwena olulodwa, olufaka wonke umuntu phakathi futhi oluhlanganisile lwabo bonke abantu abahlala noma abake bahlala kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Kabinete rolela hutshe yo mongwe wa mapodisi Aforika Borwa setlhopha sa yuniti ya K-9 yo bogatlhamelamasisi jwa gagwe, gareng ga dilo tse dingwe tse dintsi, bo dirileng gore go feletswe go kgonnwe go ribolola mosadimogolo wa dingwaga di le 80 yo falotseng kotsi eno yo neng santse le ka fa gare ga dithothobolo tsa moago o ba wetseng kwa Türkiye yo ntseng ka fa teng ga mpa ya dithothobolo tseno sebaka sa go feta matsatsi le robedi  Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

Mme Azola Mayekiso thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo (CEO) wa Koporasi ya Tlamelo ka Matlole Ditheo tsa go Agela Setšhaba Dintlo..  Rre Lucas Thabiso Thiti thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG) wa Lephata la Tlhabololo le Kemonokeng ya Setheo ka fa Lefapheng la Bosiamisi le Tlhabololo ya Molaotheo..  Mme Boitumelo Mosako thapilwe go nna CEO kwa Bankatlhabololong ya Dinaga tsa Borwa jwa Aforika (DBSA)..  Rre Kabelo Rikhotso thapilwe go nna Mokaedi yo Mogolo mo Botong ya Koporasi ya Dipeeletso tsa Puso (PIC)..  Rre Matsemela Moloi thapilwe go nna Motlhankedimogolo wa Setheo sa Ditlolo tsa Molao mo Mebileng.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa osahlongozwa uzohlinzeka ngokwakhiwa kanye nokunakekelwa kwerejista labantu abayizakhamuzi futhi abangabahlali ngokugcwele.

src_text: Moatefokate Sonwabile Mancotywa thapilwe go nna Mokaedi yo seng wa Khuduthamaga mmogo le go nna gape Monnasetulo mo Botong ya Setheo sa Dijanaga tse di Putlang Mebila go Kgabaganya Melelwane ya Dinaga.
tgt_text: Uphinde unikezele ngokusungulwa kohlu lwemininingwane yabantu abaphuma kwamanye amazwe abahleli okwesikhashana kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Puo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya.
tgt_text: INkulumo yeSabelomali sangowezi-.

src_text: Kabinete leboga Puo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya 2023 e letlelelang gore dikgato tse di botlhokwa tseo di itsisitsweng ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa mo Puong ya Maemo Setšhaba di ka tlamelwa ka matlole gore di phetagadiwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisamukele isabelomali sikazwelonke sangowezi-2023 esingumphumela wezingenelelo ezibalulekile ezacaciswa kwiNkulumo Echaza Ngesimo Sezwe kaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Mo puong eo go builwe ka maano a tseneletseng go samagana le dikgwetlo tsa motlakase go fokotsa botlhokatiro, tshokolo le dikgwetlho tsa ditlhwatlhwa tse di goletseng ruri tsa dilo tse di botlhokwa, mmogo le go lwantshana le botlhokotsebe le bonweenwee.
tgt_text: INkulumo yanika imininingwane ngezinhlelo zokubhekana nenselele kagesi, zokunciphisa ukuswelakala kwemisebenzi, ububha kanye nezindleko ezenyukayo zokuphila, kubandakanya ukulwa nobugebengu nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Fa re tswelela go ema nokeng maikano rona go sonaga matlole, kgolo ya ikonomi le peeletso mmogo le megolo ya go thusa baagi ke tsona bontsi tse matlole puso diragadiwang mo go ona mo re boneng R66 bilione abelwa lephata la Thuso ya Baagi mmogo le R36 bilione e abilweng gore tlamele Megolo ya go Thusa Baagi ba ba sa Direng ba ba Wetsweng ke Mathata Ditšhelete ka Ntlha ya COVID-19 go fitlha ka la bo 31 Mopitlwe..  Mo godimo ga seno, matlole a okeditsweng mphata puso ka boraro jwa ona tla thusa go fokotsa boima jo matlole ano bo bo rweleng, segolobogolo mo go mo mererong ya boitekanelo, ya thuto, mmogo le ya ditirelo tse di botlhokwa tse di abelwang setšhaba ntle le gore se di duelele.
tgt_text: Ngesikhathi sihambelanisa izibopho zethu nobuqotho kwezezimali, ukukhula komnotho notshalomali kanye nezimali zomphakathi kuyaqhubeka nokuthola inqwaba yezinsiza zomphakathi, ezinezigidigidi ezingama-R66 ezatshelwe ukuThuthukiswa Komphakathi kanye nezigidigidi ezingama-R36 zokuxhasa ukululwa kwezibonelelo zosizo ze-COVID-19 kuze kube kuNdasa wezi-.

src_text: Pegelo ya Dipatlisiso tsa Palo ya Badiri mo Kotareng.

Kabinete leboga Pegelo ya ngwaga wa 2022 ya kotara ya bone ya Dipatlisiso tsa Palo ya Badiri mo Kotareng, mme yona le fa go se gokalo bontsha phokotsego ya dipalo tsa batho ba ba sa direng ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: Okunye futhi, izabelo ezengeziwe zayo yomithathu imikhakha kahulumeni zizosiza ukunciphisa enye yengcindezi yezimali, ikakhulukazi kwezempilo, ezemfundo, kanye nokuthunyelwa kwezidingongqangi zamahhala uma izindleko zokuhlinzeka ngezidingongqangi zikhuphuka.

src_text: Palo eno fokotsegile ka diphesente di le.
tgt_text: UCwaningo Lwezabasebenzi Lwekota.

src_text: 2 go tloga mo diphesenteng di le.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ucwaningo Lwezabasebenzi Lwekota oluvela kwabeZibalo eNingizimu Afrika lwekota yesine yangowezi-2022, olubonise ukwehla kancane kwezibalo zabantu abangasebenzi ezweni.

src_text: 9 go fitlha mo go di le.
tgt_text: Isibalo esiqinisekisiwe sehle ngamaphesenti angu-.
2 kusuka kuma-.

src_text: Makala otlhe mo setšhabeng go ikuelwa mo go ona go nna le seabe mo go tlholeng ditiro gore re kgone go tswelela go fokotsa dipalo tsa batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro tse di rekotileng mo tsamaong ya nako ya dikotara di le tharo tse di fetileng.
tgt_text: 9% kuya kuma-.

src_text: Ka go emana nokeng re ka kgona go phutlhamisa bongangabele jwa botlhokatiro ka fa nageng ya rona.
tgt_text: 7%..  Yonke imikhakha yomphakathi iyacelwa ukuthi ize namathuba okusungula imisebenzi ukuze sizoqhubeka sehlise inani labantu abangasebenzi njengoba kubonakele emakoteni amathathu edlule.

src_text: Puso santse eme ka boikano jwa yona jwa Leano la Tsosoloso le Kagosešwa ya Ikonomi (ERRP), leo le tsenyeletsang letsholo la rona le legolo la go thapa batho ba bantsi mo ditirelong tsa setšhaba mmogo le dikgato tsa go ema nokeng kgolo ya ikonomi e oketsang ditiro go latela gore re sutlhe mo dinaleng tsa phage ya COVID-.
tgt_text: Ngokusebenza ngokubambisana, singalunqamula lolu khondolo lokuswelakala kwemisebenzi esizweni sakithi.

src_text: Dikgang tse di ka ga Motlatsamoporesitente.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usalokhu ezinikele kuHlelo Lokwakha Kabusha Nokuvuselela Umnotho (i-ERRP), olubandakanya uhlelo lwethu olukhulu lokuqashwa kwabantu kanye nemizamo yokweseka ukukhula komnotho okuqinisa amathuba emisebenzi emva kokukhahlanyezwa i-COVID-.

src_text: Kabinete totobatsang kgang ya gore ke boammaruri gore Motlatsamoporesitente Rre David Mabuza rotse tiro jaaka Tokololo ya Palamente, mme paka ya gagwe ya go nna Motlatsamoporesitente wa naga fitlhile kwa bokhutlhong.
tgt_text: IPhini likaMongameli.

src_text: Kabinete le yona eme ka lefoko la ga Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ka go leboga go menagane Motlatsamoporesitente ka tiro e tswileng diatla a diretseng naga mo sebakeng sa go feta dingwaga di le tlhano.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liqinisekisa ukuthi iPhini likaMongameli u-David Mabuza usesulile njengeLunga lePhalamende, lokho okuqeda isikhathi sakhe njengePhini likaMongameli wezwe.

src_text: Motlatsamoporesitente Mabuza diretse naga ka botswapelo mme tiro a diretseng setšhaba mo go ageng naga ya rona tla nna mo megopolong ya baagi ba Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lihlanganyele noMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ekumubongeni ekusebenzeleni izwe ngokuncomeka eminyakeni emihlanu eyedlule.

src_text: Motlakase.
tgt_text: IPhini likaMongameli u-David Mabuza usebenze kahle kakhulu futhi igalelo lakhe ekwakheni izwe esilifunayo lizohlale likhunjulwa ngabantu baseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete tlhaloganya sentle tšhakgalo ya baagi le dikgwebo mabapi le ditshitiso le dikgoreletsi tse di tlhodiwang ke motlakase o tshabetseng ruri.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Ditsholofetso tse di dirilweng mo Puong ya Maemo Setšhaba mmogo le matlole a rebotsweng ke Tekanyetsokabo di tla dira gore puso kgone go phetagatsa ka bonako ditharabololo tse di kwadilweng mo Leanong la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakuqonda ukukhungatheka kwezakhamuzi namabhizinisi ngenxa yokubambezeleka nokuphazamiseka okudalwe ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga okubelesele.

src_text: Melawanataolo e senang go phasaladiwa ke Tona ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso ya Molao wa Maemo Masetlapelo Naga neela puso maatla go ka samagana ka tshwanelo le matsapa a gaketseng re tobaneng le ona tlhaelo ya motlakase mmogo le go dira jalo ka bonako jo bo tlhokagalang.
tgt_text: Izibopho zeNkulumo Echaza Ngesimo Sezwe kanye nokwabiwa kweSabelomali kuqinisa ikhono lombuso lokusheshisa ngezingenelelo ezichazwe kuHlelo Lokusebenza Lwezamandla.

src_text: Se sengwe gape se se botlhokwa ke gore dira gore go nne le go rwala maikarabelo le go tlhoka lehunelo ka go dira gore mafapha nne ona a disang makala ano.
tgt_text: Imithethonqubo yeSimo Senhlekelele Kuzwelonke esanda kushicilelwa nguNgqongqoshe Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana Nezindaba Zendabuko ivumela uhulumeni ukuthi abhekane ngempumelelo futhi nangesivinini esidingekayo nezinkinga zokuthunyelwa kukagesi.

src_text: Gangwe le gape go tla tshwanelwa gore go rebolwe dipegelo ka sengwe le sengwe seo se dirilweng.
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kwalokhu, iqinisekisa ukusebenza obala kanye nokuziphendulela kweminyango ekwaziyo ukubonisa indlela imikhakha yayo.

src_text: Go phimolwa ga sekoloto sa bokanaka R254 bilione sa Eskom, go go tla diragadiwang fa setheo seno se dumela gore se tla ikobela dikgato tse di gagamaditsweng, se tla fokoletsa setheo seno matsapa mantsi mme sa kgona gore se simolole go tsaya dikgato tse di tlhokengang go tsewa tsa go beeletsa le go tlhokomela le go tsosolosa meago le dithoto tsa setheo seno.
tgt_text: Imibiko ngokuqhubekayo izolokhu ikhishwa njalo-nje.

src_text: Go se duedisiwe lekgetho gore letsholo la go tsenya dirisiwa tse di pegiwang mo marulelong tsa motlakase o fetlhiwang ka letsatsi le kgone go diragadiwa go tla thusa seng fela malapa batho le dikgwebo gore ba kgone go iphetlhela motlakase mme gape go tla thusa le gore diyuniti tsa tlamelo ya motlakase ka fa nageng di nne le motlakase.
tgt_text: Usizo ngesikweletu sezigidigidi ezingama-R254, oluzokhishwa ngaphansi kwezimo eziqinile luzokwehlisa ingcindezi enkulu ku-Eskom futhi lumuvumele ukuthi aqhube utshalomali olufanele nokunakekela iziphehlimandla.

src_text: Ka letsholo la go oketsa merokotso ya dikgwebo, fa dikgwebo di beeletsa mo motlakaseng wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa, di tla kgona go dira kopo ya gore mo diporojekeng tsotlhe tsa motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa di fokolediwa lekgetho ka diphesente di le 125 mo ngwageng wa ntlha, mme go se nne le methamo e beewang ya gore ba ba tlhagisang motlakase ba se fete.
tgt_text: Izikhuthazi zentela ezizokhishelwa amaphaneli elanga abekwa ophahleni lwendlu, ngeke nje zisize amakhaya namabhizinisi ukuthi aziphehlele ugesi wawo kodwa lokhu kuzophinde kweseke isizinda sikagesi kuzwelonke.

src_text: Dipuisano tse di ka ga Megolo ya Badiredipuso.
tgt_text: Ngaphansi kohlelo lwezikhuthazi zamabhizinisi, ukutshala izimali kugesi ovuselelekayo kuzovumela amabhizinisi ukuthi afake isicelo sokudonselwa amaphesenti ayi-125 onyakeni wokuqala kuyoyonke imiklamo kagesi ovuselelekayo, ngokunganamkhawulo kumthamo wokuphehla ugesi.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go botlhe ba ba tsayang karolo mo dithulaganyong tsa Ditumelano tsa Lekgotla la Ditharabololo tsa Dipuisano tsa Merero ya Ditiro tsa Badiredipuso mo go Fitlhelele Ditumelano tse Maphata Otlhe Dumelanang ka Tsona go se iphapose dithulaganyo tseno, gore go fitlhelelwe ditharabololo tse di tla tswelang naga mosola.
tgt_text: Izingxoxo Zamaholo.

src_text: Go botlhokwa gore re dirisane sentle mmogo gore naga ya rona le setšhaba sa rona re di tswele mosola.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi licela wonke amaqembu ukuthi ahlale ezinikele kwinqubo yeSivumelwano Somkhandlu Oxoxisana Ngamaholo Abasebenzi Bakahulumeni, nokuthi bafike kwisisombululo esizosebenzela kahle izwe.

src_text: Le fa le gore molao letleletse gore batho ba ka tsenela megwanto, megwanto eno tshwanetse go diragadiwa ka tsela e nang le maikarabelo e ikobelang melao ya rona ya temokerasi.
tgt_text: Kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi sisebenze ngokubambisana ukuze senzele kahle izwe lethu nabantu bakithi.

src_text: Kabinete gakolola bao ba leng mo maanong go tsenela megwanto gore ba tshwanetse go dira jalo ka tsela e senang mmodubudu, mme ga ba tshwanela go rumulana le batho ba bangwe kgotsa go tlhatlhamolola mafaratlhatlha le dithoto tsa naga le tsa batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: Ngesikhathi ilungelo lokubhikisha livikelekile, kumele kwenziwe ngendlela efanele eqhakambisa intando yeningi labantu kanye nomthetho.

src_text: Go Lwantshana le Bonweenwee.
Kabinete eme ka lefoko le le lengwe le Moporesitente mo go direng boikuelo jwa gagwe mo go Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo wa Eskom Rre Andre de Ruyter gore lebe kwa mapodising go ya go tlhatlhela kgetse.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhumbuza wonke umuntu ukuthi labo abahlela ukubhikisha kufanele bakwenze lokho ngendlela enokuthula, futhi kufanele bayeke ukusabisa noma ukucekela phansi izingqalasizinda kanye nezakhiwo..  Ukulwa nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Ditheo tsa naga ya rona tsa go lwantshana le botlhokotsebe di malalaalaotswe go tshwara le go sekisa bao ba tlolang molao.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lihlanganyele noMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa kwisicelo sakhe esibhekiswe kobeyi-CEO yakwa-Eskom u-Andre de Ruyter ukuthi abike izinsolo zenkohlakalo ebeyenzeka kwa-Eskom emaphoyiseni.

src_text: Re ikuela mo go motho yo mongwe le yo mongwe yo go nang le sengwe se se itseng ka bogodu le bonweenwee jo batho ba bangwe ba bo dirang go loma mapodisi tsebe.
tgt_text: Izikhungo zethu ezilwa nobugebengu zime ngomumo ukubopha, kanye nokushushisa izephulamthetho.

src_text: Yo mongwe le yo mongwe wa rona na le maikarabelo go lwantshana le bonweenwee ao motlhankedi yo mongwe le yo mongwe yo leng mo maemong a kwa godimo mo ditheong tsa puso le tsa poraefete a rwesiwang ke Molao wa go Thibela le go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa Bonweenwee, go bega ditiragalo tseno tsotlhe tsa bonweenwee.
tgt_text: Sicela noma ubani onolwazi oluhlobene nobugebengu nenkohlakalo ukuthi abike lokho akwaziyo kwiziphathimandla ezifanele zezomthetho.

src_text: Sepodisi sa Ditirelo tsa Matlole (FATF).
tgt_text: Sonke sinomsebenzi wokulwa nenkohlakalo futhi ngokwemiyalelo yoMthetho Wokunqanda Nokulwa Nezenzo Zenkohlakalo, odinga abantu “abasezikhundleni eziphezulu” kuhulumeni nakwimikhakha ezimele ukuthi babike zonke izenzo zenkohlakalo.

src_text: Kabinete sekegela tsebe tshwetso e tserweng ke ba FATF e ka ga go baya naga ya Aforika Borwa mo maemong a kwa godimo dinaga tseo tsamaiso ya madi mo go tsona tshwanetsweng go lebelelwa ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho gore madi go tswa mo nageng eno ga romelwe digongwana tsa dimenolopuso mme seno se itsegwe ka gore ke FATF’s “grey list”.
tgt_text: I-Financial Action Task Force (i-FATF).

src_text: Le fa FAFT dumela gore naga eno setse dirile go tlala seatla mo go samaganeng le matsapa a nopotsweng mo Pegelong ya Ditshekatsheko tsa Dikarolo tse go Dumelanweng ka Tsona (MER) tlhomamisitse gore go santse go na le dilo tse dintsi tse di santseng di tlhoka go diriwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisiphawulile isinqumo se-Financial Action Task Force (i-FATF) sokufaka iNingizimu Afrika ohlwini lokulawulwa ngemithetho ethile ngaphansi kokuqashwa ngeso lokhozi noma ngalokhu okwaziwa ngokuthi yi-“grey list” ye-FATF.

src_text: Kabinete itse sentle gore go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di santseng di tlhoka go rarabololwa tseno go tla tswela naga ya Aforika Borwa mosola o seng kana ka sepe.
tgt_text: Ngesikhathi i-FATF iyibona inqubekelaphambili eyenziwe yizwe ekubhekaneni nezinkinga ezigqanyiswe embikweni wokuhlolwa kwezwe (i-MER), ithole ukuthi kuningi okusamele kwenziwe.

src_text: Puso ikemiseditse go pheta ka pejana tiro eno gore kgone go tokafatsa maemo yona go lwantshana le ditiragalo tsa go tlhatswa tšhelete ya bogodu mmogo le tsa go fetisetsana madi go neelwa digongwana tsa menolopuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyazi ukuthi ukubhekana nalezi zinkinga ezitholiwe kuzokwenzela kahle iNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Leeto la Moporesitente wa Naga ya Ugandan go Etela ka fa Nageng ka Mabaka Tiro.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uzinikele ukusebenza ngokushesha ukuqinisa ukusebenza kahle kombuso olwa nokuhlanzwa kwemali kanye nokuxhasa ngezimali izenzo zobuphekula.

src_text: Kabinete itumeletse leeto le le tsamaileng sentle la semmuso go jelwa nala ke Moporesitente Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wa naga ya Rephaboliki ya Uganda go jela nala naga Aforika Borwa ka la bo 28 Tlhakole..  Mo leetong leno Ditlhogo tsa Mebuso ka bobedi ga bona ba ne ba ema ka lefoko Kopano ya Beng ba Dikgwebo, mmogo le go sekaseka ka fao dinaga tseno di ka gwebisanang ka gona le go beeletsana.
tgt_text: Ukuvakasha Kombuso wase-Uganda.

src_text: Ba ne gape ya nna dipaki tsa fa go saeniwa Memorantamo wa go Utlwanela Ditumelano (MoU) mo maphateng mantsinyana a farologaneng a akaretsang: Koporasi ya Tlhabololo ya Diintaseteri (IDC), Bojanala; Dipalangwa; Didirisiwa tsa Thekenoloji ya Ditlhaeletsano; Ditirelo tsa kwa Kgolegelong tsa go Thusa Batshwariwa go Nna Batho mo Setšhabeng; mmogo le le mo go Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba nang le Bogolofadi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele Ukuvakasha Kombuso eNingizimu Afrika okube yimpumelelo kukaMongameli u-Yoweri Kaguta Museveni waseRiphabhulikhi yase-Uganda mhla wama-28 kuNhlolanja..  Ngesikhathi sokuvakasha, zombili iZinhloko Zombuso zikhulume kwiSigcawu Samabhizinisi, zahlolisisa amathuba okuhweba notshalomali.

src_text: Naga ya Rephaboliki ya Uganda ke naga e leng mo maemong bo 15 mo dinageng tseo di gwebisanang le naga ya Aforika Borwa mo Kontinenteng bile gape mo maemong bobedi mo dinageng tse di gwebisanang le rona tsa kwa Borwa ja Aforika.
tgt_text: Ziphinde zaba ngofakazi ekusayinweni kweZivumelwano Zokuzwana (i-MoU) emikhakheni eminingi, ebandakanya: iNhlangano Yokuthuthukiswa Kwezimboni, Ezokuvakasha; Ezokuthutha; Ubuchwepheshe Bezokuxhumana; Ezokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo; kanye Nabesifazane, Intsha naBantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka.

src_text: Magare ga ngwaga wa 2017 le wa 2021 kgwebisano mo dinageng tseno ka bobedi ne ya oketsega go fitlha go R3 bilione.
tgt_text: IRiphabhulikhi yase-Uganda ingumlingani we-15 omkhulu kwezokuhwebelana eZwenikazini kanye nowesibili omkhulu eMpumalanga Afrika.

src_text: Samiti ya Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU).
tgt_text: Phakathi kowezi-2017 nowezi-2021, ukuhwebelana sekukonke phakathi kwala mazwe womabili kwafinyelela kwizigidigidi ezi-R.  INgqungquthela yeNhlangano Yobumbano Lwamazwe ase-Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ne eteletse pele baromiwa ba naga ya Aforika Borwa kwa Samiting ya AU e neng tshwaretswe kwa Ethiopia ka molaetsamogolo o reng, “Go Potlakisa Lebelo la go Tsenya Tirisong Letsholo le le Sutisang Dikgoreletsi mo Kgwebisanong ya Dinaga tsa Aforika (AfCFTA).
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa uhole ithimba laseNingizimu Afrika kwiNgqungquthela yeNhlangano Yobumbano Lwamazwe ase-Afrika e-Ethiopia ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi “Ukuqhuba Ngesivinini Ukuqaliswa Kwendawo Yokuhwebelana Kwamazwe ase-Afrika (i-AfCFTA)”.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa neelane ka tshedimosetso ya go baya mo dinakong maloko AU gore yona ke eng se setseng se dirile mo go tsenyeng tirisong AfCFTA.Jaaka naga ya rona le Monnasetulo mo Lekgotlheng la Merero ya Kagiso le Pabalesego la AU, naga ya rona neelane gape le ka tshedimosetso e ka ga seo setseng se dirile mo go thuseng go diragatsa Letsholo la 2030 la go Fedisa Dintwa mo Kontinenteng ya Aforika.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika inikeze ngokwakamuva ekuqalisweni kwendawo Yokuhwebelana Kwamazwe ase-Afrika.

src_text: Jaaka Moporesitente Ramaphosa le ene yo di gogang kwa pele mo Letsholong la AU la Merero ya COVID-19 ne tlhalosa gape le gore ke eng se se ka diriwang go matlafatsa Setheo sa Aforika sa Twantsho le Thibelo ya Malwetse gore kontinente kgone go ithulaganya sentle gore kgone go ema sejaro kgatlhanong le maroborobo mangwe.
tgt_text: NjengoSihlalo woMkhandlu we-AU Wezokuthula Nezokuvikeleka, leli lizwe liphinde labika ngenqubekelaphambili ngoHlelo Lokuqedwa Kwezibhamu e-Afrika ngowezi-..  Njengohamba phambili ku-AU ezindabeni eziphathelene ne-COVID-19, uMongameli u-Ramaphosa wethule iziphakamiso zokuthi iZikhungo zase-Afrika Ezilawula Izifo (i-CDC) zingaqiniswa kanjani futhi izinyathelo zingathathwa kanjani ukulungiselela izwekazi ukubhekana nezifo ezilubhubhane.

src_text: Ka ntlha ya boeteledipele jwa Moporesitente Ramaphosa, Setlhopha sa Tiro ya go Rekela Kontinente ya Aforika Meento ya COVID-19 se sele sa tlhomiwa gore se eme nokeng Leano la Meento la Aforika.
tgt_text: Ngaphansi kobuholi bukaMongameli u-Ramaphosa, iThimba Elibhekele Ukutholakala Komgomo we-COVID-19 e-Afrika lasungulwa ngenhloso yokweseka iQhingasu Lomgomo lase-Afrika.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa ne gape ya rekela kontinente mabotlolwana meento ya COVID-19 le dimilione di feta di le dimilione di le.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika iphinde yatholela izwekazi umgomo we-COVID-19 ongaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-.

src_text: Mo godimo ga tseno tsotlhe, go ne gape ga tlhomiwa le Letlole la Aforika la go Lwantshana le Leroborobo leo le kgonneng go bokeletsa madi le kanaka ditolara di le dimilione di le 137 gore dirisediwe go tlhagisa meento ka fa nageng, go tlhatlhoba, go reka didirisiwa tsa go itshireletsa mo bolwetseng jwa COVID-19, metšhini ya go thusa balwetse go hema le melemo mengwe e botlhokwa.
tgt_text: Okunye futhi, iSikhwama Esibhekele Ukulwisana Nobhubhane sase-Afrika sasungulwa, nesathola izigidi eziyi-$137 ukuze kuzokhiqizwa imigomo khona lapha ekhaya, izinsiza zokuxilonga, izinsizakusebenza zokuzivikela, i-oksijini kanye nemithi ebalulekile.

src_text: Setheo sa go Tlamela Aforika ka Melemo le sone se ne sa tlhomiwa gore se dire bonnete jwa gore dinaga tsotlhe tsa Aforika di tlamelwa ka melemo e botlhokwa.
tgt_text: INkundla Yemikhiqizo Yezokwelapha e-Afrika nayo yethulwa, ukuqinisekisa ukufinyelela kwimithi yokwelapha ebalulekile kwawo wonke amazwe ase-Afrika..  Udlame Olubhekiswe Kwabobulili Obuthile Nokubulawa Kwabesifazane.

src_text: Ditiragalo tsa go Bogisa le go Bolaya Batho ba Sesadi.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni ugxeka kakhulu izigameko ezilokhu zibelesele zodlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane (i-GBVF) futhi uyaqhubeka nokuqinisa izindlela zokulwa ngokusebenzisa izingenelelo eziningana.

src_text: Puso kgalema ka mafoko a bogale ditiragalo tse di sa khutseng tsa go bogisa le go bolaya batho ba sesadi mme tsweletse go gagamatsa dikgato tsa yona tse dintsinyana tsa go lwantshana le seno.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubandakanya izinguquko ezinkulu kwezomthetho, ukusungulwa kweSikhwama Sokulwa ne-GBVF, kanye nokweseka iZikhungo Zokunakekela iThuthuzela neKhuseleka, ezihlinzeka ngezinsizakalo ezibalulekile kulabo abasinde ku-GBV..  Ngale kwalokho, ukusebenzisana uhulumeni akusungulile nomphakathi, amabhizinisi, abalingani kwezentuthuko, umkhakha wezenkolo kanye neminye imikhakha ukuthi kusetshenzwe ngokubambisana ukulwa nalesi sihlava se-GBVF, kusalokhu kubaluleke kakhulu.

src_text: Tsona di tsenyeletsa dikgato tse dintsi tsa go kwalola sešwa melao, go tlhoma Letlole la go Lwantshana le GBVF mmogo le go ema nokeng Mafelo go Gomotsa le go Thoba Maikutlo Bao ba Fetileng mo Mathateng go Bogisiwa mo Dikgolaganong tsa Lorato leng mafelo a abelang batswasetlhabelo bano thuso kgolo tota.
tgt_text: Ezempilo.

src_text: Mo godimo ga seno, tirisanommogo puso e tlhomileng magareng ga yona le mekgatlho ya baagi, badirisanimmogo ba yona mo mererong ya tlhabololo, dikereke le mo makaleng mangwe ka go sikara mmogo tiro eno go lwantshana le bothata jono jwa GBVF santse le botlhokwa mo go maswe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele izingxoxo eziyingqophamlando zoMhlangano Womhlaba Kwezokwelashwa Wokuqhamuka Nezindlela Zokuvimbela Izifo izwe ebeliwusingathe ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi “Sakha isivumelwano senkundla kwezokwelashwa ezoqhamuka nezindlela zokuvimbela ubhubhane olulandelayo okuzofinyeleleka kuyona ngokulinganayo futhi ngendlela esimeme.”.

src_text: Boitekanelo.
tgt_text: Umhlangano ubhekisise izindlela zokuthola ukufinyelela okulinganayo kwimigomo esindisa izimpilo, ukuxilongwa kanye nokwelashwa kwezifo ezilubhubhane ezingaqhamuka ngokuya kwesidingo hhayi ngokwengcebo.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dipuisano tse dikgolo tsa Kopano ya go Atlhaatlha Dikgato tsa Baoki mo Lefatsheng tsa go Thibela Maroborobo mme kopano eno ne eteletswe kwa pele ke naga ya rona le nngwe ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “Go dumelana ka go nna le serala se se tshwarang batho ka go lekana se se tla nnelang ruri sa dikgato tsa baoki mo lefatsheng tsa go thibela maroborobo gore ke nne mosola mo maroborobong a ka nnang teng kamoso.”.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuqalise ngokuthola isivumelwano ngaphambi koMhlangano Osezingeni Eliphezulu Omayelana Nokugwenywa Kwezifo Ezilubhubhane, Ukuzilungiselela kanye Nokubhekana nazo eMhlanganweni Wenhlangano Yobumbano Lwamazwe ase-Afrika yama-78 kulo nyaka.

src_text: Mo kopanong eno go tšhotlhilwe kgang e ka ga ka fao mo isagong meento e pholosang matshelo batho ka abelwang dinaga ka go lekalekana, go abelana ka ditirelo tsa go tlhatlhobiwa le go neelwa melemo go ya ka gore di tlhokagala go le go kanakang seng go ya ka gore ke mang yo itsholetseng.
tgt_text: Ngakolunye udaba oluhlobene nalolu, iNgqungquthela Yezamakhambi Endabuko ebisingathwe uMnyango Wezempilo iyingxenye yezisombululo ezathathwa kwiNhlangano Yomhlaba Yezempilo (i-WHO), iNhlangano Yobumbano Lwamazwe ase-Afrika kanye neNhlangano Yamazwe Asathuthuka aseNingizimu ye-Afrika (i-SADC) ukuthi kuhlanganiswe amakhambi endabuko ohlelweni lokusebenza lwezempilo.

src_text: Seno se ne sa dira gore go nne le dilo tse go dumelanwang ka tsona pele go ka simololwa ka Kopano ya Maemo a kwa Godimo e ka ga go Thibela Leroborobo, go Ipaakanyetsa Lona le go Samagana le Lona kwa Kopanokgothakgotheng ya bo 78 ya Dinagakopano monongwaga.
tgt_text: Ukugonywa Kwabantwana neSifo Sohudo.

src_text: Mo go nngwe ya ditiragalo seng tse di tsamaisanang le se re buileng ka sona mo godimo, ke tshwetso ya go dira gore melemo ya setso le yona dirisiwe mo maokelong mme tshwetso eno tserwe mo Kopanong ya mo malobeng ya Melemo ya Setso e neng tsenetswe ke Lefapha la Boitekanelo, Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Merero ya Boitekanelo (WHO), Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU) mmogo le Dinaga tse di Dirisanang Mmogo tse di kwa Borwa jwa Aforika (SADC).
tgt_text: Ukuqubuka kwesimungumungwane kuyingozi ebantwaneni abangagonyiwe.

src_text: Go Tlhabela Bana Moento wa Mmoko le Kholera.
tgt_text: Abazali nabaqaphi abasemthethweni babantwana bayanxuswa ukuthi baqinisekise ukuthi abantwana babo bayagonywa njengengxenye yomkhankaso kazwelonke wokugonywa kwabantwana.

src_text: Mmoko yo weleng ka nna kotsi mo baneng ba ba iseng ba tlhabele moento wa mmoko.
tgt_text: Izimpawu zesimungumungwane zibandakanya imfiva, amehlo abomvu, ukugxaza kwamakhala nokukhwehlela, ezivame ukuvela ngaphambi kokuqubuka emzimbeni.

src_text: Go ikuelwa mo batsading le mo bagodising ba bana go dira bonnete jwa gore bana ba bona ba tlhabelwa moento jaaka go na le letsholo la go tlhabela bana botlhe moento ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: Kulandela ukuqubuka kwakamuva kwezigameko zesifo sohudo, iKhabhinethi linxusa izakhamuzi ukuthi ziqaphele noma yiziphi izimpawu, ezibala ukuphelelwa ngamanzi emzimbeni ngenxa yohudo, ukuhlanza kanye nobuntekenteke bomzimba.

src_text: Matshwao mmoko ke a akaretsang go fisa mo mmeleng, go hibila matlho, go elaela dinko le go gotlhola, go tšhipoga diso tse disesane.
tgt_text: Sisabalala kakhulu ngamanzi angcolile noma ukudla okunamagciwane, umphakathi uyakhunjuzwa ngokuthi ubilise amanzi, upheke ukudla kuvuthwe, kanye nokulandela izindlela zenhlanzeko zokuhlanza izandla ngensipho namanzi ukugwema ukusulelana.

src_text: Ka ntlha ya dikgetse tse di ntseng di begiwa sešweng jaana tsa batho ba ba tshwerweng ke kholera, Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go ikelatlhoko gore ga ba na matshwao ape go tshwana le go felelwa ke metsi mo mmeleng ka ntlha ya letshololo, go tlhatsa le go tlhoka maatla mo mmeleng.
tgt_text: Bonke abantu abanezimpawu ezifana nezesifo sohudo, abake bavakashela amazwe angaphandle nabangakaze, kufanele baphuthume ngokushesha esikhungweni sezempilo esiseduze nabo..  Ukutholakala kwamanzi.

src_text: Ka ntlha ya fa bolwetse jono bo anama ka ntlha ya go dirisa metsi a kgotlhelegileng le dijo tse di tshwaetsegileng, baagi ba elediwa gore ba bedise metsi, ba buduse dijo le go itlwaetsa go tlhapa diatla ka metsi sesepa gore ba nne phepa gore ba kgone go thibela go anama ga bolwetse jono.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukwethulwa kwesigcinamanzi esikhulukazi ezwekazini, i-Vlakfontein Reservoir e-Gauteng, esingagcina amanzi angafika kumalitha ayizigidi ezingama-210 alingana namahora angama-24 amanzi adingekayo, okulindeleke ukuthi siphothulwe ngoMbasa wezi-.

src_text: Batho botlhe ba ba ikutlwang ba na le matshwao a tshwanang le kholera ka tswa ba kile ba tswa ka fa nageng kgotsa ba ise ba tswe ka naga, ba tshwanetse go leba kwa bookelong jo bo gaufi le bona.
tgt_text: Lo mklamo usungule amathuba emisebenzi angama-220 emiphakathini yendawo kanye nemisebenzi eyi-110 kuMasipala Wendawo wase-Ekurhuleni.

src_text: Go se Felelwe ke Metsi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi licele abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi bavikele ingqalasizinda yethu yamanzi ngokubika ngokucekelwa kwayo phansi emaphoyiseni ku-0800 10111 futhi babike nangokuvuza kwamanzi kumasipala wendawo.

src_text: Kabinete itumeletse go thakgololwa ga bodutelo jo bogolo ka fa nageng jwa metsi jwa Vlakfontein Reservoir kwa Gauteng, jo bo kgonang go boloka dilitara di le dimilione di le 210 tsa metsi tse di kgonang go tlamela metsi bosigo le motshegare mme tiro e setseng mo bodutelong jono jwa metsi go solofetswe gore tla garela ka Moranang.
tgt_text: Izakhamuzi zingadlala indima yazo ekusebenziseni amanzi ngokuwonga.

src_text: Porojeke eno tlhodile ditiro di le 220 tseo mo go tsona go thapilweng baagi ba ba tswang mo lefelong leo mmogo le tse dingwe di le 110 mo Masepaleng wa Selegae wa Ekurhuleni.
tgt_text: Isimo esibi sezulu.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo go maAforika Borwa gore ba tlhokomele mafaratlhatlha naga ya rona metsi ka go loma sepodisi tsebe fa go na le bao ba senyang mo go 0800 10111 mmogo le go itsise masepala wa gaeno fa go na le mafaratlhatlha a dutlang metsi.
tgt_text: Ukuzilungiselela kwamathimba eZokulawulwa Kwenhlekelele kunciphise umthelela wezimvula ezinkulu, nezidlondlobaliswe isishingishane u-Freddy esithinte izingxenye ezisenyakatho-mpumalanga yeNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Baagi le bona ba ka thusa ka go sonaga metsi.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uyaqhubeka nokuhlanganisa zonke izinsiza ezikhona njengengxenye yesimo senhlekelele kuzwelonke ukweseka imizamo yokutakula ezingxenyeni ezithintwe izikhukhula.

src_text: Dipula tse di Bogale.
tgt_text: Umoya woBuntu waboniswa ngama-NGO amaningi, umphakathi, amabhizinisi kanye nezinhlangano zosizo ezelule isandla kulabo abadinga usizo.

src_text: Ka ntlha ya go ema sejaro ga ditlhopha tsa Tlhokomelo ya Masetlapelo, naga kgonne go fokotsa bogale jwa ditshenyegelo tse di bakilweng ke dipula, tseo di galefisitsweng ke ditsuatsue tsa cyclone Freddy tseo di setlileng dikarolo tsa ka fa bokone le botlhaba jwa Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Ukuvuka kwethu kuzothatha umzamo omkhulu kakhulu, uma sibheke izinsiza namakhono esizwe sethu sisonke.

src_text: Puso tswelela go bokeletse metswedi yotlhe e ka re tswang thuso re nang le yona go nna karolo ya letsholo la maemo masetlapelo ka fa nageng go thusa go busetsa maemo sekeng mo mafelong a gogotsweng ke merwalela e nnileng teng.
tgt_text: Abahlali bayanxuswa ukuthi bahlale ezindlini ngezikhathi zezimvula neziphepho, bangazami ukuhamba, ukubhukuda noma ukushayela emanzini ageleza ngesivinini noma emifuleni, futhi abantu abahlala ezindaweni ezingumehlelo kufanele baqaphelisise izexwayiso zesimo sezulu bese bethatha izinyathelo zokuphepha ezifanele.

src_text: Re bone Mekgatlho e Seng ya Puso (di-NGO) mentsi dira Botho mmogo le baagi le dikgwebo le mekgatlho e thusang batho e thusitseng batho ba ba neng ba tlhoka thuso.
tgt_text: ISikimu Sikazwelonke Soxhasomali Lwabafundi (i-NSFAS).

src_text: Go busetsa maemo sekeng go tla tlhoka gore re tsaye matsapa magolo, re tla tlhoka go sola mosola sengwe le sengwe se re nang le sona le bokgoni bongwe le bongwe jo sešhaba sa rona se nang le jona.
tgt_text: I-NSFAS imele uhlelo oluya phambili lukahulumeni lokunqamula ukhondolo lokungalingani kwezenhlalo kwimfundo ephakeme nokuqeqeshwa.

src_text: Go ikuelwa mo baaging gore ba nne ka fa dintlong fa dipula di tshologa, ba seke ba leka go kgabaganya ka maoto, go thuma kgotsa go kgabaganya ka dijanaga metsi a sianang kgotsa dinoka, mme le baagi ba ba nnang mo mafelong a tamang metsi ka bontsi ba tshwanetse go tsaya tsia melaetsa ya go lemosa baagi ka dipula tsa matlakadibe mme ba tsaye dikgato go itlhokomela.
tgt_text: Ngaphandle kwezinselele, i-NSFAS yenze inqubekelaphambili ebonakalayo, ngokuxhasa abafundi abangaphezu kwesigidi esisodwa ngesabelomali esihlongozwayo sezigidigidi ezingama-R..  Abafundi abanezicelo zoxhasomali ezichithiwe, bangafaka izikhalazo ngobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje ku-Independent Appeals Tribunal ngokusebenzisa i-myNSFAS Portal (https://my.nsfas.org.za/).

src_text: Sekema sa Bosetšhaba sa Thuso ya Ditšhelete ya Baithuti (NSFAS).
tgt_text: Ukubhalisela ukuvota ngobuchwepheshe.

src_text: NSFAS ke letsholo le le mosola la puso le maitlho lona leng go fedisa khumanego le go se lekalekane mo baaging fa ba tshnwanetse go tsweletsa dithuto kwa ditheong tse digolwane tsa thuto le katiso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi licela bonke abavoti abafanelekile ukuthi babhalise ngokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje ku-https://registertovote.elections.org.za ukuze bezovota oKhethweni Lukazwelonke Nolwezifundazwe lwangowezi-..  IKhomishana Yezokhetho yethule umkhankaso wokubhalisela ukuvota ngobuchwepheshe besimanje mhla wama-20 kuNhlolanja 2023, yabe seyinxusa intsha efanelekile ukuvota ukuthi ibhalise ukuze izosebenzisa ilungelo layo lentando yeningi labantu lokuvota.

src_text: Le fa go na le dikgwetlho, NSFAS kgonne go tokafatsa maemo tota, ya tlamela baithuti ba feta ba le milione ka madi a kanaka R47 bilione a beetsweng tiro eno.
tgt_text: Izakhamuzi esezakubhalisela ukuvota nazo ziyagqugquzelwa ukuthi zibheke ukuthi zivotela kuphi, bese befaka imininingwane emisha yalapho behlala khona uma beke bathutha emva kokhetho olwedlule.

src_text: Baithuti botlhe ba dikopo tsa bona di sa atlegang ba ka dira boikuelo mo inthaneteng gore di sekasekiwe sešwa ke Bothati jwa go Dira Boikuelo jo bo seng ka fa Tlase ga Setheo Seno ka go dirisa Serala sa Webesaete sa myNSFAS mo go https://my.nsfas.org.za/.
tgt_text: Abavoti kufanele babhalise lapho behlala khona, bese bevota lapho bebhalise khona.

src_text: Ikwadiso mo Inthaneteng ya go Tsenela Ditlhopho.
tgt_text: Ufanelekile ukubhalisela ukuvota uma:Uyisakhamuzi saseNingizimu Afrika;Okungenani uneminyaka eyi-16 nangaphezulu (ungakwazi ukuvota kuphela kusuka eminyakeni eyi-18); futhiUnencwadi kamazisi eluhlaza enamagabelo, ikhadi likamazisi noma isitifiketi zomazisi sesikhashana esisemthethweni.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo batlhophing botlhe ba ba nang le matshwanedi go ikwadisetsa ditlhopho tsa ngwaga wa 2024 tsa go tlhopha lekoko le le tla busang mmuso wa Naga le wa Porofense mo go https://registertovote.elections.org.za.
tgt_text: Isexwayiso seMelika (i-US).

src_text: Khomišene ya Ditlhopho thankgolotse lenaneo la go ikwadisetsa ditlhopho ka inthanete ka la bo 20 Tlhakole 2023, mme ikuetse mo bašweng ba dingwaga tsa bona di ba letlang go ka dira ditlhopho gore ba ikwadisetse gore ba kgone go sola mosola tshwanelo ya bona ya temokerasi ya go itlhophela moeteledipele.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisiphawulile isexwayiso esikhishwe iHhovisi Lenxusa lase-US njengengxenye kahulumeni wase-US yendlela yezokuxhumana nezakhamuzi zayo ezivakashele nezihlala kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Baagi ba leng gore ba setse bona ba ikwadisitse bona ba rotloediwa gore ba lekole maina bona mo lenaneong la badiradikopo, mme ba baye dintlha tsa bona mo dinakong fa le gore go sengwe se se fetogileng mo dintlheng tsa bona tse di leng mo lenaneong leno.
tgt_text: Ibonise ukuthi iSigaba sesi-2 seseluleko kwezokuvakasha sikhishiwe, ebesibeluleka ngokuthi baqaphelisise ngenxa yobugebengu nemibhikisho yemiphakathi nokuthi bathenge ngobuningi izinto abazidingayo zezinsuku ezintathu, imithi kanye nezinto zosizo lokuqala.

src_text: Badiraditlhopho ba tshwanetse go ikwadisa mo mafelong mo metseng ba nnang mo go yona mmogo le go dira ditlhopho tsa bona mo mafelong ao ba ikwadisitseng mo go ona.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uyaqhubeka nokubeka iso zonke izindawo ezithikameza isizwe sakithi, noma yikuphi okusolisayo kusukunyelwa phezulu ukuze kuzoqinisekiswa ukuphepha kwawo wonke umuntu okuleli lizwe.

src_text: Motho letleletswe go dira ditlhopho fa le gore:Ke moAforika Borwa na le dingwaga di le 16 kgotsa tse di kwa godimo ga tseo (mme tla letlelelwa go ka dira ditlhopho fa sena go nna le dingwaga di le 18) bile gapeO na le bukana tala ya lekwaloitshupo kgotsa karata ya lekwaloitshupo kgotsa setlankana se se leng mo molaong sa go dirisiwa nakwana sa lekwaloitshupo.
tgt_text: Uma kungaba khona okushaya amanzi, uhulumeni uzoba ngowokuqala ukuwuhlaba awulawule.

src_text: Molaetsa wa Puso ya Amerika go Baagi ba Naga ya Bona ba ba Leng ka fa Nageng.
tgt_text: I-SAPS.

src_text: Kabinete sekegetse tsebe molaetsa wa puso ya Amerika go tswa kwa embasing ya yona go tsibosa baagi ba naga ya bona ba ba leng ka fa nageng le ba ba tla etelang naga eno ka seemo sa naga eno jaaka le tsela eo puso eno tlwaetseng go dira dilo ka gone le baagi ba yona tsibositse baagi ba yona gore lebile maemo a diragalang ka fa nageng eno ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho, mme ya ba eletsa gore ba itlhokomele jaaka go na le kgonagalo ya gore maemo botlhokotsebe le megwanto ka gakala mmogo le gore ba reke dijo, melemo le didirisiwa tsa thuso ya tshoganyetso ka bontsi tse di ka ba fepang sebaka sa matsatsi ka nna mararo fa dilo di ka tswa mo taolong ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithokoze kakhulu ukuthi uPhiko Lwamaphoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika selusondele nokuqeda ukusilela emuva kokuhlolwa kolibofuzo kumalabhorethri abo okuhlolwa kobufakazi ngobuchwepheshe besayensi.

src_text: Puso ya naga eno ka motsotso yo mongwe le yo mongwe ke yona e rweleng maikarabelo go tlhokomela dikarolo tsotlhe ka fa nageng gore go rene pabalesego, fa go na le matshosetsi tseelwa dikgato ka bonako gore motho mongwe le mongwe ka fa nageng bolokesege.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuphumelela kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi amacala ahlobene nodlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile asonjululwa ngokushesha.

src_text: Fa go ka diragala gore go nne le matshosetsi ape fela, puso e busang jaanong eno ke yona ya ntlha e tla itsiseng baagi botlhe ka seno.
Tirelo ya Sepedodi sa Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: I-SAPS iphinde yengeza umthamo wokuhlolwa kolibofuzo ngokuphothulwa kwelabhorethri yokuhlola ubufakazi ngesayensi eGqeberha eMpumalanga Kapa, lokho okuzokwehlisa ingcindezi kwilabhorethri ekhona eNtshonalanga Kapa  Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgang tsa gore Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) gaufi le go garela tiro e neng saletse morago ya go dira diteko tsa DNA mo dilaboratoring tsa bona tsa go tlhatlhoba bopaki ka ditsela tsa sesaense.
tgt_text: UHlelo Lweqhingasu Lukazwelonke (i-NSP) lwe-HIV, i-TB kanye nama-STI lwangowezi-2023-..  IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushicilelwa koHlelo Lweqhingasu Likazwelonke (i-NSP) lweGciwane Lwesandulela-ngculazi, iSifo Sofuba kanye Nezifo Ezithathelana Ngocansi lwangowezi-2023-..  I-NSP 2023-2028 ephelele izokhishwa emphakathini ngoSuku Lomhlaba lwe-TB mhla wama-24 kuNdasa 2023 e-Rustenburg eNyakatho Ntshonalanga.

src_text: Seno se tla dira gore dikgetse tse di amanang le go bogisiwa le go betelelwa ga basadi di rarabololwe ka bonako.
tgt_text: I-NSP ihlongoza ukuthi kubhekanwe ne-HIV, izifo ezithelelana ngocansi kanye nesifo sofuba ngendlela ephelele ebandakanya izindlela zokuzigwema kanye nokuzilapha.

src_text: SAPS okeditse gape le mafelo go dira diteko tsa DNA ka go garela go agiwa ga moago wa go tlhatlhoba bopaki ka ditsela tsa sesaense kwa Gqeberha mo porofenseng ya Kapa Botlhaba, seno se tla rola boima jo lefelo leno la porofense ya Kapa Bophirima le neng le borwele  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Lena yi-NSP yesihlanu ye-HIV, i-TB kanye nama-STI futhi icacisa inqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe iNingizimu Afrika ekubhekaneni nalezi zifo ezintathu kuze kube yimanje.

src_text: Leano la Naga la go Samagana le Tiro (NSP) ya go Lwantshana le Bolwetse jwa Lebolelamading (HIV), Bolwetse jwa lehuba (TB) le Malwetse a Fetelanang ka Thobalano (di-STI) go Tloga ka Ngwaga wa 2023 go Fitlha ka wa.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lweminyaka emihlanu luhlinzeka ngohlaka lweqhingasu lwendlela emikhakha-miningi ebeke abantu phambili lokuqeda i-HIV, i-TB nama-STI njengezifo eziqeda impilo yabantu ngowezi-..  Ukubhalwa kwe-NSP kwakwenganyelwe nguMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wesifo Sengculazi eNingizimu Afrika (i-SANAC) ohlanganise ndawonye uhulumeni, umphakathi, kanye nabanye okubanjisenwe nabo emphakathini ukwakha isivumelwano nokuqhuba indlela edidiyelwe kahle, ehlangene yokulwa nalolu bhubhane lwezifo ezintathu esikhathini esiyiminyaka emihlanu.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore go ka phasaladiwa Leano la Naga la go Samagana le Tiro (NSP) ya go Lwantshana le Bolwetse jwa Lebolelamading (HIV), Bolwetse jwa lehuba (TB) le Malwetse a Fetelanang ka Thobalano (di-STI) go Tloga ka Ngwaga wa 2023 go Fitlha ka wa 2028 (NSP 2023-2028).
tgt_text: Inqubo yokusungula leli buya lesihlanu lohlelo lukazwelonke kwaxoxiswana ngayo kabanzi emphakathini wonke ukuze kuzotholwa uchungechunge lwemibono, kanye nokwakhela kulokho esikufundile kwizinhlelo ezedlulile.

src_text: NSP 2023-2028 ka botlalo tla ribololwa gore baagi ba itseele yona ka tsebe ka Letsatsi la go Keteka Dikgato tsa Lefatshe tsa go Lwantshana le TB ka la bo 24 Mopitlwe 2023 kwa Rustenburg mo porofenseng ya Bokone Bophirima.
tgt_text: I-NSP igcizelela isidingo sokuqeda imigoqo kanye nokwandisa ukufinyelela okulinganayo kwizinsizakalo ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo zokusebenza ezinamandla nezihlanganisiwe.

src_text: NSP tshitshinya dikgato tse di ka diragadiwang go samagana ka gangwe le malwetse otlhe HIV, di-STD le TB ka go dirisa matsholo go thibela le go alafa.
tgt_text: Ukubandakanywa kwezinsizakalo zezempilo yezengqondo nokwesekwa komphakathi kume ekuhambelaneni okuqinile phakathi kwe-HIV, i-TB, ama-STI nodlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane (i-GBVF), amalungelo abantu kanye nokungalingani.

src_text: NSP eno ke leno ke leano la botlhano la go samagana le HIV, di-STD le TB mme le tlhagisa kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa mo go samaganeng le malwetse mararo ano.
tgt_text: Uhlelo olusha lufake ukuchazwa kabanzi kokulashwa kwama-STI, kubandakanya ukuvuvukala kwesibindi kanye nezinsumpa, okuyizifo ezijwayelekile kubantu abasuleleke nge-HIV.

src_text: Leano leno la dingwaga di le tlhano le tlhagisa leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya makala mantsi a farologaneng a ka ga go thusa batho gore re ka ngwaga wa 2030 go bo go fedisitswe malwetse setšhaba HIV, di-STD le TB.
tgt_text: Umbiko ngemiphumela yeNgqungquthela Yohlaka Lwezizwe Ezibumbene Ngokuguquguquka Kwesimo Sezulu (i-UNFCCC COP 27).

src_text: NSP eno kwadilwe ke Lekgotla la Naga ya Aforika Borwa la AIDS (SANAC) mme lona le dira gore puso, mekgatlho ya baagi mmogo le ba bangwe ba baagi ba dumelane ka tsela ya go samagana le maroborobo ano mararo mo sebakeng sa dingwaga di le tlhano.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithole umbiko ngemiphumela yeNgqungquthela Yohlaka Lwezizwe Ezibumbene Ngokuguquguquka Kwesimo Sezulu (i-UNFCCC COP27) ebibanjwe e-Sharm El Sheik e-Egypt ngoLwezi wezi-.

src_text: Thulaganyo ya go kwala leano leno la rona la botlhano ne le telele jaaka go ne go bokelediwa maikutlo baagi mo setšhabeng gore re kgone go utlwa maikutlo mantsi a farologaneng mmogo le go agelela mo go seo re ithutileng sona go tswa mo maanong mo malobeng.
tgt_text: Ngesikhathi iNingizimu Afrika yazi ngezinselele ezisalele ekulweni nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu, lokho okuzuzwa ngamaqembu ehlukene ekulweni nale nkinga kwamukelekile.

src_text: NSP gatelela botlhokwa jwa go ritibatsa dilo tseo di re kgoreletsang mmogo le go oketsa phitlhelelo ya ditirelo ka go lekalekana ka go dirisa dithulaganyo tsa boitekanelo tse di sa tseweng ke phefo.
tgt_text: Izingxoxo ze-COP27 zifake igalelo kwingqophamlando yesinqumo sokusungula iSikhwama esizosiza amazwe asathuthuka ukuthi abhekane noKulahlekelwa Nokulimala okwadalwa ukuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

src_text: Go akarediwa ga ditirelo tsa malwetse kgatelelo ya tlhaloganyo le maikutlo le tsa go thobiwa matswalo ke ka ntlha ya gore malwetse ano tsamaelana thata le batho ba ba nang le malwetse HIV, TB, di-STD, mmogo le ba ba bogang ka ditiragalo tsa go bogisa le go bolaya batho ba sesadi, ka go gatakakiwa ga ditshwanelo tse ba nang le tsona tsa botho mmogo le ka ntlha ya go se lekane re se meno.
tgt_text: Lisungule iKomidi Lesikhashana elizosebenza ngemicikilisho yalesi sikhwama ngokombono wokuthatha isinqumo kwi-COP28 ngowezi-.

src_text: Mo leanong le lentšhwa leno go okeditswe gape le ditiro tsa go samagana le malwetse di-STI, go akaretsa le malwetse go ruruga sebete mmogo le Mogare wa Kankere ya Molongwana wa Popelo ao tshwarang gantsi batho ba ba nang le HIV.
Pegelo e ka ga Tseo di Utlwanetsweng kwa Lekgotleng la Dinagakopano le le Disang Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi (UNFCCC COP 27).
tgt_text: I-COP27 iphinde yagcizelela isidingo sokukhuphula umfutho wokuguqula Amabhange Okuthuthukisa Amazwe Ehlukene neziKhungo Zamazwe Ngamazwe Zezimali kanye nokucela abanikazi bamasheya bakulezi zikhungo ukuthi bathathe isinyathelo esingijuqu sokukhuphula izimali ezibhekele isimo sezulu ngowezi-2023 futhi benze izinhlelo zezikhungo zabo zihambelane nomsebenzi.

src_text: Kabinete rometswe pegelo ya tseo di utlwanetsweng kwa UNFCCC COP 27 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Sharm El Sheik kwa nageng ya Egepeta ka Ngwanaitseele.
tgt_text: Umphumela wokugcina we-COP27 ubonisa ukuphuthuma kwenkinga yesimo sezulu, kanye nesidingo sokugcina izinga lokushisa liku-.

src_text: Le fa naga ya Aforika Borwa dumela gore go santse go na le dikgwetlho tse dintsi mo go samaganeng le phetogo ya maemo loapi nopotse gore dilo tse di setseng di dirilwe go samagana le bothata jono di re tiisa mooko.
tgt_text: 5 degree ngesikhathi salokhu iPhaneli Yomhlaba Yokuguquguquka Kwesimo Sezulu (i-IPCC) ekubiza ngokuthi “yiShumi Leminyaka Elibucayi”, kubandakanya ukunikeza ngohlelo olucacile lokuqhubela phambili uhlelo lokunciphisa kusuka manje kuze kube ngowezi-.

src_text: Dipuisano mo kopanong ya COP 27 di dirile gore go tsewe ditshwetso tse dikgolo tse di iseng di tle di tsewe fa go tla mo mererong ya phetogo ya maemo loapi mo go tserweng tshwetso ya go tlhoma Letlole leo le tla thusang dinaga tse di santseng di iketetsa go duelela ditshenyegelo tse di bakilweng ke maemo phetogo ya maemo loapi mo dinageng tseno.

Go tlhomilwe gape le Komiti ya Dithulaganyo go rulaganyetsa letlole leno mme maitlhomo ke gore go tla tsewa ditshwetso ka lona mo kopanong ya COP28 e tla tshwarwang ka ngwaga wa..  COP27 gateletse gape le botlhokwa jwa go oketsa lebelo la go tlhabolola Dibanka tsa go Thusa Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le Ditheo tsa Boditšhabatšhaba tsa Matlole mmogo le go ikuela mo go batsholadišere ba ditheo tseno go tsaya ditshwetso tse dikgolo tsa go oketsa tlamelo ya matlole dikgato tsa go samagana le phetogo ya maemo loapi mo ngwageng wa matlole wa 2023 mmogo le go dira gore dithulaganyo tsa ditheo tsa bona di nne le mosola.
tgt_text: Ukusingathwa koMhlangano Womhlaba Wemfucuza wangowezi-.

src_text: Kopano ya bofelo ya COP27 bontshitse ka fao dikgato tsa go samagana le matsapa phetogo ya maemo loapi di tshwanetsweng go tsewa ka bonako ka teng, mmogo le tlhokagalo ya go se sute mo maemong ao go ipeetsweng ona go dira gore mogote mo lefatsheng se fete ditekeriselešiase di le.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze iNingizimu Afrika ukuthi isingathe uMhlangano Womhlaba Wemfucuza eKapa kusuka mhla we-15 kuya mhla we-18 kuMandulo.

src_text: 5 ao Setlhopha sa Baemedi ba Maphata Puso ka fa Nageng e Buang ka Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi (IPCC) se bitsang gore ke "Ngwagasome o Botlhokwa Thata" mmogo le go tlhagisa letsholo le le tlhamaletseng le le ka ga ka fao go tla okediwang dikgato tsa go samagana le matsapa ano morago ga ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Lo mcimbi uhlelwa iNhlangano Yomhlaba Yemfucuza, ongcweti bomhlaba kwezemfucuza kanye nongoti abaphuma emhlabeni jikelele.

src_text: Go Tshwara Kopano ya Lefatshe ya Ngwaga wa 2024 ya Merero ya Ditlakala.
tgt_text: Lo mhlangano uzosiza iNingizimu Afrika, njengoba izithunywa zizokwabelana ngokwenziwayo esikhathini samanje kanye nezindlela ezihamba phambili zokulawula imfucuza.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula kgang ya gore Aforika Borwa tshware Kopano ya Lefatshe ya Ngwaga wa 2024 ya Merero ya Ditlakala kwa Motsekapa go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 18 Lwetse.
tgt_text: Umhlangano uzoheha ongoti bezomhlaba nabahlinzeki bezobuchwepheshe futhi umkhakha ongahlelekile wemfucuza waseNingizimu Afrika kanye namabhizinisi amancane azozuza kulokhu.

src_text: Moletlo ono rulaganngwa ke ba Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Merero ya go Olela Ditlakala, ono ke mokgatlho wa lefatshe o nang le badiredi le baitseanape ba ditiro tsa go olela ditlakala go tswa mo lefatsheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Ngowezi-2011, iKhabhinethi lagunyaza iQhingasu Likazwelonke Lokulawulwa Kwemfucuza (i-NWMS) ukuthi liqaliswe ukusebenza.

src_text: Moletlo ono tla tswela naga ya Aforika Borwa mosola gonne baromiwa bano ba tla abelana ka ditsela tsa ga jaanong tsa go dira tiro ya go olela ditlakala ka manontlhotlho.
tgt_text: I-NWMS inezinhloso-nqangi eziyisishiyagalombili kubandakanya nokugqugquzela ukuncishiswa kwemfucuza, ukuphinde kusetshenziswe imfucuza, ukwenza imikhiqizo emisha ngemfucuza kanye nokuqoqwa kwemfucuza.

src_text: Moletlo ono tla dira gore baitseanape go tswa kwa mafatsheng boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le baabi ba ditirelo tsa thekenoloji mo lephateng leno ba tshologele ka kwano mme seno se tla tswela mosola lekala la naga ya rona ya Aforika Borwa le iseng le thanye sentle la kolelo ya ditlakala mme dikgwebo tse di dirang ka ditlakala di tla iponela botlhale mo moletlong ono.
tgt_text: Liphinde lisize izwe ukuletha izinsizakalo zemfucuza ezisebenzayo neziphumelelayo futhi likhulisa igalelo elifakwa umkhakha wemfucuza emnothweni ongangcolisi imvelo.

src_text: Ka ngwaga wa 2011 Kabinete ne ya nesetsa pula Leano la Naga la go Sela Ditlakala (NWMS) gore le tsenngwe tirisong.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika nayo iyingxenye yezivumelwano zomhlaba ezihambisana nokulawulwa kwezinkinga zemfucuza..  Ukukhethwa Kwedolobhakazi Elizosingatha iNgqungquthela ye-BRICS ye-.

src_text: NWMS na le dilo di le robedi tse ipeetseng tsona tse di botlhokwa mme mo go tsona ke go dira gore go fokotsa ditlakala nne selo se se botlhokwa, go dirisa dilo makgetlho mantsinyana, go fetola tiro ya selo se se latlhilweng mmogo le go tsosolosa selo se se latlhilweng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukuthi i-Gauteng izosingatha iNgqungquthela ye-BRICS ye-15 ezoba seNingizimu Afrika kusuka mhla wama-22 kuya mhla wama-24 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Seno se tla thusa naga gape gore kgone go diragatsa tlamelo ya ditirelo tsa go sela ditlakala e tswileng diatla mmogo le go dira gore lekala la tshelo ya ditlakala le nne le seabe mo ikonoming ya tshomarelo ya tlhago.
Se sengwe gape ka naga ya Aforika Borwa ke gore na le seabe mo ditumelanong tsa boditšhabatšhaba tseo di amanang le matsapa go sela ditlakala.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika yaqala esikhundleni esijikelezayo sokuba nguSihlalo we-BRICS kusuka mhla lu-1 kuMasingana 2023 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi “Ukusebenzisana kwe-BRICS ne-Afrika ukuze Kuzosheshiswa Ukukhula, Ukuthuthuka Okusimeme kanye Nokubandakanywa Kwamazwe Amaningi”.

src_text: Go Tlhophiwa ga Teropokgolo go tla Tshwarelwang kwa go yona Samiti ya bo 15 ya Dinaga tsa BRICS.
tgt_text: Ubulungu beNingizimu Afrika ku-BRICS sebukhule kakhulu selokhu leli lizwe lahlanganyela kuleliqembu leminotho esafufusa eminyakeni eyi-12 edlule.

src_text: Kabinete dumelane gore Gauteng tla nna lona lefwlo le go tla tshwarelwang kwa go lona Samiti ya bo 15 ya Dinaga tsa BRICS go tloga ka la bo 22 go fitlha ka la bo 24 Phatwe..  Naga ya Aforika Borwa tsere maemo a sa nneleng ruri go nna Komangkanna mo Kopanong ya BRICS monongwaga ka la bo 1 Ferikgong 2023 e neng tshwerwe ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “BRICS le Tirisanommogo le Dinaga tsa Aforika go Dira Gore Lebelo la Kgolo le Okediwe Nne Kgolo e tla Nnelang Ruri bile Ditšhaba tsotlhe di Nathelane Tlhogwana ya Tsie”.
tgt_text: Ngowe-2021, impahla engaphezu kwamaphesenti ayi-17 yaseNingizimu Afrika ethunyelwa kwamanye amazwe yayizothunyelwa kwamanye amazwe angamalungu e-BRICS kanti impahla engaphezu kwamaphesenti angama-29 ephuma kwamanye amazwe yayivela kula mazwe  Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Go tloga ka motsi yo naga eno neng nna karolo ya setlhopha seno sa dinaga tse ikonomi ya tsona ntseng gola mo dingwageng di le 12 tse di fetileng palo ya maloko BRICS mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa oketsegile thata.
tgt_text: INyanga Yamalungelo Abantu.

src_text: Ka ngwaga wa 2021, diphesente di feta di le 17 tsa ditlhagisiwa tsa naga ya rona tse di rekisediwang dinaga tsa boditšhaba tse di neng di rekisediwa dinaga tse dingwe tsa BRICS fa ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe diphesente di feta di le 29 tsa dilo tse re di rekang kwa dinageng tsa boditšhaba di rekiwa mo go tsona dinaga tseno  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: Izwe libungaza iNyanga Yamalungelo Abantu ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi “Sihlanganisa futhi Seseka Amalungelo Abantu sibheke kwikusasa”.
