src_text: Kgwedi ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligqugquzela abantu baseNingizmu Afrika ukuthi babungaze ifa lethu elicebile lamasiko kanye nokwehlukana okunamandla okuhlanganisa isizwe sakithi.

src_text: Naga keteka Kgwedi ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “Go Rokelela le go Somarela Setlwaedi sa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho gore le mo isagong se nne teng”.
tgt_text: Masikhumbule labo abadela izimpilo zabo emzabalazweni wethu wenkululeko ukuqinisekisa ukuthi sithokozela amalungelo abantu futhi siyaqhubeka nokusebenzela ukuthuthuka kwenhlalo-mnotho ebandakanya wonke umuntu njengoba kwakungumbono wokhokho bethu  Imiyalezo.

src_text: Kabinete rotloetsa maAforika Borwa go iphantsha ka ngwaoboswa e humileng ka ditso tse re nang le tsona mmogo le go farologana ga rona go go dirileng gore re ipope seoposengwe.
tgt_text: Amazwi OkuhalalisaIKhabhinethi lihalalisela futhi lifisela okuhle kodwa ku:Iqembu lekhilikithi Labesifazane laseNingizimu Afrika ngokundizisela phezulu ifulegi ngokufinyelela kowamanqamu okokuqala ngqa emidlalweni ye-ICC Women’s T20 World Cup ebisingathwe kuleli lizwe.Iqembu labesifazane laseNingizimu Afrika le-ice hockey elidlale okokuqala ngqa emidlalweni yomhlaba ye-Women’s Ice Hockey World Championships ebiseKapa.I-SA Hockey ngokusingatha ngempumelelo imidlalo yomhlaba ye-FIH Indoor Hockey World Cup ePitoli kusuka mhla wesi-5 kuya mhla we-11 kuNhlolanja.

src_text: Tla re tlotleng bao ba ikentshitseng setlhabelo mo kgaratlhong ya gore re nne le kgololesego ka maitlhomo gore ka le lengwe la matsatsi re keteng go nna le ditshwanelo re le batho mme re tswelele go gata mo mositong wa gore batho botlhe ba nne le seabe mo ikonoming jaaka borakhukhu ba rona ba re bonetse seno kwa pele  Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Oshampeni base-Afrika i-Banyana-Banyana kulandela ukudlala kwabo emidlalweni ye-Turkish Women’s Cup, lapho leli qembu laba ngabanqobi baka-Group babuya nendebe.Abahleli bokusingatha okube yimpumelelo kuleli lizwe okokuqala umjaho we-Formula ezwenikazi i-Afrika, obuseKapa.

src_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go:Setlhopha sa Aforika Borwa sa Basadi ba Motshameko wa Kerikete, ka ntlha ya go tsholetsa folaga ya naga kwa godimo kwa Metshamekong ya Sejana sa Lefatshe sa Metshameko ya Kerikete ya Basadi ya T20 e neng tshamekelwa ka fa nageng.Sethopha sa Basadi sa Motshameko wa ice hokhi sa Aforika Borwa seo se tshamekileng motshameko wa sona wa ntlha kwa Sejaneng sa Motshameko wa Lefatshe wa Ice Hockey o neng tshamekelwa kwa Motsekapa.Setlhopha sa Banna sa Motshameko wa Hockey sa Aforika Borwa jaaka se atlegile mo go tshwareng Metshameko ya Sejana sa Lefatshe ya FIH ya go Tshamekela Hockey ka fa Teng ga Meago kwa Pretoria go tloga ka la bo 5 go fitlha ka la bo 11 Tlhakole.
tgt_text: Leli dolobhakazi lihlanganyele namanye amadolobhakazi omhlaba ayi-11 asingathe umjaho we-Formula World Championship, obuqhutshwa ngamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo ongamaphesenti ayi-.

src_text: Setlhopha sa Bagale ba Aforika sa Banyana-Banyana morago ga motshameko wa bona kwa Motshamekong wa Sejana sa Lefatshe sa Turkey, mo setlhopha seno se neilweng maemo boganka go laetla gore se fenye metshameko ya Setlhopha sa le go boa ka sejana ka fa nageng.Barulaganyi ba metshameko ya Mabelo Dijanaga ya Formula e neng tshwaretswe ka fa nageng le ka fa kontinenteng lekgetlo la ntlha mme tsamaile sentle e neng tshwaretswe kwa Motsekapa.
tgt_text: Mnu Calib Cassim njenge-CEO yesikhashana yakwa-Eskom ethathe izintambo ku-Mnu André Marinus de Ruyter, ofiselwa okuhle lapho aya khona.Abantu base-Nigeria kulandela isimemezelo se-African Union Election Observation Mission ngempumelelo yokhetho obelubanjiwe.

src_text: Teropokgolo eno ne ya keteka seno go tshwana le diteropokgolo tse dingwe tsotlhe di le 11 mo lefatsheng tshe di kileng tsa tshwara Metshameko ya Lefatshe ya Mabelo Dijanaga ya Formula , mo dijanaga tsotlhe le mafelo a neng dirisiwa go dirisitsweng fela motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa le maokwane a sa kgotlheleng tikologo.Rre Calib Cassim yo thapilweng go nna CEO wa namaotshwere kwa Eskom yo rwalang marapo go latela gore rolwe ke Rre André Marinus de Ruyter, yo puso mo eletsang tsotlhe tse dintle mo go tseo batlang go di dira mo isagong ya gagwe.Baagi ba naga ya Nigeria go latela gore Setlhopha sa Basekaseki ba Tsamaiso ya Ditlhopho ba Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika ba totobatse gore tsotlhe mo ditlhophong tsa naga yotlhe di ne di apere tshiamo.
tgt_text: Amazwi EnduduzoIKhabhinethi lidlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini nakubangani baka:Peter Cyril Jones, isishoshovu senkululeko kanye nomholi we-Black People’s Convention.INkosazane Yasebukhosini u-Alice, indodakazi yeNkosi u-Solomon kaDinuzulu.Paul Herbst, uMqondisi we-Medi-Response, umholi ohlonishwayo nozinikele emkhakheni wezokwelashwa kwizimo eziphuthumayo kamuva-nje osize izwe emsebenzini wokutakula e-Türkiye nase-Seria.Rafiq Rohan, intatheli eyaziwayo kanye nobeyisiboshwa sezepolitiki eNingizimu Afrika esasivalelwe e-Robben Island owake wasebenza njengoMhleli wokuqala wephephandaba likahulumeni i-Vuk’uzenzele, umhleli wezindaba kanye nomhleli wezepolitiki ku-“The Sowetan”, umhleli ophezulu wephephandaba i-“The Star”, kanti kamuva-nje ubengumhleli omkhulu e-Al Jazeera  AbaqashiweBonke abaqashiwe kufanele kuqinisekiswe iziqu zabo kanye nokuhlolwa okufanelekile.

src_text: Melaetsa ya MatshedisoKabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa:Peter Cyril Jones, molwelakgaratlho wyo gape neng le moeteledipele wa mokgatlho wa Black People’s Convention.Morwediakgosi Alice, morwedi Kgosi Solomon kaDinuzulu.Paul Herbst, Motlhankedimogolo wa setlamo sa Medi-Response, yo leng moeteledipele yo tlotliwang mo ditirelong tsa tshoganyetso tsa kalafo yo mo malobeng thusitseng go pholosa batho kwa Türkiye le kwa Seria.Rafiq Rohan yo neng le mmegadikgang yo itsegeng yo gape neng le yo mongwe wa maAforika Borwa ao neng tshwaretswe ditiro tsa sepolotiki kwa Robben Island yo kileng nna mongwe wa barulaganyi ba ba simolotseng lekwalodikgang la puso la Vuk’uzenzele, mo neng le morulaganyi wa dikgang mme mo tsamaong ya nako ya nna morulaganyi wa dikgang tsa sepolotiki mo lekwalodikganyeng la “The Sowetan”, ya nna morulaganyimogolo mo lekwalodikganyeng la “The Star”, mme mo malobanyaneng ne le morulaganyi yo mogolo wa Al Jazeera  Ba Ba ThapilwengPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.
tgt_text: Mnu Hishaam Emeran njenge-CEO ye-Ejensi Yezokuthuthwa Kwabantu Ngezitimela eNingizimu Afrika (i-PRASA).

src_text: Rre Hishaam Emeran thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo (CEO) wa Setlamo sa Setheo sa Banamedi ba Diterene sa Aforika Borwa (PRASA).
tgt_text: Mnu Themba Rikhotso njenge-CEO yeBhange Lezokuthuthukiswa Komhlaba Nezolimo eNingizimu Afrika (i-Land Bank) kanye noMqondisi Ophezulu kwiBhodi Yabaqondisi base-Land Bank.

src_text: Rre Themba Rikhotso thapilwe go nna CEO wa Banka e Thusang Balemi le Barui ba Dipolasa ka Mafatshe ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa mmogo le go nna Motlhankedimogolo mo Botong ya Batlhankedibagolo ba Banka eno ya Mafatshe.
tgt_text: Mnu Maesela Kekana njengePhini loMqondisi-Jikelele: Kwezokulawulwa Kokuguquguquka Kwesimo Sezulu Nokuhlanzeka Komoya eMnyangweni Wezamahlathi, Ezokudoba Nezemvelo.IKhabhinethi lisho ngazwi linye ngokuqashwa kwalaba abalandelayo.

src_text: Motlakase.
tgt_text: Ugesi.

src_text: Kabinete itumeletse go thankgololwa ga Letlole la Pokeletso ya Metswedi ya Motlakase (RMF) le le tlhamilweng ke Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase kwa Kantorong ya Moporesitente, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukwethulwa kweSikhwama Esizoqinisekisa Ukutholakala Kwezinsiza (i-RMF) nguNgqongqoshe Wezikagesi eHhovisi LikaMongameli, uDkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.

src_text: Tirisanommogo eno magareng ga puso le Mokgatlho wa go Tshwaraganya Dikgwebo tsa Aforika Borwa maitlhomo yona ke go tlamela puso ka didirisiwa le kitso e tlhokang gore kgone go diragatsa ka tshwanelo Leano la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato le le ribolotsweng ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phukwi 2022 le gape buileng ka lona le mo Puong ya Maemo Setšhaba (SoNA) ya 2023 mme seno ke sekao sa tirisanommogo magareng ga maphata puso le poraefete go bontsha tsholofelo e tswelelang go nna teng mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa..     RMF tla tswela mosola tiro ya Komiti ya Naga ya Merero ya Matsapa Motlakase gore kgone go fitlhelela maikemisetso yona go fedisa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Loku kusebenzisana phakathi kukahulumeni nenhlangano emele amabhizinisi eNingizimu Afrika i-Business Unity South Africa kuhlose ukuhlinzeka ngezinsiza kanye namakhono azovumela uhulumeni ukuthi aqalise ngempumelelo uHlelo Lokusebenza Lukagesi olwamenyezelwa nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ngoNtulikazi wezi-2022 nakwiNkulumo Echaza Ngesimo Sezwe yangowezi-2023 (i-SoNA) njengesibonelo sokuhlangana komphakathi nokuzithemba okuqhubekayo eNingizimu Afrika..  I-RMF izonika amandla umsebenzi weKomidi Elibhekene Nenkinga Kagesi Kuzwelonke ukuthi lifeze umsebenzi walo wokuqeda ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo go bannaleseabe botlhe gore ba tsenye letsogo mo go diragatseng Leano la Naga la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato gore re kgone go fedisa bothata jo bogolo jono jwa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri jo bo aparetseng ikonomi ya rona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linxusa bonke ababambiqhaza ukuthi baqhubeke nokufaka igalelo ekuqalisweni koHlelo Lokusebenza Lukagesi ukuze kuzobhekanwa nomthwalo wokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga emnothweni.

src_text: Kabinete nopotse matshwenyego a tlhagisitsweng ke setheo sa tekolo ya maemo ikonomi sa S&P Global Ratings mabapi le maemo kgolo ya ikonomi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa jaaka tobane le maemo a bokete ka ntlha ya tlhaelo ya mafaratlhatlha, bogolosegolo tlhaelo kgolo e leng teng ya motlakase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuphawulile ukukhathazeka okuvezwe kamuva yi-S&P Global Ratings kokuthi ukukhula komnotho waseNingizimu Afrika kunengcindezi edalwa izinkinga zengqalasizinda, ikakhulukazi ukushoda okukhulu kukagesi.

src_text: Go samagana le kgwetlho eno, puso tsere dikgato tsa go samagana le bothata jono mme tsona ke tse di mabapi le go bokeletsa matlole, go otlolola maemo ikonomi ka lebelo mmogo le go tsaya dikgato tsa ka bonako tseo maikemisetso tsona leng go fokotsa makgetlo motlakase o tshabetseng ruri ka ona mo nakong khutshwanyana e tlang mmogo le go fetola lephata leno ka go tlisa diphetogo tse di tsamaisanang le lephata leno gore re tle re kgone le go nna le motlakase o sa tshabeleng ruri.
tgt_text: Ukubhekana nale nselele, uhulumeni useqalise uchungechunge lwezinyathelo ezingujuqu, ezibandakanya ukuhlanganiswa kwezimali, izinguquko ezisheshayo kwezomnotho kanye nezinyathelo eziphuthumayo ezihlose ukunciphisa ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga esikhathini esifushane kanye nokuguqula umkhakha ngokulandela izinguquko zezimakethe ukuze kuzozuzwa ukutholakala kukagesi kwesikhathi eside.

src_text: Kabinete itumeletse gape le go thankgololwa ga dipapatso tsa letsholo la kopo ya botlhano ya dithendara tsa polokelo ya motlakase wa dibeteri ka motlakase wa dimekawate di le 513 mme seno ke karolo ya go gagamatsa dikgato tsa rona tsa go samagana le dikgwetlho tsa motlakase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lamukela ukuvulwa kokufakwa kwezicelo zokunikezela ngogesi ogcinwa kumabhethri ongama-513 megawatts (MW) njengengxenye yokuqinisa indlela esibhekana ngayo nale nselele kagesi.

src_text: Letsatsi la bofelo la go romela dikopo tsa go tsaya karolo mo letsholong leno ke la bo 5 Phukwi 2023 ka ura ya botlhano maitseboa mme mongwe le mongwe yo batlang go nna le seabe ka tlatsa foromo ya go ikwadisa e leng mo webesaeteng ya: www.ipp-storage.co.za.
tgt_text: Usuku lokuvala ukufakwa kwezicelo ngumhla wesi-5 kuNtulikazi 2023 ngehora leSihlanu ntambama futhi bonke abanesifiso bangagcwalisa ifomu lokubhalisa ngobuchwepheshe be-inthanethi ku: www.ipp-storage.co.za.

src_text: Kabinete gape neseditse pula tshweetso ya ga Tona ya Merero ya Dikgwa, Botshwaro jwa Ditlhapi le Tikologo, Mme Barbara Creecy, ya go letlelela gore Eskom se tlhole tshwanelwa ke go dira dikopo tse di telele tse di sa feleng tse di mabapi le go baakanya Laesense ya yona ya Tetlelelo ya go Kgotlhela Legodimo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lamukela isinqumo sikaNgqongqoshe Wezamahlathi, Ezokudoba Nezemvelo, uNks Barbara Creecy, ukukhulula i-Eskom kwinqubo ende edingekayo ukuchibiyela iMvume Yokukhiphela Igesi Emkhathini.

src_text: Go ya ka Eskom, tetla eno tla ba kgontsha gore re ka Ngwanaitseele 2023 ba bo ba kgonne go tsenya tirisong dikgato tsa nakwana tsa go rarabolola matsapa a leng kwa Seteišeneng sa Motlakase sa Kusile mme seno se tla ba kgontsha gore ba kgone go busetsa tirisong motlakase o kanaka dimekawate di le 2 100 mme seno se tla fokotsa maemo a galefileng go tshabela ruri ga motlakase gore felele mo maemong bobedi..     Mogwanto wa Mokgatlho wa Badiri ba Ditiro tsa Barutabana, Baoki le Badiri ba Mokgatlho ka Tirisanano Mmogo (NEHAWU).
tgt_text: Ngokusho kwe-Eskom, lokhu kukhululwa kuzobavumela ukuthi baqalise ukusebenzisa isixazululo sesikhashana emonakalweni owenzeke kwiSiphehlimandla i-Kusile ngoLwezi wezi-2023 futhi kuzovumela isiphehlimandla ukuthi siphinde siqalise ukuphehla umthamo kagesi oyizi-2 100 megawatts (MW) ozonciphisa ngamazinga amabili ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Mabapi le mogwanto wa NEHAWU, Kabinete itumeletse dikgato tsa go saeniwa ga Ditumelano tsa Megolo kwa Lekgotleng la Ditharabololo tsa Dipuisano tsa Merero ya Ditiro (PSCBC) mme seno se dirile gore go garelwe dipuisano tsa megolo mmogo le go khutlisa mogwanto ono mme jaanong seno se buletse dipuisano tsa megolo kwa Lekgotleng la Ditharabololo tsa Dipuisano tsa Merero ya Ditiro tsa ngwaga wa matlole wa 2023/.

tgt_text: Isiteleka soMbutho Kazwelonke Wabasebenzi Bezemfundo Nabezempilo (i-NEHAWU).

src_text: Kabinete lebogile gape le mekgatlho ya badiri yotlhe e santseng le mo dipuisanong tsa megolo mo go PSCBC ne ya gatelela gore puso santse eme ka la gore batla go bona tharabololo e namatshang maphata otlhe mo dipuisanong tseno, mme dirisana le botlhe ba ba matshwanedi go dira bonnete jwa gore dipuisano tseno ga di tlontlololwe le go nyenyefadiwa..     Go botlhokwa gore batho ba itse gore, jaaka le se go dumelanweng ka sona fa go Garelwa Ditumelano tsa Mogolo, molao wa gore YO SA TLANG TIRONG KA SE DUELELWE tla diragadiwa ka ponyo ya leitlho mme bao ba duetsweng mogolo ka botlalo mme ba ne ba sa tle tirong ba tla gogelwa madi matsatsi ba sa tlang tirong ka ona mo megolong ya bona, mme mogolo tla kotsolwa ga nnyane ga nnyane sebaka sa dikgwedi di le nne go tswalela sekoloto sa matsatsi ba sa tlang tirong ka ona.
tgt_text: Mayelana nesiteleka se-NEHAWU, iKhabhinethi lamukele ukusayinwa kweSivumelwano kuMkhandlu Oxoxisana Ngamaholo Wabasebenzi Bakahulumeni (i-PSCBC) esiphothule izingxoxo zamaholo zangowezi-2022/23 futhi saqeda isiteleka saphinde sabuyisa wonke amaqembu kuMkhandlu Wezingxoxo Zamaholo ukuze kuzoxoxisanwa ngamaholo angowezi-2023/..  IKhabhinethi liphinde ladlulisa ukubonga kwalo kulezo zinyonyana ezisale ku-PSCBC zaqhubeka nezingxoxo.

src_text: Lefapha la Tirelopuso le Tsamaiso le tla tlhoma leitlho dikgato tseno go dira bonnete jwa gore ditshwetso tseno di tsenngwa tirisong ka tshwanelo.
tgt_text: Ligcizelele ukuzinikela kukahulumeni kwinqubo yezingxoxo, kanye nokusebenzisana nababambiqhaza abafanele ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ukubaluleka kwezingxoxo kuyavikeleka futhi kuyahlonishwa..  Sidinga ukubonisa ukuthi umthetho WOKUNGAHOLI, UMA UNGASEBENZANGA uzosebenza njengamanje futhi ukudonswa kwemali kuzokwenzeka ezinyangeni ezine ezizayo, njengengxenye yeSivumelwano.

src_text: Mo godimo ga seno, mapodisi ba tla tswela pele ka ditiro tsa bona tsa go gata motlhala ditiragalo tsa botlhokotsebe tse di dirilweng mo nakong ya mogwanto, mme ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe batlhankedi ba ba neng ba tsenetse mogwanto ono mme ba gogobisitse mo seretseng Melao ya Maitsholo Badiredipuso batlhankedibagolwane ba ba ikarabelang mo go bona ba tla rwala maikarabelo gore ba digame ba sa di tlhapela.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni Nokuphathwa Kwayo uzoqapha ukuqaliswa ngokuphelele kwalezi zinqumo.

src_text: Mogwanto wa go Dira gore Ditiro tsa ka fa Nageng di Eme Tsi.
tgt_text: Ukwengeza kulokhu, abomthetho bazolandelela izenzo zobugebengu ezenzeka ngesikhathi sesiteleka, ngesikhathi abaphathi bona bebhekene nezenzo ezephula uMthetho Wokuziphatha Kwabasebenzi Bakahulumeni.

src_text: Kabinete tlhagisitse matshwenyego yona mabapi le mogwanto o tla tshwarwang ka Mosupologo wa la bo 20 Mopitlwe 2023 mme dumela gore mogwanto ono ke ditiro tsa go tlhoka maikarabelo..     Setlhopha sa Bosiamisi, Thibelobosenyi le Tshireletsego (JCPS) se samagane le tiro ya gore mo mogwantong ono ga go nne le ditiragalo tsa boitaolo jwa botlhokotsebe.

Ditatofatso tsa mogwanto ono tse di ka ga go batla gore go fedisiwe ditiragalo tsa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri, ditlhwatlhwa tse di kwa godimo tsa dilo tse batho ba phelang ka tsona mmogo le botlhokatiro ke dilo tse Moporesitente Ramaphosa buileng ka tsona mo go SoNA ya la bo 9 Tlhakole.
tgt_text: Ukuvalwa Thanqa Kwezwe.

src_text: Mabapi le go fedisa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri, Moporesitente thapile Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase, Ngaka Ramokgopa, mme ene le esi ka monwana tla samagana le tiro ya go fedisa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lidlulise ukukhathazeka ngezimemezelo zesiteleka esihlelelwe uMsombuluko, mhla wama-20 kuNdasa 2023 futhi likubona lokho kungukungacabangi futhi kunobudedengu..  IKlasta Yezobulungiswa, Ukugwema Ubugebengu Nokuvikeleka (i-JCPS) imatasa nomsebenzi wokuqinisekisa ukuthi ukwephulwa komthetho akubekezelelwa.

src_text: Go samaganwe le go tsenngwa tirisong ka ponyo ya leitlho Dintlha di le Tlhano tsa Leano la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato mme Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase tla re mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di tlang itsise setšhaba ka dintlha tse Eskom ipeetseng tsona go di fitlhelela mo go samaganeng le go fedisa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri..     Moporesitente buile fela jalo mo go SoNA ya 2023 ka go samagana le palo e kwa godimo ya bašwa ba ba se nang ditiro.
tgt_text: Izimfuno ezisolwayo mayelana nokuqedwa kokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, izindleko eziphezulu zokuphila kanye nokuswelakala kwemisebenzi okusezingeni eliphezulu zachazwa nguMongameli u-Ramaphosa ngesikhathi se-SoNA mhla wesi-9 kuNhlolanja.

src_text: Ka jalo, ka ntlha ya fa ditletlebo tsotlhe tse go kilwe ga samaganwa natso, go tlhamaletse gore selo se le esi fela se mogwanto ono se neng se ikaeletse go se dira ke go folosa Moporesitente Ramaphosa mo setilong ntle le go latela molaotheo.
tgt_text: Ngokubhekisa ngqo ekuqedeni ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, uMongameli uqoke uNgqongqoshe Wezikagesi, uDkt Ramokgopa, ogxile ngokuphelele ekuqedeni ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga.

src_text: Re batla go bolelela batho botlhe gore KA FA NAGENG YA AFORIKA BORWA GA GO MENOLOPUSO E TLA DIRAGALANG GO SA LATELWA MOLAOTHEO.
tgt_text: Ukuqaliswa kokusebenza koHlelo Lokusebenza Olumaphuzu Mahlanu kuyaqhubeka ngendlela enobuqotho futhi uNgqongqoshe Wezikagesi emavikini azayo uzomemezela izinhloso zomsebenzi ka-Eskom ezizoholela ekuqedeni ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga.

src_text: Motho mang le mang yo nang le ditoro tsa go ipona busa naga eno tla tshwanelwa ke go letela ditlhopho tsa setšhaba tsa ngwaga wa.
Maiteko mangwe le mangwe go tlisa mmudubudu ka fa nageng molao tla samagana le ona ka botlalo.
tgt_text: Ngokulinganayo, uMongameli kwi-SoNA yakhe yangowezi-2023 wakhuluma ngezinyathelo ezibekiwe zokubhekana namazinga aphezulu entsha eswele imisebenzi kanye nezindleko zokuphila.

src_text: Re tshwanetse gape re totobatse ntlha ya gore ga go maiteko ape sepolotiki a tla dirang gore maAforika Borwa gapege maikutlo..     Kabinete nopotse gape le ditlhotshwana tse di reng di neile Kabinete taelo ya gore mo matsatsing le supa di tswalele dikolo go seng jalo go tla bonwa dinta di fuduga.
tgt_text: Ngakho-ke, izimfuno eziyisisekelo salo mbhikisho iqhinga lokususa uMongameli u-Ramaphosa esikhundleni ngezindlela ezingalandeli umthethosisekelo.

src_text: Khalendara ya dikolo tsa poraefete le tsa puso tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa e gatisitsweng ka kgwedi ya Mopitlwe 2022 mo lekwalong la puso le le gatisang melao ya puso tlhalosa ka tlhamalalo gore ka la bo 20 Mopitlwe 2023 ke letsatsi le le itlhophileng la boikhutso mo dikolong.
tgt_text: Sifuna ukwazisa wonke umuntu ukuthi IZINGUQUKO ZOMBUSO EZENZIWA NGEZINDLELA EZINGALANDELI UMTHETHOSISEKELO ANGEKE ZENZEKE ENINGIZIMU AFRIKA.

src_text: Ga go bolo go iponagatsa gore go na le maiteko go batla gore batho ba ikakgole ka go dira kete ke bona ba ba dirileng gore dilo dingwe di kgonagale go ntse go se jalo.
tgt_text: Noma ngabe ngubani olangazelela ukubusa leli lizwe kufanele alinde ukungenela ukhetho lukawonkewonke langowezi-.

src_text: Go fela jalo le ka matsatsi go tswalela ga dikolo fa go na le matsatsi boikhutso..     Letsholo la Moporesitente la go Betla Bašwa go Nna Baeteledipele.
tgt_text: Imizamo yokudala umonakalo nokuphazamiseka ezweni izohlangabezana nengalo yomthetho.

src_text: Kabinete itumeletse Letsholo la Moporesitente la go Betla Bašwa go Nna Baeteledipele le le neng le gogwa kwa pele ke Moporesitente Ramaphosa ka la bo 10 Mopitlwe 2023, kwa Yunibesiting ya Walter Sisulu, kwa Mthatha, mo go neng ga tlhongwa le Letsholo la Dithuto tsa Kutlwano ya Dipolotiki tsa MaAforika..     Seno ne le karolo ya Letsholo la Kamogelo ya Dipuisano tsa go Tlhabana Botlhale tsa Bašwa la Nelson Mandela le le neng le tshwerwe ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Boeteledipele jo bo Senang Dilabe jwa Dikokoma tsa Baeteledipele go dira gore Aforika Tokafale”.
tgt_text: Kufanele sikucacise futhi ukuthi noma ngabe unesibindi esingakanani kwezepolitiki lokho makunganyakazisi abantu baseNingizimu Afrika..  IKhabhinethi liphinde lawaphawula amampunge abantu abathile abathi banikeze iKhabhinethi izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ukuthi livale izikole.

src_text: Letsholo leno le matlafatsa maano a ntseng le teng go ralala le kontinente go tshwana le ditumelano di tshwana le Leano la Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika la 2063, Tumelano ya Bašwa ba Kontinente ya Aforika mmogo le Tumelano ya Kgwebisano e Senang Dikgoreletsi mo Dinageng tsa Kontinente ya Aforika.
tgt_text: Ikhalenda lezikole zaseNingizimu Afrika zonke ezikahulumeni nezizimele, elashicilelwa kusomqulu ngoNdasa wezi-2023, livele lihlinzeke umhla wama-20 kuNdasa 2023 njengeholidi elikhethekile lezikole.

src_text: Tumelano ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Aga Dijanaga ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Bekuhlezi kucace bha ukuthi kunemizamo yokufuna ukunqoba okungatheni.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgang tsa gore setlamo sa dijanaga sa Stellantis se se leng teng ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa se saenile Memorantamo wa Ditumelano (MoU) le Koporasi ya Tlhabololo ya Diintaseteri (IDC) mmogo le Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Intaseteri le Dikgaisano tsa Dikgwebo tse di ka ga go aga lefelo le lentšhwa la go agela dijanaga mo go lona ka fa nageng ya rona ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Okuyinto efanayo ngeholidi lezikole eliba phakathi kwamaholide kahulumeni.

src_text: Setlamo seno ke sona se se rekisang dijanaga tsa maina a tumileng tse di jaaka Jeep, Alfa Romeo, Fiat, Citroën, Opel le Peugeot ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa.
Tirisanommogo ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Tanzania.
tgt_text: UHlelo Lukamongameli Lobuholi Bentsha.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke leeto la go etela naga ya Aforika Borwa ka Labone wa la bo 16 Mopitlwe 2023 jaaka Moporesitente Samia Suluhu Hassan wa naga ya United Republic of Tanzania, go latela gore lalediwe ke Moporesitente mmogo ka ene wa rona, Moporesitente Ramaphosa, gore re jele nala semmuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukwethulwa koHlelo LukaMongameli Lobuholi Bentsha olwethulwe nguMongameli u-Ramaphosa mhla we-10 kuNdasa 2023, eNyuvesi i-Walter Sisulu, eMthatha, oluholele ekusungulweni kohlelo lobudlelwano lwabantu base-Afrika..  Lokhu kube yingxenye yeseshini yokuqala ngqa yeNkulumo-mpendulwano Yentsha ka-Nelson Mandela ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Ubuholi Obuqotho Bezizukulwane Ngezizukulwane be-Afrika Engcono”.

src_text: Leeto leno le latela gore go tshwarwe Kopano ya Dintlo tsa Barongwa ba Dinaga (BNC) tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Tanzania e neng tshwaretswe kwa Pretoria ka Laboraro, 15 Mopitlwe.
tgt_text: Le nkundla yobuholi obuhlanganisa zonke izizukulwane iqinisa izinhlelo ezikhona zezwekazi ngobubanzi kanye nezivumelwano ezifana noHlelo Lwenhlangano Yezizwe Ezibumbene zase-Afrika lwangowezi-2063, uMqulu Wentsha yase-Afrika kanye neSivumelwano Sokuhwebelana Kwamazwe Ase-Afrika.

src_text: Leeto leno le tla nesetsa gape pula le Kopano ya bobedi ya BNC ya dinaga ka bobedi, eo mo go yona go nang le dikomiti di le nne: ya Dipolotiki le Ditipolomate; ya Sesole le ya Sepodisi; ya Merero ya Moruo wa Naga, mmogo le ya Merero ya Baagi le ya Setso.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano sohlaka lokwakhiwa kwezimoto eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Mo godimo ga gore nne nngwe ya dinaga tse di neng di eme ka lefoko le le lengwe le naga ya Aforika Borwa mo nakong ya kgaratlho ya go lwela kgololesego, Tanzania ke nngwe ya dinaga tse re gwebisanang le tsona tse di botlhokwa thata, mo go gwebisana ga dinaga tsoo ka bobedi tlhatlogileng go tloga mo go dibilione tsa diranta di le.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele izindaba zokuthi inkampani yezimoto i-Stellantis South Africa isayine isivumelwano neNhlangano Yokuthuthukiswa Kwezimboni kanye noMnyango Wezohwebo, Izimboni Nokuncintisana sokuthi yakhe isikhungo esisha sokukhiqiza izimoto eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: 89 mo ngwageng wa 2021 go fitlha mo go di le.
tgt_text: Inkampani i-Stellantis idayisa izimoto zohlobo lwe-Jeep, i-Alfa Romeo, i-Fiat, i-Citroën, i-Opel kanye ne-Peugeot eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: 71 mo ngwageng wa.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano beNingizimu Afrika ne-Tanzania.

src_text: Go na le dikgwebo di feta di le 250 tse di farologaneng tsa naga ya rona tse di leng kwa nageng ya Tanzania..     Go Kopanya Setlamo sa Heineken le sa Distell go Nna se le Sengwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele Ukuvakashelwa kweNingizimu Afrika ngoLwesine, mhla we-16 kuNdasa 2023 nguMengameli u-Samia Suluhu Hassan wase-United Republic of Tanzania, ngokumenywa nguzakwabo, uMongameli u-Ramaphosa.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tshwetso e tserweng ke Setheo sa go Disa Maemo Dikgaisano fa go tla mo go kopanyeng setlamo sa kwa ntle sa Heineken le sa ka fa gae sa Distell Group Holdings.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuvakasha kulandela uMhlangano Wongqongqoshe Bamazwe Amabili (i-BNC) obubanjwe ePitoli ngoLwesithathu, mhla we-15 kuNdasa.

src_text: Go kopanngwa ga ditlamo tseno go nna setlamo se le sengwe leng seo se tla dirang gore go nne le setlamo se segolo sa go bedisa majalwa a nang le tshukitshana, go utlwanwe gore seno se tla letlelelwa fa le gore se tla tswela setšhaba mosola mo dikarolong tse di latelang, go tla tlhatlhelelwa ka bokgoni batlamedi ba ditirelo tsa setlamo seo, go tla rekwa dikunngo go tswa ka fa nageng, go tla okediwa dipeeletso mo dipatlisisong le mo tlhatlhelelong mmogo le go oketsa palo ya ditlhagisiwa tsa kgwebo eno tse di tlhagisiwang ka fa nageng..     Setlamo seno se se kopanngweng se tla oketsa gape le boipelo jwa badiri go nna le lenathwana mo setlamong seno ka go ba rekisetsa dišere le go dira gore ba nne le motho yo emetseng ditshwanelo tsa bona mo botong.
tgt_text: Kuzophinde kuqhakambise iseshini yesibili ye-BNC phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika ne-Tanzania, equkethe amakomiti amane: Ezepolitiki Nobunxusa; Ezokuvikela Nokuvikeleka; Izindaba Zomnotho, kanye Nezindaba Zenhlalo Namasiko..  Ngaphezu kobumbano lwalo nomzabalazo wenkululeko weNingizimu Afrika, izwe lase-Tanzania lingelinye lamazwe esihwebelana nawo ahamba phambili, ngokuba nesamba sohwebo phakathi kwala mazwe womabili esikhuphukayo sisuka kwizigidigidi ezi-R. 89 ngowezi-2021 saya kwizigidigidi ezi-R. 71 ngowezi-.

src_text: Go Disa Matsholo Ngwaga wa 2022 go Imolola bao Dithoto tsa Bona di Gogotsweng ke Merwalela.
tgt_text: Zingaphezu kwama-250 izinkampani zaseNingizimu Afrika ezisemkhakheni owehlukahlukene e-Tanzania.

src_text: Jaaka naga tla bo fetsa ngwaga taa go tloga ka motsi oo neng ya itemogela merwalela ya ngwaga ya 2022, Kabinete itumeletse tiro e dirilweng ke Tona ya Lefapha la Bonno jwa Batho, Mme Mmamoloko Kubayi, mmogo le Ditona le Bakhuduthamaga ba Merero ya Bonno jwa Batho ka go ela maemo tlhoko mo dikgatong tse di tserweng tsa go bonela malapa magae ona gogotsweng ke merwalela ya ngwaga wa 2022 kwa porofenseng ya KwaZulu-Natal mafelo ba ka subiwang mo go ona.
tgt_text: Ukuhlangana kwe-Heineken ne-Distell.

src_text: Go Buela Ditona le Batlatsatona Maaka ka Megolo ya Bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukugunyazwa yiNkantolo Yezokuncintisana kokuhlanganiswa okusezingeni lomhlaba kwenkampani ephisa utshwala yase-Europe i-Heineken kanye nenkampani yabaphisi botshwala yaseNingizimu Afrika i-Distell Group Holdings.

src_text: Kabinete tshwentswe ke dipuo tse di sa kgaotseng tsa go buela Ditona le Batlatsatona maaka ka megolo ya bona e tlhagelelang mo Bukeng ya go Kaela Tiro ya Batlhankedi ba Khuduthamaga, eo buang ka megolo ya bona, didirisiwa tseo ba di tlhokang go dira tiro ya bona mmogo le merokotso eo ba neelwang fa ba ntshitse ga tshwene mo tirong ya bona.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuhlangana, okuzosungula isikhungo sabakhiqizi esikhulukazi be-cider kuleli lizwe, kume phezu kwezidingo zomphakathi, ezibandakanya ukuthuthukiswa kwabahlinzeki, ukunakekelwa kwemikhiqizo yalapha ekhaya, ukuthuthukiswa kotshalomali emakhonweni ocwaningo kanye nokuthuthukiswa kokukhiqizwa kwemikhiqizo lapha ekhaya..

src_text: Malebana le Dintlo tsa Ditona seno ga se bolo go nna teng jaaka se kwadilwe mo Ditumelanong tsa ngwaga wa 1910 leng fa go ne go tlhomiwa puso ya Union of South Africa mme ka one motsi oo go ne ga tlhamiwa gore naga ya Aforika Borwa tla nna le Metsemegolo le meraro go emela maphata le mararo puso leng wa Pretoria mo go tla nnang Puso e Samaganang le Tsamaiso ya Naga, Bloemfontein mo go tla nnang Puso e Samaganang le Merero ya go Disa Melao ya Naga mmogo le Cape Town mo go tla nnang Puso e Samaganang le Baemedi ba Dipolotiki ba ba Tlhamang Melao ya Naga.
tgt_text: Le nkampani ezokwakheka lapha izophinde igqugquzele ukuthi abasebenzi babe ngabanikazi ngokusungula uhlelo lokuthi abasebenzi babe nezabelo nokuthi abasebenzi bamelwe kwibhodi.

src_text: Dintlo tse go buiwang ka tsona tseno tse go tweng ke megobagoba ya dintlo sele di rekiwa ka ngwaga wa 1994 mme puso e eteletsweng pele ke Mokgatlho wa African National Congress fitlhetse dintlo tseno di le teng mme yona se se dirileng ke go di tlhokomela fela gore se feletse le marope mme dintlo tseno di ba tswela mosola..     Ditona le Batlatsatona ba ba nnang mo dintlong tse puso ba adimang tsona ba duelela ditirelo fela jaaka batlhankedi ba ba direlang palamente tla bo le go tlhoka botho go batla gore Ditona le Batlatsatona ba tiro ya bona sa nneleng ruri go ithekela dintlo mo metsemegolong yothe go boletsweng ka yona le go dira gore go nne botlhofo gore ba kgone go dira tiro ya bona ya go direla naga..     Dijanaga tse di dirisiwang ke Ditona le Batlatsatona di tsamaisana le Melawana ya Bukana ya Tiro ya Ditona mme bile boleng jwa tsona bo mo diatleng tsa Tona ya Matlole mme ene elediwa ke Tona ya Mapodisi go mo eletsa ka didirisiwa tsa pabalesego tse di tlhokagalang mo dijanageng tseno.
tgt_text: Ukulandelelwa Kwenqubekelaphambili Ngosizo Lwezikhukhula zangowezi-.

src_text: Didirisiwa tsa pabalesego ke tsona tse di bitsang thata tse di nang le seabe se segolo mo ditlhwatlhweng tsa dijanaga tseno, mme ditiragalo tsa go tshwana le tsa mo malobanyaneng tsa Mokhuduthamaga yo thutseng botala ka tlhogo go latela gore sejanaga sa gagwe se amege mo kotsing ke dilo tsa mothale ono tse di dirang gore go nne botlhokwa thata gore re se lebelele seno ka leitlho la sepolotiki.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele umsebenzi owenziwe nguNgqongqoshe Wezokuhlaliswa Kwabantu, uNks Mmamoloko Kubayi kanye naMalungu Ekomidi Likangqongqoshe Lokuhlaliswa Kwabantu ngokulandelela inqubekelaphambili ngomsebenzi wokwakhela imindeni eyathinteka ngenxa yezikhukhula zangowezi-2022 KwaZulu-Natali izindlu nendawo yokuhlala  njengoba izwe libheke ekuqedeni unyaka wokuqala selokhu izikhukhula zangowezi-2022 zakhahlameza izwe lethu.

src_text: Batlhankedi botlhe ba ba direlang Palamente ba na le tshwanelo ya go neelwa badiredi ba ba ka ba thusang ka tiro ya bona.
tgt_text: Ukuhlanekezelwa kweqiniso ngeZinzuzo Zongqongqoshe Namaphini oNgqongqoshe.

src_text: Phapang fela ya palo ya badiri ba ba Thusang Ditona ke nako go ya ka gore Tona e rileng tla nna mo tirong sebaka se se kanakang gonne badiredi botlhe ba ba thusang Ditona ba dira go ya ka sebaka sa gore ene dira sebaka se le kanakang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukukhathazeka ngenxa yokuhlanekezelwa kweqiniso okuqhubekayo mayelana Nezinzuzo Zongqongqoshe Namaphini Ongqongqoshe njengoba kubekiwe kuMhlahlandlela Wamalungu Esigungu Esiphezulu, ocacisa izinzuzo, izinsizakusebenza kanye nezibonelelo zaMalungu Esigungu Esiphezulu ukuthi akwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wawo ngempumelelo.

src_text: Seno ke ka ntlha ya gore Melawana ya Bukana ya Tiro ya Ditona tsamaya kwalolwa sešwa le go fetolwa..     Moporesitente rometse Melawana ya Bukana ya Tiro ya Ditona e dirisiwang ga jaanong kwa Khomišeneng e Ikemetseng e Dirang ka Megolo ya Batlhankedi ba Puso ba Bagolo, go kwalola le go sekaseka karolo ya megolo e dirisiwang ga jaana mo bukaneng eno     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Izinhlelo zokuHlala Kongqongqoshe zingumphumela weSivumelwano sangowe-1910 ngesikhathi kubunjwa iNyunyana yase-Ningizimu Afrika okuyiyona eyaqoka izinhlokodolobha ezintathu zeNingizimu Afrika nokwaba iPitoli njengeSihlalo Sikahulumeni, i-Bloemfontein njengeSihlalo Sobulungiswa, kanye neKapa njengeSihlalo Sephalamende.

src_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Basadi mo Metshamekong.
tgt_text: Lezi zindlu okuthiwa ziyizithabathaba zaba khona ngaphambi kowe-1994 futhi uhulumeni oholwa yi-African Nation Congress ngokulandelana ubulokhu uqinisekisa ukunakekelwa kwalezi zindlu ukugcina ubugugu bazo kanye nokuzuza ekwenyukeni kwamanani ezindlu..  ONgqongqoshe namaPhini Ongqongqoshe abasebenzisa izindlu ezihlinzekwe nguMbuso bakhokha irenti ngendlela efanayo namalungu ephalamende.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go gatisa mo kaseteng Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Basadi mo Metshamekong gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga yona.
tgt_text: Kungaba alikho iqiniso uma kungalindeleka ukuthi oNgqongqoshe namaPhini Ongqongqoshe abasebenza umsebenzi ongaqinisekisiwe ezikhundleni abakuzo njengamanje bazihlinzeke bona ngendawo yokuhlala ngesikhathi besebenzela isizwe..  Izimoto ezisetshenziswa ngoNgqongqoshe namaPhini abo zihambisana neNcwanjana Yongqongqoshe i-Ministerial Handbook kanti ukubiza kwazo kunqunywa nguNgqongqoshe Wezezimali ngokubonisana noNgqongqoshe Wezamaphoyisa mayelana nezokuvikeleka.

src_text: Pholisi eno tlhagisa dikgato tse di tla tsewang go tsholetsa le go ema nokeng basadi mo metshamekong mmogo le go tsenya tirosng matsholo a tla samaganang le go fedisa go se lekalekane ga batho ba bong jo bo farologaneng mo metshamekong le mo mekgatlhong ya metshameko..
tgt_text: Ukuvikeleka kuyingxenye ebalulekile ekunqumeni inani futhi izigameko ezingezinhle zakamuva zoNgqongqoshe abalahlekelwa izimpilo zabo noma ababandakanyeka ezingozini ezimbi zemoto kugcizelela ukubaluleka kwalolu daba futhi akumele lolu daba kube udaba losomathuba kwezepolitiki.

src_text: Se samagana gape le matsapa basadi ba itemogelang ona fa ba tshwanetse go tsenela metshameko go tshwana le go se enngwe nokeng ka matlole, ka dithuso le ka megolo e tshwanelang batho botlhe ba leng batshameki ba metshameko.
tgt_text: Wonke amalunga ePhalamende anelungelo lokuba nabasebenzi abasiza ekwenzeni umsebenzi wawo.

src_text: Maitlhomo pholisi eno ke go dira gore basadi ba bantsi ba nne le seabe mo metshamekong le mo ditirong tsa go etelela kwa pele mo metshamekong go tshwana le go nna bakatisi le balaodi ba metshameko..     Pholisi eno tlhaloganya sentle gore go okediwa ga seabe sa basadi mo metshamekong le mo ditirong tsa boeteledipele mo metshamekong go tla fokotsa thata kgang ya go se lekalekane ga batho ba bong jo bo farologaneng mo dikarolong di le dintsi tsa metshameko tse di tlhaolang basadi.
tgt_text: Ukwehluka kwenani labasebenzi emahhovisi oNgqongqoshe kuya ngesikhathi loyo Ngqongqoshe abekwa ngaso, njengoba bonke abasebenzi beqashwa ngokwesikhathi saloyo Ngqongqoshe loyo.

src_text: Pholisi eno batla gore go nne le tekatekano mmogo le go dira gore basadi ba neelwe tlotlo e ba tshwanetseng le go se tlhaelediwe matlho mo ditirong tsa seporofešenale, go akaretsa le gore ba neelwe megolo e lekanang fela le ya banna ba le bona leng batshameki ba metshameko.
tgt_text: Lokhu kungenxa yeqiniso elithi iNcwanjana Yongqongqoshe ingumqulu osebenzayo obuyekezwa njalo-nje.

src_text: Go Tshwara Khonferense ya Lefatshe ya Ngwaga wa 2023 ya Merero ya Kalafo ya Batsetse le Masea e Leng Gona Belegwa.
tgt_text: UMongameli usethumele iNcwajana Yongqongqoshe yamanje kwiKhomishana Ezimele Ebhekele Amaholo Ezikhulu Zikahulumeni, evele ibhekene nokubuyekezwa kwamaholo ezikhulu zikahulumeni  Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete dumetse gore naga ya Aforika Borwa ka tswelela pele ya tshwara Khonferense ya Lefatshe ya Ngwaga wa 2023 ya Merero ya Kalafo ya Batsetse le Masea e Leng Gona Belegwa kwa Motse Kapa go tloga ka la bo 8 go fitlha ka la bo 11 Motsheganong 2023 mo bannaleseabe ba feta ba le 1 000 go tswa mo lefatsheng ka bophara ba tla kopanang gona go tla ka ditharabololo tsa go thusa gore batsetse le masea e leng gona belegwa se latswe kika, mmogo le go thibela gore basadi ba se tlhole ba belega masea a tlhokafalang ise belegwe.
tgt_text: UHlaka Lwenqubomgomo Lwabesifazane Abakwezemidlalo.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa gatetse pele tota fa go tla mo Dipeelo tsa Tlhabololo e Nnelang Ruri (SDG) tsa Dinagakopano (UN) fa go tla mo kalafong ya batsetse le masea e leng gona belegwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushicilelwa kusomqulu kohlaka lwenqubomgomo olumayelana Nabesifazane Abakwezemidlalo ukuze umphakathi uzophawula ngalo.

src_text: Naga le yona tla unngwelwa go tlala seatla go tswa mo khonferenseng eno gonne batho ba ba romilweng go tsenela ba tla tlhabana botlhale le go fatlhosana ka maano bona ba dirisang a ba tswelang mosola mo mererong ya kalafo ya batsetse le masea e leng gona belegwa.
tgt_text: Le nqubomgomo icacisa izinyathelo ezizogqugquzela futhi zeseke abesifazane abakwezemidlalo kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuthi izinhlelo zime ngomumo zokubhekana nokwehlukana kwizinhlobonhlobo zemidlalo kanye nokwakheka kwazo..  Iphinde ibhekane nemigoqo evimbela abesifazane ukuthi bangene kwezemidlalo efana nokuntuleka koxhasomali, uxhaso kanye nomholo onganele.

src_text: Porojeke ya Leeto la Ngwaoboswa, Tokologo le Kgaratlho (RLHR).
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo ehlongoziwe ihlose ukugqugquzela ukubandakanywa kwabesifazane abaningi kwezemidlalo nakubuholi obufana nokuba ngabaqeqeshi kanye nabaphathi..  Inqubomgomo ivumela ukuthi ukubandakanywa kwabesifazane abaningi kwezemidlalo nasezikhundleni zobuholi kuzonciphisa kakhulu futhi kuqede ukungalingani ngokobulili nganye nezinhlobo ezehlukahlukene zokucwaswa kwabesimame.

src_text: Kabinete neetswe pegelo e tseneletseng ya dikgatelopele tsa porojeke ya RLHR.
tgt_text: Iphinde futhi igqugquzele ukulingana nokuqinisekisa ukuthi abesifazane bathola inhlonipho noba ukubonakala kwezemidlalo, kubandakanya amaholo alinganayo nozakwabo besilisa..  Ukusingathwa kweNgqungquthela Yomhlaba Yempilo Kamama Nosana yezi-.

src_text: Kabinete dumelane gore Tona ya Dikamano le Tirisano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhaba mmogo le ya Ditirelo tsa Bosiamisi le tsa Kgopololo ya Batshwariwa ba ipope Komiti ya Ditona tsa Naga (IMC) e tla mekamekanang le merero ya RLHR..     RLHR ke porojeke ya segopotso sa naga mme maitlhomo yona ke go ikgopotsa le go keteka loeto lwa Aforika Borwa go leba kwa kgololesegong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika isingathe iNgqungquthela Yomhlaba Yempilo Kamama Nosana eKapa kusuka mhla we-8 kuya mhla ziyi-11 kuNhlaba 2023, lapho ababambiqhaza abangaphezu kwe-1 000 abasuka kuwowonke umhlaba bezohlanganyela ukudingida izixazululo zokwenza ngcono ukusinda komama nosana, kanye nokugwema ukubelethwa kwabantwana sebeshonile..  INingizimu Afrika isiyenze inqubekelaphambili enkulu ekufezeni lokho okuhloswe Izinjongo Zentuthuko Ezisimeme Zenhlangano Yezizwe Ezibumbene (i-UN) okuphatha impilo kamama nosana, kanye nokugwema kokuzalwa kwabantwana sebeshonile.

src_text: Kabinete tlhomile IMC gore nne yona e okamang porojeke eno ka go dira gore nne le baeteledipele ba sepolotiki.
tgt_text: Leli lizwe lizophinde lihlomule kakhulu njengoba izihambeli zengqungquthela zizokwabelana nathi, phakathi kokunye, ngezindlela ezisebenzayo kanye nezindlela ezintsha zokubhekana nezinkinga zempilo kamama nosana.

src_text: Maitlhomo porojeke eno ke go tlhoma dikgopotso tse di farologaneng tse di re gopotsang ka fao bakgaratlhela kgololesego ba ikentshitseng setlhabelo gore naga ya Aforika Borwa feletse gololesegile le go nna le temokerasi.
tgt_text: Umklamo Womzila Wamagugu Omzabalazo Nenkululeko (i-RLHR).

src_text: Porojeke eno tla dira gore go agiwe dimusiamo tse dingwe gape, difikantswe, dilaeborari le mafelo go bolokela dilwana tsa hisetori mme gape tla tlhagisa gape le ditiro tsa go ipopa ngatana le go dirisana le dinaga tse dingwe tsa Aforika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithole umbiko ocacisa ngenqubekelaphambili yokuqaliswa komklamo we-RLHR.

src_text: Porojeke eno tshegofaditswe ke UN mme bile na le bokgoni jwa go gagamatsa tirisanommogo magareng ga batho ka go sola mosola setso le ngwaoboswa go ralala le kontinente..     Tse dingwe tsa dikgato tse dintsinyana tse di setseng di dirilwe ke leeto le Ditona le le tsereng mo ngwageng wa 2022 go leba kwa Botswana le kwa Zimbabwe mmogo le go rulaganya le kopano magareng ga naga ya Angola le ya Tanzania go di jela nala..     Ditiro tse di mabapi le porojeke eno maitlhomo tsona ke go golaganya dinaga tse di ka fa Karolong ya Borwa jwa Kontinente ya Aforika mmogo le go ruta bašwa ka ka kgaratlho e kileng ya nna teng ya go lwantshana le ditiragalo tsa bokoloniale le tsa go nyefolana go ya ka lotso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lagunyaza ukuthi oNgqongqoshe Bezobudlelwano bamazwe Omhlaba Nokusebenzisana kanye Nokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo babe yingxenye yeKomidi Longqongqoshe (i-IMC) le-RLHR..  I-RLHR ingumklamo wesikhumbuzo sesizwe okuhloswe ngawo ukukhumbula nokubungaza indlela eya enkululekweni yeNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Pholisi eno tla dira gore go nne bonolo go baakanya diphoso tsa mo nakong e fetileng ka go nolofatsa dikgato tsa go kopa go busediwa gae ga masaledi balwelakgaratlho ba naga ya rona ba ba tlhokafalatseng kwa dinageng tse dingwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isungule i-IMC ukuze izokwengamela lo mklamo kanye nokuwuhola ngokwepolitiki.

src_text: Go na le mabitla ka nna le 11 a itsiweng gore hupile ditopo tsa maAforika Borwa kwa nageng ya Zambia, mme le lengwe la mabitla ao ke la Rre Duma Nokwe yo neng le Molwelakgaratlho..     Pholisi ya Naga e ka ga go Dira gore Dilo tsa Botsweretshi, Setso le Ngwaoboswa di Somarelwe ka Mokgwa wa Dikhomphiutha.
tgt_text: Lo mklamo ubheke ukubandakanya izinhlobo ezehlukahlukene zokukhumbula ukuzidela okwenziwa yilabo ababelwela inkululeko eNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ibe izwe elikhululekile futhi elinentando yeningi labantu.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Pholisi ya Naga e ka ga go Dira gore Botsweretshi, Setso le Ngwaoboswa di Somarelwe ka Mokgwa wa Dikhomphiutha.
tgt_text: Uphinde uvumele ukwakhiwa kwezigcinamagugu, amatshe ezikhumbuzo, imitapo yolwazi kanye nezinqolobane, futhi uhlose ukubonga umoya wobumbano nokusebenzisana phakathi kwabantu base-Afrika.

src_text: Pholisi eno dira gore Pholisi ya Naga e ka ga go Dira gore Ngwaoboswa Somarelwe ka Mokgwa wa Dikhomphiutha nne le mosola jaaka sale kwalwa ka ngwaga wa 2011 ke Lefapha la Botsweretshi le Setso.
tgt_text: Usuvunyiwe yi-UN futhi unamandla okuqinisa ukusebenzisana kwabantu ngokusebenzisa amasiko kanye namagugu kulolonke izwekazi.

src_text: Pholisi eno samagana le tiro ya go dira gore ditsweletswa tsotlhe tsa ngwaoboswa di somarelwe mo dikhomphiutheng gore batho ba kgone go di fitlhelela bonolo le go boloka tshedimosetso ya beng ba ditlhagisiwa tseo.

Le fa tota tlhaloso ya mokgwa wa go boloka ditsweletswa mo khomphiutheng bua bogolosegolo ka go tsaya tshedimosetso e bolokilweng ka mokgwa wa thekenoloji ya bogolotala go fetola gore nne mo thekenolojing ya segompieno, mmogo le go gatisa ditokomane tsotlhe tse di leng mo pampiring gore di tsenngwe mo lhomphiutheng, go kopisa direkoto tse di rekotilweng ka thekenoloji ya bogolotala go di tsenya mo dikhomphiutheng, pholisi eno okeditse bokao jwa lefoko leno go bua gape le ka tsedimosetso e leng mo mokgweng wa thekenoloji ya segompieno go ka se kgonagaleng gore gatisiwe..     Go somarela tshedimosetso mo dikhomphiutheng go tla tswela naga mosola o seng kana ka sepe gonne go tla dira gore tshedimosetso eno go nne bonolo go bona, segolobogolo tshedimosetso e tlhokomelwang ke mafelo go boloka tshedimosetso, dilaeborari le dimosiamo.
tgt_text: Imisebenzi eyenzekile ngowezi-2022 ifaka phakathi ukuvakashela kukaNgqongqoshe e-Botswana nase-Zimbabwe kanjalo nokuhlela imihlangano ne-Angola kanye ne-Tanzania.

src_text: Pholisi eno tla tsenngwa tirisong mo maphateng otlhe puso le setšhaba     Molaotlhomo.
tgt_text: Imisebenzi engaphansi kwalo mklamo kuhloswe ngayo ukuhlanganisa wonke amazwe aseNingizimu ye-Afrika kanye nokufundisa  abantu abasakhula ngomzabalazo wokulwa nobuqonela kanye nokucwaswa ngokwebala.

src_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero ya Ditheo tsa Molao wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo iphinde ivumele ukubuyiswa kwamathambo amaqhawe enkululeko aseNingizimu Afrika angcwatshwa kwamanye amazwe.

src_text: Kabinete tlhomamisitse go tlisiwa kwa Palamenteng ga Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Molao wa Merero ya Ditheo tsa Molao wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Abalelwa kwi-11 amathuna okwaziwa ukuthi ngawabantu baseNingizimu Afrika akhonjwe e-Zambia, kubandakanya neqhawe loMzabalazo uMnu Duma Nokwe..  INqubomgomo Kazwelonke Yokufaka Kwidijitali Ezobuciko, Amasiko Namagugu.

src_text: Maitlhomo molaotlhomo ono ke go kwalola sešwa Melao le mentsinyana e disiwang ke Lefapha la Bosiamisi le Tlhabololo ya Molaotheo ka go bakanya diphoso tsa setegeniki mmogo le dikarolo tse di kgoreletsang go diragadiwa ga Melao eno..     Molaotlhomo ono na le dikarolo di le 37 tse di tlhokang go kwalolwa sešwa gore go kgonwe go baakanngwa diphoso tse di leng teng mo melaong e farologaneng tse di sa tsamaisaneng le molaotheo     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze iNqubomgomo Kazwelonke Yokufaka Kwidijithali Ezobuciko, Amasiko Namagugu ukuthi iqaliswe ukusebenza.

src_text: Letsatsi la Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.
tgt_text: Le nqubomgomo igcizelela ukusebenza kweNqubomgomo Kazwelonke Yokufaka Kudijithali Kwezinsiza Zamagugu eyasungulwa nguMnyango Wezobuciko Namasiko wangowezi-.

src_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla fana ka puo ya gagwe ya dintlha tse di botlhokwa kwa Moketeng wa Ngwaga wa 2023 wa go Keteka Letsatsi la Ditshwanelo tsa Botho ka Labobedi wa la bo 21 Mopitlwe 2023 kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la De Aar West la porofense ya Kapa Bokone..     Molaetsamogolo wa monongwaga ke: “Go Bokeletsa le go Tlhokomela Setlwaedi sa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho go Tsena mo Isagong ka Tsona”, mme seno ke go keteka matlhotlhapelo a neng diragala kwa Sharpeville le kwa Langa mmogo le go keteka megwanto mengwe e neng ya runya ka lona letsatsi leno ka la bo 21 Mopitlwe 1960 mo nageng ka bophara..     Jaaka re le puso re rwele maikarabelo go sireletsa ditshwanelo tsa motho mongwe le mongwe ka fa nageng tse molaotheo mo nayang tsona.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo igxile ekufakweni kudijithali kwezinsiza zamagugu ngesizathu sokulondoloza, ukufinyelela kuzona kanye nokulawulwa kobunikazi.

src_text: Tla re dirisaneng mmogo go dira bonnete jwa gore go se nne le motho yo re mo tlogelang kwa morago fa go tla mo go direng gore dikarolo tsotlhe tse Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 mmogo le Molao wa Ditshwanelo tsa Botho batho ba ikutlwisa tsona.
tgt_text: Yize ukufakwa kwidijithali kungumsebenzi wokuguqula i-analogi iye kudijithali, kubandakanya ulwazi olusemaphepheni, ku-microfiche kanye nolwazi oluqoshiwe olungeyona idijithali, le nqubomgomo isivele yachaza lemi thombo yedijithali njengolwazi olukhiqizwe ngokwedijithali, olungeke luguqulelwe esimweni esibonakalayo..  Ukufakwa kwidijithali kuzohlomulisa kakhulu izwe njengoba kuzohlinzeka ngokufinyelela kalula kwimithombo yolwazi, ikakhulukazi lolo lwazi olusezinqolobaneni, imitapo yolwazi nakwizigcinamagugu.

src_text: Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Tshomarelo ya Metsi.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo izoqaliswa ukusebenza kuwona wonke uhulumeni nasemphakathini  UMthethosivivinywa.

src_text: Aforika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya go Keteka Mosola wa Metsi go tloga ka la bo 20 go fitlha ka la bo 26 Mopitlwe 2023 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go Potlakisa Diphetogo”..     Beke eno ketekiwa ka nako le nngwe le Letsatsi la go Keteka Botlhokwa jwa Metsi ka la bo 22 Mopitlwe 2023, mme lona le nopola ka fao metsi a phepa leng botlhokwa ka teng.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Izindaba Zobulungiswa wangowezi-.

src_text: Le fa re itemogetse dipula tse dintsi mo malobanyaneng, naga ya Aforika Borwa santse le naga e tlhaelang metsi bile mo maemong bo 30 dinaga tse di nang le komelelo mo lefatsheng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Izindaba Zobulungiswa wangowezi-2023 ePhalamende.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo baaging botlhe go tlhokomela metswedi ya metsi ya naga ya rona go tshwana le mafelo nang le metswedi, go nne botlhokwa thata mo go direng gore re nne le felo gongwe mo re ka iponelang metsi fa go le thata.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa kuhloswe ngawo ukuchibiyela iMithetho eminingi ekhishwe nguMnyango Wezobulungiswa Nokuthuthukiswa Komthethosisekelo ngokubhekana nezinkinga nezindaba ezithinta ukusetshenziswa ngendlela kweMithetho..  UMthethosivivinywa uqukethe izigatshana ezingama-37 eziphakamisa izichibiyelo zokulungisa amaphutha omthethosisekelo eMithetho eyehlukahlukene  Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Rotlhe ke maikarabelo rona go tlhokomela metsi le go dira bonnete jwa gore metsi ga fele..     Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Tlhotlheletsa Twantsho ya Bolwetse jwa Lehuba (TB).
tgt_text: USuku Lwamalungelo Abantu.

src_text: Motlatsamoporesitente Paul Mashatile tla fana ka puo ya gagwe ya dintlha tse di botlhokwa kwa Moketeng wa Semmuso wa go Keteka Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Tlhotlheletsa Twantsho ya Bolwetse jwa Lehuba (TB) ka la bo 24 Mopitlwe 2023 mo go tla bong go ketekiwa ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go Jalo!
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa uzokwethula inkulumo yakhe emcimbini kazwelonke woSuku Lwamalungelo Abantu wangowezi-2023 ngoLwesibili, mhla wama-21 kuNdasa 2023 ezinkundleni e-De Aar West Stadium, eNyakatho Kapa.

src_text: Ke Nna le Wena ba Re ka Fedisang TB”..     Mo moketeng ono o tla tshwarelwang kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la kwa Tlhabane mo Porofenseng ya Bokone Bophirima Lekgotla la Naga ya Aforika Borwa la Aids mmogo le Lefapha la Boitekanelo ba tla thankgolola Leano la Naga la go Samagana le Tiro ya go Lwantshana le TB, HIV, Malwetse a Fetelanang ka Thobalano magareng ga ngwaga wa 2023 go fitlha ka wa.
tgt_text: Isiqubulo salo nyaka sithi: “Sihlanganisa futhi Sesekela Isiko Lamalungelo Abantu Siya Kwingomuso”, njengoba sikhumbula izibhicongo zase-Sharpville nakwaLanga, kanye namanye amamashi enzeka mhla wama-21 kuNdada 1960 ezweni lonkana.

src_text: Leano leno le agelela mo godimo ga dilo tse di botlhokwa tse di setseng di fitlheletswe ka go tsosolosa matsholo thibelotshwaetso kalafo go nwa melemo go etela mafelo otlhe balwetse ba nnang mo go ona le go dira gore batho ba ikobele ditaelo tsa go tsaya melemo, mmogo le go fedisa ditiragalo le dipuo tsa go nyenya balwetse bano  Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Njengohulumeni, sisalokhu sizinikele emsebenzini womthethosisekelo wokuvikela amalungelo abantu abobonke abantu bakuleli lizwe.

src_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Setlhopha sa motshameko wa kerikhete sa the Proteas se se tla amogelang sa West Indies fa di tshameka metshameko ya multi-format tour.
tgt_text: Masisebenze ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi akekho oshiyeka ngemuva ekulandeleni ngokweqiniso uMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wangowe-1996 kanye noMqulu Wamalungelo..  USuku Lomhlaba Lwamanzi.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go maAforika Borwa go ema nokeng setlhopha sa naga ya rona jaaka se tswelela go re dira motlotlo.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izobungaza iViki Lamanzi Kuzwelonke kusuka mhla zingama-20 kuya mhla zingama-26 kuNdasa 2023 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sisheshisa Uguquko”..  Iviki leli liqondane noSuku Lomhlaba Lwamanzi mhla wama-22 kuNdasa 2023, olugqamisa ukubaluleka kwamanzi ahlanzekile.

src_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: Mokhuduthamaga wa Lefapha la Thuto wa Puso ya Porofense ya Foreistata Tate Makgoe yo neng na le dingwaga di le 60,yo nnileng le seabe se segolo mo lephateng la thuto mmogo le go atlega mo go direng gore porofense eno ntshe dipholo tse dintle thata tsa materiki ka tatelano sebaka sa dingwaga di le nne..Mme Maurencia Gillion, yo neng emetse porofense ya Kapa Bophirima kwa Lekgotleng la Bosetšhaba la Diporofense (NCOP) mmogo le go direla Komiti a Tlhophilweng mo go yona ya Ditirelo tsa Kokelo le tsa go Tswa Baagi Thuso ne le molwelakgaratlho yo neng tumile bile diretse baagi ba Kapa Bophirima sebaka se tlhoka palo, segolobogolo baagi ba kwa metseselegae ya porofense eo.Rre John Wills yo neng na le dingwaga di le 66, yo neng le ramolao yo neng tumile bile le .molwelakgaratlho yo neng emela kwa kgotlatshekelo baeteledipele ba le bantsinyana ba dipolotiki, mmogo le Moporesitente wa mo malobeng bong Rre Nelson Mandela.Rre Mark Pilgrim yo neng na le dingwaga di le 54, yo neng le mogasi wa dikgang yo neileng bagasi ba bangwe ba le bantsi mafolofolo mo intasetering ya kgaso ya dikgang.
tgt_text: Nangaphezu kwezimvula ezinkulu zakamuva ezingxenyeni zezwe, iNingizimu Afrika isalokhu iyizwe eliswele amanzi futhi libalwa njengelinye lamazwe angama-30 anesomiso emhlabeni.

src_text: Mme Gloria Bosman yo neng na le dingwaga di le 50, yo nang le dikabo di tlhoka palo tse di fentseng yo neng le seopedi le sekwadi sa mmino wa Aforika Borwa wa jazz     Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi licela zonke izakhamuzi ukuthi zivikele imithombo eyigugu yethu yamanzi efana namaxhaphozi, njengoba ibalulekile kakhulu ekutheni sithole amanzi esikhathini eside.

src_text: Ditokololo tsa Lekgotla la go Eletsa Botsamaisi jwa Sekema sa Makwalo Madulo     Moatefokate Boyce Mkhize (Monnasetulo)     Hosi Pheni Cypraim Ngove (Motlatsamonnasetulo)     Mme Kagisho Mmaseleke Choenyana     Rre Pieter Jacobus De Beer     Moatefokate Nomonde Nokuthula January     Rre Iqbal Mohamed Motala; le     Ngaka Vuyisani Moss..     Ditokololo tsa Khomišene ya Baatlhodi     Mme Nomzamo Zondo;(ii)    Rre Hanif Vally;(iii)    Ngaka Cornelia September;(iv)    Rre Makgabhana Mokoena thapilwe sešwa); led     Moporofesara Estelle Hurter thapilwe sešwa).
tgt_text: Sonke sinendima okufanele siyidlale ekugcineni amanzi nokuqinisekisa ukuthi ukuthunyelwa kwawo akupheli..  Usuku Lomhlaba Lwesifo Sofuba (i-TB).
